description: Search and apply to over 120,000 jobs 'on the go' with CV- Library's multi-award winning FREE mobile app, whenever and wherever you are! The latest version is packed full of new features and tools to support your job search. Not only is it faster than ever before, but the redesigned interface has been optimised to make your job search simple. Key features include: • Search & instantly apply to over 120,000 jobs • Receive push notifications when new jobs are added • Upload your CV via Dropbox, Google Drive and OneDrive • Save your favourite jobs and see your recent job searches • Auto-fill prompts to help your keyword and location searches • Create new, edit & use multiple covering letters • Share jobs to yourself or a friend via email, SMS and social networks Download the CV-Library Job Search app now and apply to your perfect job directly from your phone or tablet.
release_text: - Upload a different CV for your applications and to your account - See and edit your full profile - See and re-run your recent searches - See and save recently viewed jobs - 'Apply Later' tool - Redesigned key pages for an easier mobile experience - A more familiar mobile interface so you can swipe and double-tap your way to that dream job - Bug fixes

You will even be alerted when jobs that match your searches become available! Key features: - Search, view and apply for jobs - Push notifications for new jobs that fit your criteria - Save your job searches - Set job alerts

description: Welcome to the Ancient Egypt! Swap and burst jewels to travel through pyramids! Get famous match-3 game! Jewellust is a gem-swapping puzzler with original features, magnificent colorful graphics and vivid animation. This jewel puzzle reminds Bejeweled but has many interesting features and exciting gameplay. One of the first Android top-seller games, Jewellust now supports all existing screen resolutions and 5 languages (English, French, Spanish, Russian and Japanese). ***Rules*** Burst the gems by grouping them to three or more in a row (or a column) before time runs out. You must take all mosaic tiles to the lowest row. If you've burst four or more gems in a row, a bonus gem will appear (if available). In campaign mode new bonuses become available as your journey goes. HD version released! ***Press about the game*** ubscure.com: "...this game is challenging enough to keep advanced gamers happy and simple enough for beginning gamers to pick up easily." androidtapp.com: "Jewellust is really fun and addictive, one of the best puzzle games around." lifeofandroid.com: "Jewellust is gloriously simple, yet infuriatingly challenging." best-apps.t3.com: "...once you get into a rhythm, the game starts to eat away at your precious free time." wildfire-htc.com: "This game captivates you and you will be playing hours on end without realizing it." askyourandroid.com: "...I just peeped in to see what it was really about and later got glued to it, I just couldn’t put it down I was determined to play to the end." androidgamesreviews.com: "Game is very easy to play, all rules are simple. Gems are really colorull and also special graphic effects are cool and funny." AndroidNetworkAwards.com: "Best Puzzle Game" NOTES: - Since version 3.0.0 the game asks for some additional permissions to download apk expansion pack with HD gfx. - As the game has online leaderboards, it's necessary to use the phone hardware ID (not your phone number) to identify your unique record on the leaderboards. It's only used when you post your scores online. - if you have problems running this application or some bug reports please email us: smartpix.games@gmail.com
release_text: * 3.1.8 several minor fixes * 3.1.7 survival save fix * 3.1.6 profiles save fix * 3.1.2 HD graphics fix * 3.1.0 completely rewritten engine: openGL gfx works smoothly even on superHD devices * 3.0.0 HD VERSION RELEASED!

description: Devilry Huntress is a sign-swapping puzzler, similar to our game Jewellust. Medieval decorations and comic Halloween theme make the game stylish and funny. Swap and burst evil spirits to clean the Kingdom from devilry! Devilry Huntress has: - 40 levels - 2 game modes - various bonuses and power-ups - 2 kind of bonus-games - online score table Note: you can find the free lite version of the game on Google Play to estimate gameplay. ***Foreword*** In the history of the Five Counties the dark times have come. People have fled from their villages, lands have become infested with evil spirits and immortals. Many exorcists and vampire hunters have vanished in the struggle against the Dark Earl - the lord of the Central county, who has opened infernal gates and has become the master of immortals. A young devilry huntress has been sent to stop the Dark Earl. One old cleric has revealed the secret of the immortals: every "dark nest" holds the magic plate with spells. Once created, they can not be destroyed, and the Dark Earl has scattered them over the Five Counties. Existance of "dark nests" depends on those plates. "Collect them all and you will put an end to the Dark Earl's power", - cleric said. Armed by this knowledge, devilry huntress goes to the Counties to clear lands with sacred fire. ***The Game Rules**** Exchange signs with each other to destroy a combination of 3 or more creatures of one kind. If you’ve burst four or more creatures at once, a bonus sign will appear. In campaign mode new bonuses become available as your journey goes. To fight against evil you have flask of vampire blood. You must collect all the letters to get a plate before the "black blood" runs out. You will visit 5 counties. From county to county you will travel through magic portals created by Dark Earl for his awful army. Fire lamps in right order to turn on the portal. For each county you have scrolling map where you'll find 8 evil nests. Some of them own magic plates, others do not. At last you are in a heart of the Earl's sanctuary. You have all the magic plates with spells. Now you have to put them together to seal up an infernal gateway from which the Earl gets his power upon dead. But you need only 20 of 30 existing spells. Drag them into the magic circle - one by one. Wrong plate will throw away one spell from circle and you will have to try again and again. Don't give up, future of Five Counties depends on you! ***Power-ups*** Sometimes it seems that it's impossible to win, but there are 9 bonus signs, a Pick Hammer and Defensive Pentagrams to help you on your way. ***Online scores*** Using ONLINE SCORES button from main menu you can see your own score in online rate table. When you look the rate table from your device (not from PC browser) you can see your score highlighted. ***Customer reviews about the game*** "Another great game from an awesome developer. I think I like this one even more than Jewellust" "Best android game I've seen. Highly recommend." "Lots of fun, great graphics and game play, highly recommended!" "A devilishly delightful diversion!" "Lots of fun! A++++!!!!!!" "Absolutely awesome! Addictive!" "Best. Gem. Game. Ever!"

description: This is the New American Standard version of the Holy Bible, including read aloud capabilities. The speaking function may be easily controlled by you through a SPEAK ON / OFF button inside each chapter. You will be able to follow the holy scriptures while driving, cooking or attending any kind of task that would not allow you to read. Furthermore, this New American Standard Bible version is compiled in a colocquial fashion while including key notes at the end of each chapter correlating verses into other chapters when needed, in order to give you a better scope on God's Word. The New American Standard Version Bible is a nice reading and listening experience for every Christian, including scholars and students, fulfilling the task as a spiritual guidance for your biblical study. Please Consider: 1) The reading text inside this Android App will self adjust it's size depending of your phone or tablet's screen size, aiming for an easy, uncluttered, reading experience. 2) The Speak aloud function may not be installed or configured in your Android device. This Android app will pop up a message box telling you about the need of installing or configuring the voice function inside your Android Device. You may do so by getting into your Android´s home screen, opening the SYSTEM SETTINGS menu and scrolling down into the Language & Input option. Inside you will find the Text to Speech configuration panel.

Amino Acids Quiz is the ultimate way for Chemistry and Biology students to study and memorize the most important aspects of the 20 amino amino acids. Quiz yourself, and do it in a way that's fun and logically organized. Don't waste time with other apps that provide a clutter of unnecessary information you don't need to know. Amino Acids Quiz let's you choose the quizzes important to your class and focus your efforts to quickly and efficiently study. Quizzes are divided into the following categories - 1 Letter Abbreviations - 3 Letter Abbreviations - Chemical Structures - pKa Values - Chemical Categories - Random Quiz *** Smart Quiz System ensures you will never be asked the same question twice in a row and questions you answer correctly will be asked less often. Truly the best way to memorize your amino acids. *** This quiz system makes it much easier than studying with flashcards to memorize all of the important aspects of amino acids. Created By: Alex Martinko (Design) Sean Luther (Programming)
release_text: Improved aesthetics, fixed minor glitches, and added a reference table (Professor difficulty). Please send any questions, comments, or suggestions to nextgeneduchem@gmail.com We are happy to respond to your comments and to try and implement new suggestions.

This free app consists of 3 useful electricity tools, an electrical calculator, an electrical circuit calculator and electrical formulas. Electrical calculator: You are able to calculate the most important electrical sizes. You can calculate the electrical power, electrical resistance, electrical charge, electrical work and electrical current. Electrical circuit: You are able to calculate the current in parallel circuits (both total and partial), the voltage in series circuits (both total and partial) and the resistance in parallel and series circuits. Electrical formulas: You can see the formulas for the electrical power, electrical resistance, electrical work, electrical current and electrical charge. Electrical engineering Books: You can see a list of the best books and buy them. Electrical engineering E-Books: You can see a list of the best e-books and buy them. Other calculators: You can also calculate the battery lifetime, the stored energy in a capacitor, the inductance and the capacitance, the output voltage of a voltage divider. The best app for school, college and work! If you are a student it will helps to learn. Note: Electrical engineering covers a wide range of subfields including electronics, digital computers, power engineering, telecommunications, control systems, radio frequency engineering, and signal processing.

description: The free ABC app for Android smartphones offers you independent content, whenever and wherever you want it. Watch the live stream of ABC News 24 or listen to a great selection of ABC Radio streams and podcasts while reading the latest news stories from the Australian Broadcasting Corporation. Following your feedback, our FREE flagship apps have been through a major overhaul and are better than ever. Stories are now enriched with audio and video and you can set your device to wake up with the ABC, selecting one of your preferred ABC TV or Radio programs. ALL NEW NAVIGATION Page turn or open the drawer menu to explore the latest News, TV and Radio content produced by the ABC team. BREAKING NEWS ALERTS Get an alert as breaking news happens. These connect you to all the information of the event as it unfolds. WAKE UP WITH THE ABC Start the day well informed. Set the alarm within the app to wake up to your choice of ABC News in 90 Seconds, ABC News 24, selected ABC Radio podcasts or any of our live radio streams. MORE CONTENT You can now play related audio and video on article pages or choose from a selection of 80+ podcasts and live streams of Radio and TV. MORE CONTEXT Are you into Science or Music news? Find related ABC TV and Radio shows as you browse each topic; Check the weather and stories that are relevant to your location (Yes! ABC Local News is now available). MORE CONTROL Pull down category pages to refresh content and ensure you have the latest available from ABC Online; Set your app to only play media files over WiFi and take better control of your data consumption. Tips to help you keep tabs of your data consumption: # ABC News 24 can use up to 300MB of data per hour. # Live radio streams can consume up to 40 MB per hour. *** Note that you are responsible for the data transfer and consumption charges incurred by you when using any ABC app. The ABC disclaims all liability for such charges ***

description: 4.5 millions of games played and counting. 2011 Best Multiplayer Game Award 2nd place - bestappever.com "...it’s impossible to pass up if you’re even remotely interested in turn based strategy games." - TouchArcade "...I’m truly in awe of everything that has been captured and neatly packaged in UniWar..." - AppCraver - 10/10 "...It’s probably the best strategy game on the iPhone right now..." - PixelatedGeek UniWar™ is a classic multiplayer turn-based strategy game with an online community. Players take turns building their army and fighting against each other. It is like chess with multiple races and boards where terrain affects attack and mobility of units. FEATURES: - 3 races, each with 8 varied units. - 10,000+ user created maps to choose from. - Play up to 20 games at once. - Team play allows 2v2, 3v3 and 4v4. - Campaign with 21 missions. - Play modes: Multiplayer online, Vs. AI, Vs. a friend on the same phone (hot seat). - Worldwide Global Ladder. - Email or push notifications when it is your turn. - In-game chat and main chat room. - 5 landscape themes with fog of war. - Select a fast or slow turn duration from 3 min to 3 days.

description: Newborn Baby Timer, Tracker, & Log (Newborn Baby Timer) is an easy-to-use timer, tracker, and log that lets you know how long it has been since your baby has performed certain activities, such as breastfeeding, sleeping, dirtying a diaper, taking medicine, and taking a bath. It was created for new breastfeeding moms and is most helpful for the first few weeks or months in the hospital or at home with your new baby. Newborn Baby Timer allows new moms to set separate timers and alarms for each activity (breastfeeding, diaper changes, etc). These alarms will help you remember when you need to wake your new baby boy or girl for another round of breastfeeding or another dose of medicine. Newborn Baby Timer has a logging feature to help you track activities over time. Newborn Baby Timer has a lot of great features that make it more than a simple baby care device, such as: *Gentle Alarm Sounds *Sound Machine *Breastfeeding Side Indicator *Night Light *Flashlight *Logging Here are more details about the features: GENTLE ALARM SOUNDS: Since alarms can scare babies, Newborn Baby Timer’s alarms are configured to gently alert mom or dad that it is time to breastfeed, change a diaper, etc. Newborn Baby Timer has four alarm songs ranging from a lullaby to gentle piano music to a classical techno beat that will gently wake you up in the middle of the night to remind you that it's time to breastfeed, change a diaper, etc. SOUND MACHINE: The Sound Machine generates several types of white noise that will help calm a new baby. The white noise generator includes plain white noise, thunder storm, rain, and waves crashing. LED FLASHLIGHT: The LED Flashlight feature that turns the camera on your phone into an LED Flashlight. The flashlight is very helpful for finding items in the dark, such as a pacifier under the crib. BREASTFEEDING SIDE INDICATOR: The Breastfeeding Side Indicator allows you to track the last breast you used to feed your baby. PICK-A-COLOR NIGHTLIGHT: Transform your baby nursery or bedside into a softly lit oasis. --Add on Features:-- BATH TIMER: Track baths! SYNC WITH OTHER DEVICES: Another caregiver can pick up where you left off by sending an email to launch the app. INCREASE LOGGING TIMELINE: Increase the amount of records displayed on the view log screen. REMOVE ADS: Makes a more enjoyable experience by increasing screen real estate. ADDITIONAL SOUNDS: Crickets Chirping and Heartbeat sounds. This app is a "must have" for breastfeeding moms of newborns. If you are pregnant, download the app now and play with it before for you head to the hospital. It will surely help you keep track of things for the first few weeks! Check out the Newborn Baby Timer, Tracker, and Log instructional video on YouTube (link within the app). DISCLAIMER: By using this app, users agree that the publisher is not responsible for any app malfunctions. If you are using this app to track time extremely important medicine doses, please also use a back-up timer, stopwatch, and/or clock. ---Thank you to all of the users who have provided feedback--- "Everything in one place Great app for organizing and keeping track of your babies ins and outs. I found its helps me learn his pattern and schedule. Plus its great to see how much more sleep we are both getting a night." "Super convenient! Five stars...very useful. This has the same functionality as the ItzBeen and other gadgets (plus the sound generator) without the inconvenience of having to tote around yet another gadget." --- Thanks to iconpharm.com for providing graphics.

Baby Timer TWINS is a simple, easy-to-use timer that lets you know how long it has been since your baby has performed certain activities, such as eating, sleeping, dirtying a diaper, and taking medicine. Newborn Baby Timer allows new moms to set separate alarms for each activity. These alarms will help you remember when you need to wake your precious baby girl for a feeding, or your sweet baby boy for another dose of medicine. Newborn Baby Timer has a lot of great features that make it more than a simple baby care device, such as: SOUND MACHINE: The Sound Machine generates several types of white noise that will help calm a new baby. The white noise generator includes plain white noise, thunder storm, rain, and waves crashing. LED FLASHLIGHT: The LED Flashlight feature that turns the camera on your phone into an LED Flashlight. The flashlight is very helpful for finding items in the dark, like when you when you lose a pacifier under the crib in the middle of the night. GENTLE ALARM SOUNDS: Since alarms can scare babies, Newborn Baby Timer’s alarms are configured to gently alert mom or dad that it is time to focus on your new baby. BREAST FEEDING SIDE INDICATOR: The Breast Feeding Side Indicator allows you to track the last breast you used to feed your new baby boy. SYNC WITH OTHER DEVICES: Allow another caregiver to pick up where you left off by sending an email to launch the app. PICK-A-COLOR NIGHTLIGHT: Transform your baby nursery or bedside into a softly lit oasis. MORE SOUNDS THAN THE FREE SINGLETON EDITION: For your baby's listening pleasure. Perhaps the best feature of this device is that it is easy and simple to use. Mom can synchronize her devices with dad, a grandparent, or your nanny and they will know exactly what needs to happen next. This app is a "must have" for moms of newborn twins. If you are pregnant, download the app now and play with it before for you head to the hospital. It will surely help you keep track of things for the first few weeks! DISCLAIMER: By using this app, users agree that the publisher is not responsible for any app malfunctions. If you are using this app to track time extremely important medicine doses, please also use a back-up timer, stopwatch, and/or clock. ---Thank you to all of the users who have provided feedback--- Ronnie Pierce on Aug 11, 2013: Everything in one place Great app for organizing and keeping track of your babies ins and outs. I found its helps me learn his pattern and schedule. Plus its great to see how much more sleep we are both getting a night. Susan Glass on Jun 26, 2013: Super convenient! Five stars...very useful. This has the same functionality as the ItzBeen and other gadgets (plus the sound generator) without the inconvenience of having to tote around yet another gadget.
release_text: - The app is now free. Those who have purchased the app have received the PRO version. Those who download it in the future will see ads in the app. - Adds logging features to track activities for 14 days (PRO users) or 1 day (free version) - Adds a lot more options to the nightlight feature. - Sync with Amazon devices! Amazon version is also now free. - Added Animations between pages - Removed a few of the Save/Cancel buttons to save space. Back button now saves all changes.

description: Pill Reminder - Medicine Timer helps you answer the question: "How long has it been since I last took my medicine?" Pill Reminder - Medicine Timer has four pill timers that count upward. Medicine Timer lets you set alarms to go off every X hours or minutes, which is especially helpful for medicine that you must take in even time periods. Medicine Timer allows you to set the names of your pills, and those names are displayed on the alarm screen. Pill Reminder - Medicine Timer does NOT have alarms that go off every day at a certain time (consider another app or your phone's alarm function for this). Pill Reminder - Medicine Timer is free and ad supported, though there is the option to upgrade to a pro version with additional features and no ads. Pill Reminder - Medicine Timer was build to be fairly simple to use, but it has a ton of great features: SET PILL NAMES: To track your medications. START and STOP TIMERS: See exactly how long it has been since you took your medications. ALARM: Set alarms to sound every X hours + Y Minutes (4 day maximum). The gentle alarm sounds in the app are great for overnight alarms as they won't fully wake you. Which leads to... LED FLASHLIGHT: The LED Flashlight feature that turns the camera on your phone into an LED Flashlight, which is great for finding your pillbox at night. The flashlight works on MOST phones, but please write to the developer if it does not work on your phone. SOUND MACHINE: The Sound Machine generates several types of white noise (plain noise, thunder, rain, waves) that will help you sleep at night. TRACKER / LOG: Free users can see which medications they took in the past 24 hours. PRO users can see 2 weeks' worth of data. PICK-A-COLOR NIGHTLIGHT (PRO feature): Use the nightlight for the perfect amount of light to open your pillbox in the evening, or simply to leave on your nightstand. SYNC WITH ANOTHER DEVICE (PRO feature): Send your core application data to another device to transfer data between care givers. If you encounter a bug in the app, please email the developer ( androiddeveloperjoe@gmail.com ) before leaving a bad star rating. This app is useful for many types of medicines that must happen on periodic time tables, like in vitro fertilization (IVF) meds, kidney dialysis, etc. DISCLAIMER: By using this app, users agree that the publisher is not responsible for any app malfunctions. If you are using this app to track time extremely important medicine doses, please also use a back-up timer, stopwatch, and/or clock. Please see the privacy policy for additional information.

Knitting and Crochet Buddy (Knitting Buddy) is an all-in-one knitting and crochet project tracker that allows you to track multiple knitting or crochet projects. Knitting Buddy has a row counter, repeat counter, project timer, notes pages, ruler, a flashlight, and it even displays your knitting pattern on the row counter page (great for lace)! This app was originally developed for knitting, but those who crochet will also find it quite useful. Knitting Buddy isn't your standard knitting row counter -- it is a true knitting and crochet project tracker. Here are more details about the features of Knitting Buddy: MULTIPLE PROJECT SUPPORT: No limit to the number of knitting or crochet projects that you can track. Each project has individualized settings. ROW COUNTER: Track the current row of your knitting or crochet project. The row numbers are displayed nice and big on the main page. Increase (or decrease) the row number by pushing on an actual "button" on a knit background. REPEAT COUNTER: Track the current repeat row, and optionally link the repeat counter to the row counter. You can specify the number of repeat rows on the project settings page. DISPLAY PATTERN: Take a screen shot of your knitting pattern and display it on the main project page. This feature is super handy as it eliminates the need to switch between applications or to carry a paper copy of your pattern. NEEDLE TRACKER / LOG: Track all of your knitting needles. The log displays US, metric, and UK sizes, and allows you to track needle length, material, type, and whether or not the needle is in use. PROJECT TIMER: Ever wonder how long it actually takes to complete a knitting or crochet project? Use the project timer to track the time it takes to complete each project. Each project has an individual timer that must be manually started/stopped. RULER: Tired of carrying a separate ruler for to check your tension? Use the ruler feature to make sure that your tension is just right. NOTES PAGE: Track all of the project's notes, such as yarn, yarn weight, needles, gauge, and other notes. Please email the developer if you have additional items that you would like to track! GLOBAL and PROJECT SETTINGS: Completely customize your Knitting Buddy experience. The screen can be tailored to according to your preferences, such as showing or hiding features such as repeat rows, knitting pattern, project timer, and project progress. TRACK PROGRESS: Set the total number of rows for your knitting project, and Knitting Buddy will track your percent complete. ADD IMAGES / PHOTOGRAPHS: Take pictures of your project at various phases to remember what the project looked like at various stages. Add notes about each image and view the images directly from the app. You can also add screenshots of your patterns that can be viewed from the project page. FLASHLIGHT: Turn your devices camera into a flashlight to help find difficult stitches. PRO SUBSCRIPTION: Remove all of the ads from the application and allows you to change the style of your project theme. CHANGE PROJECT THEME: Change between the standard buttons and more colorful flowers, hearts, and shamrocks. KNITTING NEEDLE AND CROCHET HOOK SIZE CHARTS: Convert needle sizes between metric, U.S. sizes, and U.K. sizes and crochet hooks between metric, numeric, and letter. ABBREVIATIONS: Look up abbreviations commonly used in knitting and crochet patterns. YARN CHARTS: Helpful data to convert different sizes of yarn. SOCK CHARTS: Common foot sixes for men, women, and children! Knitting Buddy is now on Ravelry - become one of Knitting Buddy's Buddies at: http://www.ravelry.com/groups/knitting-buddys-buddies English to Dutch Translator: Lara van der Zee
release_text: - Pro Users can now view patterns from a website. If you have a PDF document, you can upload it to Google Drive and view it within the app! - Added Knitting and Crochet Symbols - Added needle and hook sizes per users requests (check the bottom of the drop down menus) - Added a "Save and Add Another" button for needles/hooks/yarn. Also made each of those pages full screen to benefit those with smaller devices.

description: Night Light (Pick-A-Color Nightlight) is an easy-to-use nightlight and sound machine. In three simple steps, you can turn on your nightlight and add a little safety, security, and comfort to any room. Here's what to do: Step 1 - Choose Your Nightlight Color: Use the color wheel to select your favorite nighttime color. The color picker allows you to select every possible color! Step 2 - Choose Your Sound: Pick-A-Color Night Light's sound machine has six sound loops, including plain white noise, rain, storm, waves crashing, crickets chirping, and a heartbeat. Step 3 - Start the Night Light: It's as easy as pushing a button. Settings: Pick-A-Color Night Light has multiple settings that you can customize: - Show a digital clock on the night light screen - Show an analog clock on the night light screen - Screen Saver Mode: Turn off the night light after a user-specified time - Sound Saver Mode: Turn off the white noise sound machine after a user-specified time Pick-A-Color Night Light is ideal for everyone from children to adults. See the screen shots below for ways to light up your baby's nursery, or turn your bedside table into an elegant light display. Leave the night light on in the bathroom or hallway to ensure that you can see without fully waking yourself up at night time. Check out the screen shots that show what the night light looks like if you fold a piece of paper and put it over the device -- it looks really neat! For best results, turn your device to maximum brightness and keep your device plugged in. This night light has a "wakelock" feature that keeps your phone on through the night, but the light will drain your battery if it isn't plugged in. Pick-A-Color Night Light has been translated into several languages. Contact the developer if you'd like the nightlight translated into your language! Email the developer if you have suggestions for additional sounds or other improvements for Pick-A-Color Night Light. Why pay money for a nightlight when you can use this nightlight for FREE? This nightlight app is ad supported. Upgrade to Night Light PRO to remove advertisements.
release_text: Added full screen mode for Kit Kat and Lollipop users.

description: Toddler + Kids Alarm Clock, also called "Alright to Rise," is a simple "alarm clock" that will let toddlers know when it is okay to wake up. Alright to Rise also has a basic white noise sound machine to help your toddler sleep. Alright to Rise has two modes: *NAP MODE: Specify a time in hours and minutes. Use this during the day if you want your toddler to stay in bed for at least a certain amount of time (i.e. 45 minutes) *OVERNIGHT MODE: Specify a time in the morning that is OK for your child to wake up (i.e. 7:00am - as opposed to 5:15 when my little one likes to wake!). In both modes, the "alarm clock" is simply the screen on the phone/tablet coming on to a user-specified color. The screen is completely off while your toddler sleeps and only turns on at the specified time to conserve battery. Consider charging your phone overnight to ensure that it comes on, especially if you are using the sound machine. Check out the app screen shots for different ideas to really make the phone glow. One of the screen shots shows what the alarm looks like with a sheet of paper folded over the screen. Water bottles look pretty cool, too! It is a good idea to set your phone to silent mode so that any emails or calls you get don't wake up your child. The sound machine contains four sounds: Plain White Noise, Rain, Storm, and Waves Crashing. You have the option to set your alarm colors using a color wheel that includes a wide variety of colors. The app is free and ad supported. Obviously, the ads are aimed at adults, not kids. Please email the developer with any questions.

The unofficial White House Flashlight works on most Android devices. In the initial off state, the phone is set to a darkened image of the white house. When the flashlight is turned on, a daytime view of the white house appears to the sound of the Marine Corps Marching Band playing Hail to the Chief. This White House Flashlight is for entertainment purposes only and is not in any way affiliated with or endorsed by the White House or the President of the United States. The White House is the official residence and principal workplace of the President of the United States (Barack Obama). It is located at 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW in Washington, D.C. Thanks to OgreBot for posting the picture of the White House at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:WhiteHouseSouthFacade.JPG Thanks to the Marine Corps Marching Band for providing Hail To The Chief in the public domain: http://www.marineband.usmc.mil/downloads/audio/Hail_to_the_Chief.mp3 This flashlight is ad supported.

description: 배터리 남은 양을 영어/한국어로 표시해 주는 위젯입니다 문제점이 있으셔서 댓글로 남겨주시면 반영하려고 노력할께요^^ 위젯을 생성하시자마자는 잔량이 나타나지 않을 수도 있습니다 배터리 잔량이 바뀌면 표시됩니다 관련어플 : 심플 텍스트 달력 위젯, 심플 텍스트 날씨 위젯 ---- 개발자 연락처 : lis2012@lis2012.com

심플 텍스트 날씨 위젯의 기상청 버전입니다. 기존의 구글서버에서 받아온 정보는 잘 안 맞는다고 하시는 분이 많아 한국 기상청의 정보를 이용하였습니다. 지역은 텍스트로 입력 받지 않고 리스트 중에서 고르실 수 있습니다. 나머진는 기존 버전과 동일합니다. ---------------------------------------------------- 오늘과 내일의 날씨를 보여주는 위젯입니다. 시스템 폰트를 사용하여 표현하므로, 루팅을 하여 폰트를 바꾼 경우 더욱 효과적입니다. 관련 어플 : 심플 텍스트 달력 위젯, 심플 텍스트 배터리 위젯 세시간에 한번씩 갱신됩니다 ---- 개발자 연락처 : lis2012@lis2012.com

[Apps100 Festival 수상작] 이 어플리케이션은 ㈜LG유플러스와 ㈜조선일보사가 공동 주최한 2011 Apps100 Festival 의 수상작 입니다. 이제 학교, 집, 도서관만 다니자. 규칙적인 생활을 하고 있는지 으로 체크해보세요. 매시간 자신의 위치를 저장하여 평균적으로 몇시에 어디에 있는지를 맵위에 표시해 줍니다. 특정 위치를 다른이름으로 저장하여 사용가능합니다. (예) 도서관, 집 등 도서관 다니기 뿐만아니라 헬스장 다니기 지각하지 않기 등으로 응용해 보세요 ---- 개발자 연락처 : lis2012@lis2012.com

description: All news, blogs and social media feeds in one simple interface. Choose your topics, media, social networks, and blogs or just pick the editor’s choice. Read publications in Anews or go straight to the original source. Handy navigation mechanics allows you to slide the media sources and topics as well as comment, like and share articles with your friends in Facebook, VK, Twitter and via email. Don’t waste your time opening multiple services and websites – get the information you need in one place.

Twitch! Contacts Formatter is a Contact Number Editor and Formatter for the mildly OCD (and international travellers, or people who just like their contact numbers orderly formatted). Remember to press "SETTINGS" in app for more options. Features: ✔ Single click to standardize phone number format ✔ International & National formats ✔ Editable contact numbers ✔ Select particular numbers to update ✔ Skips invalid numbers ✔ Auto-detect country ✔ Update multiple contact sources Single Click to Standardize Phone Number Format Twitch is a great time saver; easily fixing all the numbers to a standardized and uniform format. Contact numbers are automatically displayed; all valid numbers that can be formatted are checked for you. You just confirm the selection, click update and sit back while the application do all the formatting magic. International & National Formats You can save in International or National formats. NATIONAL format standardizes all numbers to a uniform look and feel.. No arbitrary dashes '-' or spaces ' ' littered across your contact list. 800 1234567 (800) 123 45 67 800.123.4567 (eyelid *twitch*) 800 1234-567 (eyelid *twitch, twitch*) standardized format -> (800) 123-4567 Twitch uses Google's phone number formatting to customizes according to the countries' norm. E.g. US will be (xxx) xxx-xxxx; France will be xx xx xx xx xx. This app works for all countries. INTERNATIONAL format lets you call home from other countries (without manually appending the international calling code). International format -> +1-800-123-4567 Editable Contact Numbers Click on any number, and a dialog will appear for you to edit them individually To delete a number, just clear the edit dialog and click "OK". Select Particular Numbers to Update There is a global checkbox to untick all the numbers, so that you can manually select which number to save. skips invalid numbers The application leaves invalid numbers alone and shows a non-intrusive "!". you decide if you want to ignore the numbers or delete them (via the edit dialog). Auto-detect Country The application uses the country code of the SIM card in your device as the default country code. You can change this default from a drop-down menu (useful if you have contacts from many different countries, or if there are no SIM card in your device). Update Multiple Contact Sources Contacts from different sources with write access (Google contacts,contact numbers in the SIM card and the phone, Whatsapp contacts, Exchange ActiveSync contacts, etc) can be saved. Phone numbers linked to Google contacts are automatically synchronized with Google. Contact Me If this app is useful to you, please take a moment to give me a positive rating . Mail to: angelandroidapps@gmail.com "> angel.androidapps@gmail.com for any feature requests, bugs or general comments (to sooth your twitching OCD eyelids).
release_text: Ver G1.9 Google Api Updates ( libphonenumber-7.06, geocoder-2.22) (version 7.06) - Updated phone metadata for region code(s): BB, BR, CR, ID, IL, JO, KW, LK, LU, MD, MM, MV, MY, PH, PK, SC, SE - Updated short number metadata for region code(s): BE, LK, US - Updated carrier data for country calling code(s): 60 (en), 63 (en), 92 (en), 94 (en), 95 (en), 248 (en), 373 (en), 960 (en), 972 (en), 1246 (en)

description: ▪►▪► ANIMAL SOUNDS ◄▪◄▪ ✧ The Animal Sounds App—the most entertaining and educational soundboard app for Android devices! ✧ ♣ Children of all ages will enjoy the Animal Sounds app. Parents of young children will appreciate that in addition to being fun, the app can also teach or reinforce lessons they have already learned. Parents can play the sounds with their children. However, the app is so easy to use that children can learn by themselves. Since the Animal Sounds app runs on Android devices, the app can be enjoyed from just about anywhere. The Animal Sounds app is not only convenient, but it makes learning fun! ஜ There are close to 200 sounds in the Animal Sounds app. This incredible collection features 75 different animals grouped in the following categories: ♦Horses ▪Cats ♦Dogs ▪Zoo animals ♦Jungle animals ▪Farm animals With this many sounds, boredom is not an option! ✧♦✧ FEATURES ✧♦✧ ㋡ MASSIVE SOUND COLLECTION – Variety is the key to this soundboard app. The collection features animals that young children love, including horses, monkeys, frogs, and ducks! ♣ LIVELY IMAGES – The images in this app are vibrant and energetic—perfect for catching and holding the attention of young children! ➧ FUN NOTIFICATIONS – Forget boring alerts. If you really like an animal sound, you can save it as a notification on your Android device by simply pressing and holding its corresponding image. The notification is instantly saved! ▪ ▪ Download the Animal Sounds app today and add some fun entertainment to your Android device! ▪

C#Shell is an offline C# compiler that lets you dynamically compile and execute C# code on your Android device. Write programs on the go, test algorithms, explore the features of C# programming language or practice your C# skills. Note: A high-end device is recommended for optimal performance. The C#Shell compiler uses Mono Compiler Service. Most of the .NET Base Class Library is available and you can use such features as LINQ and Task Parallel Library (TPL), function programming is recommended. ---IMPORTANT--- Methods must be declared as parts of classes or structs, meaning a you cannot compile a 'void Main()...' directly, either make it a part of an object, or use anonymous methods or functions. e.g. Action myCoolMethod = new Action(()=>{ Console.WriteLine("Hello there!"); }); ---Features--- • Full-featured C# 4.0 Compiler • Draw graphics using CanvasUI • Native Android API • Load and execute compiled .NET assemblies (*.exe/*.dll) (cs.LoadAssembly) • Console IO • Support for saving / opening sessions. • View object properties • Visually construct methods • IO support • Network support • Multi-threading support • ARM , ARMv7 and x86 support. C#Shell is actively developed, and more features will be added in the near future, we're taking requests too. Contact us through our support site, as there is no way for me to respond to comments on Google Play. Icon by Michael Crabtree https://cshell.uservoice.com/
release_text: Changelog 2.0 - Android 5.0 and ART support - Mono 3.10.0 1.7 - Upgraded to latest Mono runtime - Minor fixes 1.6.2 - Support for editing executed code (the source code is re-compiled the next time the session is opened) - Chinese translations by Magic Mao 1.6.1 - Performance improvements - C#Shell Forum 1.6 - CanvasUI Android Canvas support - Custom assemblies are now shown in the namespaces list - Bug fixes and improvements - New samples

The information of the main Italian news agency, independent, reliable and timely.

akRDC - VNC viewer - Remote desktop control (Free version) If akRDC doesn't work for you, please ask for help through the “Send email" button in Google Play, we will certainly be able to resolve the problem. thank you. -> PRO Version : - Compressed files transfer stream - Compressed directory files list (with TightVNC server, akRDC PRO only) - Direct support. - No Ad -> The Free version displays an Advertisement at the application startup only. akRDC is a Remote Desktop Control software compatible with the RFB protocol (VNC Client) and tested on servers: TightVNC, UltraVNC, RealVNC (without encryption), Ubuntu Remote Desktop (servers ready with the RFB protocol...) * App languages: English, French, Russian, Italian, German, Espagnol, Japanese, Korean * Files Transfer (For TighVNC and UltraVNC servers only right now + X11VNC in Ultra VNC mode): - Transfer (download and upload) files and complete directories structure. - Compressed files transfer stream (akRDC PRO only). - Compressed directory files list (with TightVNC server, akRDC PRO only) - Create / Delete directories. - Delete files. * Supports UltraVNC repeater/proxy in mode 1 * Function keys: - connection shortcuts - 3 buttons mouse + wheel emulation (volume key) - keyboard, quick keys (CTRL+C, ...), - Esc (Back key) - special keys (F1, F2...), - Zoom - Drag&drop - network band optimization. - configuration Import / export - hardware acceleration management (if the remote session view become BLACK, you have to disable the hardware acceleration) * RFB Protocol implementation: - supports TIGH, RAW, COPYRECT, RRE, HEXTILE and ZRLE encodings. - VNC password (DES encrypted authentication). - MS-Logon authentication ( for UltraVNC server) How to use: install a VNC server (TightVNC recommended) on your PC, create a new connection shortcut in AKRDC then connect to your server. The documentation available on www.akrdc.eu To make the CTRL ALT DEL command works, run the VNC server as a service, and allow the CTRL ALT DEL feature in your system.
release_text: 2015 January 31th: - new 'Duplicate' button to clone a connection shortcut - Removed Ads from the Files Transfert activity !! - Bug fix 2014 December 23th: - UltraVNC: selecting automatically the first fixed drive - better error messages on low memory exception 2014 July 12th: Fixed: black screen on some devices Max zoom set to *5 2014 June 28th: Korea translation fixed some bugs 2014 June 15th: Targeting Android 14 Introducing action bars

description: Aplicativo mobile para assistir e baixar animes! Grátis! Agora ficou muita mais fácil acompanhar um anime, basta instalar nosso aplicativo. Os melhores animes dublado ou legendado tudo com ótima qualidade, fique também por dento dos Animes em Lançamentos, a cada semana uma nova emoção, não perca mais tempo, instale e se divirta! **** Antes de qualificar o aplicativo leia com atenção os requisitos e recomendações **** **** Qualifiquem o aplicativo com sabedoria, o mesmo é grátis e pode ficar melhor, é só incentivar **** # Requisitos: * É necessário no mínimo versão 2.2 do Android. * Resolução de tela de no mínimo 320x480px . * Reprodutor de MP4 * Wi-fi ou 3G # Recomendações * Utilize sempre seu aparelho o mais próximo possível de seu roteador. * Evite usar o Wi-fi em lugares com barreiras, principalmente vidros e espelhos. # Aparelhos Suportados: * Celulares com versão android maior ou igual a 2.2 * SmartPhones * Tablets * Smart Tv # Sem suporte * Galaxy Y * Sistemas Android inferiores a versão 2.2 * Aparelhos com tela inferior a 320x480px. Mobile app to watch and download anime! Free! Now it's much easier to follow an anime, just install our app. The best anime dubbed or subtitled everything with great quality, also stand by dento of Anime Releases on, every week a new emotion, do not waste more time, install and enjoy! Before **** qualify the application carefully read the requirements and recommendations **** **** Qualify the application wisely, it is free and you can get better, it's just encouraging **** # Requirements: * You need at least version 2.2 of Android. * Screen resolution of at least 320x480px screen. * MP4 Player * Wi-fi or 3G # Recommendations * Always use your device as close as possible to your router. * Avoid using the Wi-fi in places with barriers, especially glass and mirrors. # Supported devices: * Phones with android version greater than or equal to 2.2 * SmartPhones * Tablets * Smart Tv # Not supported * Galaxy Y * Android Systems inferior version 2.2 * Units with less than 320x480px screen.

Weather 14 days provides accurate and timely weather warnings and forecast for more than 20,000 locations in your country and 200,000 worldwide. It also provides information for ski stations. Hourly detailed forecast for today and tomorrow, detailed forecast every 3 hours during the rest of the week as well as a prediction for the next week. Very complete and easy application. Multiple weather variables are available: - Prediction symbol - Maximum temperatures, daily minimum and hourly current temperature and wind chill. - Wind speed and direction, including maximum gusts. - Expected rain. - Cloudiness - Snow line. - Relative humidity. - etc. It also provides additional relevant information as the sunrise/sunset and moon phase (including the moonrise/moonset and lighting rate) You can also check our animated prediction maps that provide precipitations, temperature, pressure, snow, etc.. besides from multiple satellite images and rain radar from Met Office. And you can also view a nationwide map of weather risk alerts easily interpretable according to risk level. In addition, you can add a weather widget to see your city forecast to five days directly on your device screen, with optional time and weather forecasting widget. This application is fully optimized for both smartphones and tablets.

Imágenes de amor para WhatsApp es una app con la que podrás disfrutar de una gran cantidad de imágenes de amor apropiadas para compartir por WhatsApp y otros servicios similares a la que podrás añadir un texto o seleccionar alguna de las buenísimas frases predefinidas y que encajarán a la perfección con las imágenes de amor. La aplicación de imágenes de amor permite ir visualizando las imágenes para terminar seleccionando la que más nos guste y añadirle finalmente si queremos un texto que tú mismo quieras crear o seleccionar alguna de las frases que vienen ya con la aplicación. Una vez creada nuestra imágen de amor podremos compartirla con alguno de nuestros contactos o en algún grupo sorprendiéndolos gratamente. Lo más común será que utilices las creaciones realizadas con esta estupenda aplicación para sorprender a tu pareja o esa persona que tanto te gusta. Además de en WhatsApp, podremos compartir nuestras imágenes a través de otros servicios de mensajería como Telgram, Line y similares además de las redes sociales de siempre como Facebook y Twitter. Cabe destacar que todas la imágenes de amor tienen el tamaño justo e ideal para que se vean en WhatsApp correctamente y no como ocurre con otras aplicaciones similares que muestran las imágenes distorsionadas. Images of love for WhatsApp is an app which allows you to enjoy a lot of pictures of love appropriate to share for WhatsApp and other similar services to which you can add a text or select one of the predefined phrases BUENISIMAS and fit to perfectly with the images of love. The application allows images of love images scroll to finish selecting the ones you like and finally add a text if we want to create it yourself or choose one of the phrases that come with the application. Once created our image of love we can share it with any of your contacts or any group pleasantly surprising them. The most common is to use the creations made with this great application to surprise your partner or the person that you like. In addition to WhatsApp, we can share our images through other messaging services like Telgram, Line, and the like in addition to the usual social networks like Facebook and Twitter. Note that all the images of love and have the right to make them look great in WhatsApp properly size and not like other similar apps showing distorted images.

Fantastic sound guide of about three hundred birds, where you can hear the birds singing and you will find a very full records of each of them. On each card describes the characteristics of each bird, behavior, reproduction, feeding, habitat and geographic distribution. Ideal for birdwatchers and ornithologists...
release_text: -fixed some bugs -fixed search option -Added new search option -fixed download error with a new server

description: 1200 adet gazete, dergi ve siteyi tek bir platformda topladık. Gazete, dergi ve siteleri, kategorilere ayrılmış şekilde görebilir, sadece görmek istediğiniz yayınlar arasında gezinerek, farklı yayın organları arasında dilediğiniz bilgilere ulaşabilirsiniz. Dilediğiniz yayınları favorilerinize ekleyerek kolayca ulaşabilir ve takip edebilirsiniz. 1200 newspapers, magazines and collected in a single platform site. Newspapers, magazines and websites, may be divided into categories, I just want to see the publications to cycle through the available information in any of the different organs. You can easily reach by adding your favorites and can follow the desired material.
release_text: Favoriler ekranı açılış haline getirildi ve her listeye arama özelliğinin kazandırılmasının yanında, favori seçeneklerine tüm yayın arama seçeneği eklendi. Burada yukarıya yazdığınızı içeren gazete, dergi veya haber sitesi ayırt edilmeden tüm yayınlar listelenecektir. Yayınların gazete mi, dergi mi yoksa haber sitesi mi olduğunu sağ tarafındaki ikon göstermektedir. Dilersenin filtreleme yaptığınız yayınları buradan da favorilerinize ekleyebilirsiniz.

description: “GMS” (GeoMessageService) software is designed for sending your location via SMS or Email. The software allows sending either simple coordinates values or the link to the map with the highlighted point. Maps, supported for map link sending: Yandex maps Google Maps Bing Maps Yahoo Maps OpenStreetMap Kosmosnimki Wikimapia ProGorod 2GIS The software can work in two modes: 1. With the Internet connected In this mode the main screen shows the map. Apart from locating coordinates with GPS, cell network base stations or manual input, it is possible for user to select the location with double-click on the map. 2. Without Internet connection. This mode has simplified interface and the map is not displayed on the main screen. Coordinates can be received either from GPS signal or through manual input. Coordinates are sent simply with a couple of clicks: you should choose the sending method (SMS or Email), select message recipients and press Send button. In addition, it is possible to edit coordinates and message text manually or choose the map that will show the point of your location. The software saves history, which allows reducing the number of clicks for express message sending. It is only required to get the coordinates with any convenient method, click on the contact in history list and press Send. The software is designed for LiveGPSTracks.com travelers’ service with the support of Multimaps -mmaps.net You are welcome to send your questions, comments and proposals to support@LiveGPSTracks.com

Унылая остановка общественного транспорта. Дождь, мокро, холодно и мерзко. Когда же наконец придет долгожданный автобус? Программа «Spb Transport Online» поможет сохранить оптимизм даже в такой непростой ситуации - ведь вы будете точно знать, где находится тот автобус, который вы ждете. О программе С помощью GPS определяется ваше местоположение и выводится карта с ближайшим транспортом. Причем не маршруты или остановки - автобусы, трамваи и троллейбусы показываются на карте именно там, где они сейчас находятся. Подобное чудо (а иначе это и не назовешь) стало возможным, когда в Санкт-Петербурге запустился в работу портал общественного транспорта. Теперь практически на каждом автобусе стоит система мониторинга GLONASS и данные по местоположению транспорта доступны всем петербуржцам в реальном режиме времени. !!!Обращаем внимание:!!! 1. Приложение Spb Transport Online получает данные с государственного портала общественного транспорта Санкт-Петербурга и работает ТОЛЬКО в Санкт-Петербурге. 2. Портал уже несколько лет работает только в тестовом режиме. Далеко не все маршруты и отдельные транспортные средства оснащены GLONASS оборудованием. Так же наблюдаются перебои в работе и различные задержки при выводе местоположения. И от нас, как от разработчиков приложения, ничего не зависит. 3. Маршрутки - коммерческий транспорт и не отображаются на государственном портале. Поэтому добавить маршрутки в приложение нет возможности. 4. Единственная цель данного приложения - выводить на экран смартфона данные с портала. Абсолютно все действия и вычисления (местоположение транспорта, построение маршрутов, вывод времени прибытия) рассчитываются порталом. Если запрашиваемых Вами данных нет на портале (к которому мы не имеем отношения), в приложении их так же будет невозможно увидеть. 5. В связи с единственно возможной технологией получения данных от портала (в виде скриншотов экрана по размеру видимой области карты) на устройствах с большим разрешением экрана значки транспорта будут отображаться достаточно мелко. К сожалению, мы ничего не можем с этим сделать. 6. Так как мы не имеем отношения к порталу, Ваши отзывы никуда не передаются и не читаются сотрудниками портала. Хотите что-то улучшить в работе гос. портала? Пишите напрямую работникам портала. Адрес государственного портала комитета по транспорту г. Санкт-Петербурга: http://transport.orgp.spb.ru/Portal/transport/main Порядок работы После старта программы определяются GPS-координаты и карта позиционируется в том месте, где вы находитесь. Если же вы находитесь не в Санкт-Петербурге, то режим определения местоположения вам не пригодится - просто не включайте его, а если случайно включили, то выключить можно на странице настроек. Данные на карте обновляются при каждом перемещении карты, либо при нажатии кнопки «Обновить». На странице настроек можно выбрать и автоматическое обновление - в этом случае данные будут обновляться каждые 10 секунд. Если у вас возникли проблемы с корректной работой приложения: 1. Автор приложения не имеет отношения к гос-порталу общественного транспорта Санкт-Петербурга и не отвечает за качество работы портала. 2. Если вы не видите транспорт в приложении, то зайдите на сайт портала - а есть ли он там? Если там транспорт не виден, то значит у них что-то перестало работать. Скорее всего это временно, попробуйте позже. 3. Если на портале транспорт есть, а в программе не видно - проверьте Ваше соединение с интернет. 4. Проверьте включены ли настройки получения местоположения видов транспорта. 5. Если на портале транспорт есть, с интернетом все в порядке, нужные кнопки активны, а в программе все-равно не видно транспорт, то зайдите на наш форум: http://livegpstracks.com/forum/ и задайте свой вопрос в теме приложения. Или напишите свой вопрос в службу технической поддержки: support@livegpstracks.com О создателях Программа создана сотрудниками сервиса GPS/ГЛОНАСС Мониторинга LiveGPStracks.com при поддержке Mультикарт - mmaps.net Sad to public transport. Rain, wet, cold and disgusting. When it finally comes the long-awaited bus? Program «Spb Transport Online» will remain optimistic even in such a difficult situation - because you'll know exactly where the bus that you wait. About the program With GPS detects your location and displays map with the nearest transport. And do not stop or routes - buses, trams and trolley buses are shown on the map exactly where they are now. Such a miracle (otherwise it will not name) became possible when in St. Petersburg started a portal of public transport. Now, almost every bus stands and monitoring system GLONASS data by location transport available to all St Petersburg in real time. !!! Please note: !!! 1. Annex Spb Transport Online receives data from the State Portal of public transport in St. Petersburg and worked only in St. Petersburg. 2. The portal has several years of experience in the test mode. Not all the routes and certain vehicles equipped with GLONASS equipment. As well there are disruptions and delays in the derivation of the various locations. And from us as to the application developers do not depend. 3. Minibuses - commercial vehicles and are not displayed on the public portal. Therefore, add a minibus in the application there is no possibility. 4. The sole purpose of this application - display a smartphone data portal. Everything and calculations (location of transport, construction of routes, the output time of arrival) is calculated by the portal. If you request no data on the portal (to which we have no relationship), the application of the same will not be seen. 5. In view of the unique capabilities of the technology receive data from the portal (in the form of screenshots on the size of the visible area of ​​the map) on devices with higher resolution screen will display the icons of transport shallow enough. Unfortunately, there is nothing we can do about it. 6. Since we have no relationship to the portal, your comments will not be transmitted or read by the staff of the portal. Do you want to improve something in the state. portal? Write directly to employees of the portal. Address State Portal of the Transport Committee of St. Petersburg: http://transport.orgp.spb.ru/Portal/transport/main Operation After the start of the program are determined by GPS-coordinates and map positioned in the place where you are. If you are not in St. Petersburg, the positioning mode is not useful to you - just do not turn it on, and if you accidentally enabled, disable the settings on the page. The data on the map updated every move the map, or when you click "Update". On the settings page, you can choose to automatically update - in this case, the data will be updated every 10 seconds. If you have any problems with the operation of the program: 1. The author of the application is not related to the state of public transport portal of St. Petersburg and is not responsible for the quality of the portal. 2. If you do not see the trucks in the application, then log on to the website - and is it not there? If there is transport is not visible, it means that they have something stopped working. Most likely it is temporary, try again later. 3. If there is a portal of transportation, and the program is not visible - check your Internet connection. 4. Check whether the settings are included obtaining location modes. 5. If there is a portal of transportation, with the Internet all right, right buttons are active, and the program anyway can not see traffic, then go to our forum: http://livegpstracks.com/forum/ and ask your question in the subject line application. Or email your question to Customer Support: support@livegpstracks.com Creators                      The program was created by employees of service of GPS / GLONASS Monitoring LiveGPStracks.com supported by Multikart - mmaps.net
release_text: Полностью переделано меню Добавлено определение своего местоположения с отображением трека движения Добавлена прокрадка маршрута Добавлен поиск остановок рядом Исправлен поиск по номеру, содержащий буквы Добавлен аквабус Добавлено отображение транспорта на остановке с ориентировочным временем прибытия

description: Внимание! Сообщаем, что мы наконец-то опубликовали усовершенствованную версию АЕ2 - Древние империи. Гардарика. Прямая ссылка не работает, поэтому предлагаем найти ее по названию здесь же в Google play у того же разработчика. Новые свойства, измененный баланс, новые уровни, доступ к хранилищу из полторы сотни карт, редактор карт... Короче, находите и пробуйте!! Теперь про эту бесплатную оригинальную игру АЕ2RM. Управление сделано под старый кнопочный телефон, разобраться несложно... Отформатировано из java, поэтому только альбомная (положение телефона/планшета в руках) ориентация, ничего в настройках не меняем... При запуске просто нажимаете ПУСК в правом верхнем углу (там полоска меню) и все. Если полоска меню отсутствует, так бывает на некоторых телефонах/планшетах, то попробуйте кнопку СВОЙСТВА/ЛОКАЛЬНОЕ МЕНЮ на корпусе самого телефона/планшета. Единственное условие - только альбомная ориентация планшета/телефона, иначе будет глюк и она вылетит. Вообще не надо трогать настройки, это же андроид, он сам вытянет размеры. Если изменили настройки и игра не идет - снесите ее со своего устройства и заново установите. В случае если в игре случайно нажали КОНСОЛЬ, наберите команду gold и нажмите ok, Вы вернетесь обратно в игру. Подробное описание здесь (копируйте ссылку и вставьте в адресную строку браузера): http://projectd8.org/%D0%9E%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0_MIDP_%D0%B4%D0%BB%D1%8F_Android/%D0%9E%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5 Теперь про игровой процесс. 1) Клавиши 2,3,4,6 используются для движения курсора. Кнопкой 5 можно выбрать боевую единицу, после чего переместить ее кнопками 2,3,4,6 в нужное место (красным выделены доступные для хода ячейки местности), после чего кнопкой 5 снова сделать выбор завершающего действия (конец хода, удар, воскрешение, захват домика или замка, покупка из замка). Одна единица может ходить и атаковать в течение одного хода, за исключением катапульты - данная боевая единица или ходит или атакует. 2) Разные типы местности влияют на способности единиц к передвижению, атаке и защите. Например, горы добавляют боевым единицам защиту, но замедляют скорость передвижения. Когда Вы двигаете курсор на эти места, их особенности появляются внизу экрана. 3) Когда единица завершит движение, она сменит цвет на серый. Это означает, что единица не может быть использована снова до следующего Вашего хода. 4) Вы можете перемещать единицу только один раз за ход. Когда Вы закончите движение всех Ваших единиц, нажмите команду 5 и выберите "конец хода". 5) Если Вы случайно нажали в меню кнопку "консоль" - не беда, наберите словами латинского алфавита "gold" и нажмите ввод/ОК, Вы вернетесь в игру. 6) Вы можете посмотреть характеристики любой единицы, выбрав ее курсором и нажав клавишу 7. 7) Единицы становятся более сильными и защищенными, получая опыт в битвах. 8) Вы можете увидеть зону возможной атаки любой (в том числе чужой) единицы, наведя на нее курсор и нажава клавишу 0. Зона уберется, если Вы снова нажмете 0. 9) Вы можете немедленно сфокусировать курсор на Ваших командирах, нажав кнопку 9. 10) Чтобы атаковать вражескую единицу, поместите Вашу единицу на расстояние атаки (у всех, кроме лучника и катапульты - сверху, снизу, слева, справа от врага) и нажмите "атака". Если Вы на расстоянии атаки от нескольких врагов, выберите, какую единицу нужно атаковать. If the menu bar is missing, it happens on some phones / tablets, try to click Properties / local menu on the body of the phone / tablet. The only condition - only the landscape orientation of the tablet / phone, otherwise it will glitch and it will fly. Do not need to touch the settings, it's an android, he will pull sizes. If you change the settings and the game is not - carry it from your device and reinstall. If the game accidentally clicked the console, type the command gold and click ok, you are taken back to the game. Detailed description here (copy and paste the link into your browser): http://projectd8.org/%D0%9E%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%87%D0%BA%D0%B0_MIDP_%D0%B4%D0%BB%D1%8F_Android/%D0%9E%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5 Now, about the gameplay. 1) 2,3,4,6 keys are used to move the cursor. 5 button you can select units and then move it to 2,3,4,6 buttons to the right place (highlighted in red available for the course of the cell area), and then click again to choose 5 of the final action (end of stroke, stroke, resurrection, capture house or castle, the purchase of the castle). One unit may move or attack for one turn, with the exception of a catapult - this combat unit or walks or attacks. 2) Different types of terrain affect the ability of units to the movement, attack and defense. For example, mountain fighting units added protection, but slows movement speed. When you move the cursor to these places, their characteristics appear at the bottom of the screen. 3) When the unit completes the movement, it will change color to gray. This means that the unit can not be used again until your next move. 4) You can move the unit only once per turn. If you are at a distance from the attacks multiple enemies, choose which one to attack. The success of the attack is determined by the characteristics of units and terrain. 11) Immediately recommend to go to the settings and turn off the animation fight - it will save a lot of time. 12) Use a card, it is convenient. 13) Go through the entire campaign to develop the necessary skills and go to the very tasty - a fight (Old - Skirimish-mod) SilentKnight, really want to talk with you - accomplish your goal in a personal, please !!

e-Navigator is a mobile application developed to help students search for programme information on multiple pathways under the New Academic Structure. Students may easily access programme information from post-secondary institutions and other programmes based on their interests. Students will be able to know more about the study opportunities provided by institutions in Hong Kong and plan for their future studies. In addition, students may get access to updated information on the release of HKDSE Examination results (including relevant statistic information after the release of HKDSE Examination results). Functions: - Search for programme information across different local institutions and levels under NAS, including programmes from JUPAS, iPASS, Yi Jin Diploma programme and Qualifications Register - Provide specific search by Area of Study, Institution or Keyword - Access hyperlinks of various official webpages with details of individual programmes - Enter expected or actual HKDSE Examination results to refine the search for eligible programmes - Save previously searched programme information to bookmark for future access - Provide useful information of “Important Dates for S6 Students" in 2014 and “Contact List for Education and Advisory Organisations” - Share programme information by email - Update programme content regularly (subject to the latest information released by institutions)
release_text: What's new in this version v1.8.4: (Users are recommended to completely uninstall the old version before installing) - Provide latest programme information of 2014 - Provide "Past Admission Scores" of JUPAS programme in 2013 - Continuous update of programmes System Requirement:Android 2.3 up

description: Tired of using lookup tables? Try out EECON for looking up those factors. This app is designed to allow quick lookup of the F/A, F/P, and A/P factors and vice versa. Simply enter in the percentage (in fractional amount such as .1 for 10%), and then the number of periods, Finally hit calculate, and the app will give you a factor.

Do you like challenges? Then we challenge you to Draw everything with only "One touch" . This game will baffle your mind, for it is not always so easy to draw a shape without lifting the finger and without retracing the same line. Play this interesting game of drawing, and show if you really take challenges seriously. All you need to do is move your finger on the shape shown on your mobile screen. But don't forget to follow the rules! ✔ 6 amazing modes of gameplay! ✔ 600 levels to enjoy for hours in run! ✔ Addictive & Mind Baffling Game! ✔ No two shapes are same, each one comes with a unique level of difficulty! Follow the rules, draw the shapes, have a time of your life!! ● Play six different modes with 600 difficult & addictive levels in the game, but remember each one is as much challenging as the last one. ● Move your finger on the shape shown on your mobile screen. You will learn why elders said that one must not drift away from his path :P ● You must not lift your finger. Lifting the finger will end your game. Just keep moving it along the lines. These are just the basic rules, you will have to follow different set of rules in each game mode. 1. Warm Up - Play 100 different levels in the 'Warm up' mode. It will be easy just to get you into the groove! 2. Warm Up Timer – It will keep getting interesting with each mode. Rules are same as the previous one, you just need to beat the timer in the 'Warm Up Timer' mode. 3. Dots to Dots – In this mode you may think it is easier as the shape is already shown. But you'd just be fooling yourself if you thought it was easier! ;) 4. Deadly Dots – Finish the shown shape before the time runs out! So in a way 'Deadly Dots' is just like 'Dots to Dots' but DEADLY! You need to finish in time. 5. Double Trouble – Lets get a twist in the game, now you won't be tracing the shape just once. You will have to trace the Red line twice or your game will be over! Be clever, some paths are worth walking twice. ;) 6. Time Trouble – We all know time is an enemy! Even in the games that we enjoy so much! Although you need to beat the time once again, but stay assured it's going to be even more fun than any of the modes above! You will need to complete the shape while tracing the red line twice, just don't forget that the time is running out! Be fast or die! Get down on drawing, but remember it is not so easy to draw in 'One Touch'. It's addictive, challenging, & very much fun to play this game. It will never get old! NOTE: You can conveniently clear the levels with the help of In-app purchases of the game that allows you to buy hints & stop timer, ranging from $2.99 -$4.99. “Please don't leave negative remarks on this page. If you are not satisfied with our app, mail your reviews & suggestions to support@migital.com

description: OpenConnect is an SSL VPN client for Cisco AnyConnect and ocserv gateways. FEATURES - One-click connection (batch mode) - Supports RSA SecurID and TOTP software tokens - Keepalive feature to prevent unnecessary disconnections - Compatible with ARMv7, x86, and MIPS devices - No root required - 100% open source (GPLv2+); 100% free; no ads - Based on the popular OpenConnect Linux package REQUIREMENTS - An account on a suitable VPN server - Android 4.0 (ICS) or higher (with working VpnService + tun infrastructure) XDA thread and FAQ: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2616121 Source code: https://github.com/cernekee/ics-openconnect Please do not use the reviews to request features or report issues, as they do not provide a suitable forum for support. Please post your question in the XDA thread, file a bug report in the Github project, or email me directly at cernekee+oc@gmail.com .

description: Control your outgoing calls and possibility of any misuse of your phone with the password protected security feature. You can either choose to display a customized pop-up message when anyone tries to make a call or can disable the pop-up message as well so that no one will come to what is happening in the background. Your outgoing call feature will be disabled if you choose to, enable it when you want to make a call - all this very seamlessly and with very user friendly interface. Please rate the app and email me for feedback/suggestions.

description: If you want to save up enough money * to get out of debt * to buy a home * for early retirement * or all of the above! then this app may be able to help you. The Savings Diary app helps you keep track of all your decisions to save money instead of spending it. Like at coffee shops, on cigarettes, drinks or video games (and lots more categories). It keeps a diary file, stored only on your own device (not in the cloud or anywhere else), so that you can easily see how much you have saved so far, and the projections for what you'll have saved in 1 year, 10 years and 30 years if you kept saving at the same rate. The aim of this app is to get you into the habit of saving money everyday, solidify your finances and add to your freedom. For much more details about the app visit: http://gituser1357.github.io/savings-diary.html Source code available at https://github.com/gituser1357/savings-diary

Главное преимущество нашего приложения в том, что пользоваться им удобно, быстро и просто. Оно хорошо подходит как для студентов, школьников, так и для простого составления списка дел на день или неделю. Простота в том, что отсутствуют лишние функции. Пользователю предлагается выбрать фон, настроить стиль, размер и цвет шрифта. При включении автоматически открывается сегодняшний день. Таким образом, можно просмотреть расписание буквально в один клик. Есть базовая разметка на восемь пунктов, которую можно редактировать или совсем удалить. Интерфейс интуитивно простой, что опять же обеспечивает простоту и удобство в использовании. The main advantage of our application that use it conveniently, quickly and easily. It is well-suited for students, and for the preparation of simple to-do list for the day or week. Simplicity that there are no extra features. User is prompted to select the background, customize style, font size and color. When you turn on automatically opens today. Thus, you can view the schedule just a click. Is the basic layout for eight points, which can be edited or removed entirely. Intuitively simple interface, which again provides simplicity and ease of use.

DriveLink is a perfect app for safe, hands free in-vehicle services that really makes a difference in the driving. The app can either work as Standalone Mode, which is just launched in the smartphone, or as Connected Mode, which works by connecting to the car's headunit display via MirrorLink(TM). For the Connected Mode, the screen of the smartphone is mirrored to the head unit display. The app has been designed to conform to the safety regulation set by Automotive industry standard. The current version has the following features: - Welcome Screen: Context Awareness feature that allows to display the current location's weather information, Recently Played Music in the smartphone, Schedule info stored in Calendar app. If the schedule contains an address, the user can click the address to directly navigate to the destination - Music : User can listen to every music file stored in the smartphone. Also, DriveLink has other music sources such as Internet Radio. Currently, TuneIn and Radioclock App is available. - Phone: User can make a phone call, and send text messages. The app retrieves all contact information stored in the smartphone - Shortcut: User can create a shortcut for a specific contact, music, and location. Note: - To use MirrorLink(TM) service in car using USB, the head unit must support MirrorLink(TM) 1.0.1. - If MirrorLink(TM) service doesn't work in your smartphone, it is necessary to update a firmware. - Firmware update availability is depending on mobile operators.
release_text: Bug which is occured when you use magyar as default language is fixed.

description: To do list to save your to do list and do quick update. This is the simplest To Do list in android market! Nothing fancy, nothing complicated, just type in what's in your mind and click + button and you're done. When you're done shopping, click on the item and click clear and you're done! Simple and Easy! You take your phone everywhere you go, why not take the to do list with you?! Just open it up, wherever you are and tap on the list to update, delete and clear the list!

With the tellows App it is now possible to assess incoming call at first glance! For free! Rated about 500 times and downloaded nearly 70.000 times! Now we've successfully moved! Thanks to the tellows score the app displays the nature of the incoming call via a live sync to the tellows servers and you can decide whether to answer the phone or ignore the call. If the calling phone number has an official entry on tellows additional information like name and address will be shown. You may add these details to your contacts with one click. Furthermore, you can rate numbers, comment on them and, therewith, warn your fellow tellows users against potential dangers. The service is free. Features of version 2.0: - Rating of incoming calls via tellows score - Import of the caller’s address and name into your contacts - Instant Search for unknown numbers - Caller history of missed calls Short summary of our features: rate phone numbers; caller reverse lookup; tellows score; realtime lookup; find out who called you by name, adress and city; telephone directory; phone spam, telephone terror, protection

¡Con Tumpi todos podéis elegir la música de vuestras fiestas! Crea un Tumpi con tus canciones favoritas y deja que tus amigos voten cuales quieren escuchar. Ya no habrá más peleas a la hora de elegir la música de tu fiesta, con Tumpi sois vosotros los que decidís que música os apetece escuchar, en tan sólo unos segundos podrás seleccionar toda la música que quieras de tu móvil para crear un Tumpi, así como conectarte a un Tumpi en cualquier parte del mundo para votar que música te apetece que suene en una fiesta, bar o en cualquier parte! Tumpi ha sido creado por cinco amigos, totalmente gratis y libre de publicidad. ¡Esperamos que la disfrutes tanto como nosotros! Tumpi está en fase de pruebas, si tienes alguna sugerencia no dudes en dejarnos un comentario o mandarnos un correo a dev@tumpi.net Si quieres saber mas, o descargarte la aplicación para escritorio gratis, entra en www.tumpi.net With Tumpi all the music you can choose your parties! Creates a Tumpi with your favorite songs and let your friends who want to hear vote. No more fights when choosing your party music, with Tumpi you who decide that you want to hear music, in just a few seconds, you can select the music you want from your mobile to create a Tumpi well as a Tumpi connect anywhere in the world to vote that you fancy sounding music at a party, bar or anywhere else! Tumpi was created by five friends, totally free of charge and free of advertising. Hope you enjoy it as much as us! Tumpi is in the testing phase, if you have any suggestions please leave a comment or send an email to dev@tumpi.net If you want to know more, or download the free desktop application, enters www.tumpi.net
