description: This application is designed to calculate the amount of water needed to mash a given volume of grain for home brewed beer. It also figures the amount of wort first runnings that will be produced. The numbers for qts water/lb of grain and water absorbtion can be changed if the defaults do not work for you.
release_text: Correctly has AppBrewers.com as the publisher

description: SaniCalc calculates the amount of Chlorine Bleach, Iodophor or Star San to make a sanitizing solution for a given volume of water. It will calculate in gallons and ounces or Liters and Milliliters, or any combination thereof. Originally designed for Home Brewers but it will work for anyone.
release_text: Correctly has AppBrewers.com as the publisher

description: Do you have classes where the instructor hates to hear a cell phone ring? Meetings you don't want interrupted by unwanted calls? A job where you cannot receive calls? Do you spend part of your day in a dead zone and run down your battery if you forget to turn off your phone? Then Time Out is for you. Time Out lets you stop worrying that your phone is going to ring during meetings, classes or work! Simply schedule when you want your phone to Time Out, and it will automatically enter airplane mode and not be able to receive calls, and then schedule the Time In for when you want to receive calls again. You can schedule an unlimited number of Time Out and Time In events so no matter how complicated your schedule is, Time Out will work for you! Time Out automatically senses if you use a 12 hour clock with AM and PM - or a 24 hr. clock. Times can be set by spinner, or + and - buttons as you prefer. Any schedule is possible for any time event pair, e.g., "Mon - Tue - Fri from 10 to 10:50" is set as one event pair easily and quickly. It only takes one short click to edit the event, so you can change the times, add days - whatever you need. AND you can have an unlimited number of events. No longer need the event? One long click deletes it - don't worry - it's just that simple to put it back if you make a mistake. If you have an unexpected meeting or just need an hour to yourself hit the free bundled widget and voila you are in airplane mode for one hour. After the hour is up you automatically go back to receiving calls. Try Time Out - it’s simple to use, does one thing very well.
release_text: Now runs as foreground task to prevent Android OS from unloading it and preventing scheduled events from running.

description: CPS Cellular Parking System - Register as a new user in the CPS system. - Consult and/or locate CityParking lots near to your current map location. - Access to detail information of CityParking’s each lot location such as: name, direction, space available on real time, service schedule and email. - Pay for parking time at the CityParking locations using our built-in prepaid virtual wallet. - Manage your account balance, recharge your account using a credit/debit card to make a payment or to transfer balance between CPS accounts. - Payment and recharge history reports on our website www.cpsparking.co. - Among there are other features that you will find in the application

Spelling Bee is the ultimate application to learn and master spellings in English. It is ideal for students of all ages & levels, from elementary to those aspiring to go to National Spelling Bee contests. Major features include - * Unlimited number of words backed by major online dictionaries. * Audio provided by major online dictionaries like American Heritage & Macmillan. * Configurable word length and complexity to suit every level. * Multiple tracks for time tracked routine Practice and Test. * Ability to save results for future reference and to track progress. * Ability to share results with your family & friends by social media(email, facebook, twitter & Google+). TIPS - 1. Use of headphones increases the audio performance significantly. 2. Use a quiet place when playing this game as it will require your attention to hear and understand the word being pronounced. 3. If words being asked seem too difficult or too easy, adjust the word settings in the "Settings" section. 4. The pronunciation is in US English.
release_text: - Major revision (2.0) with completely new UI and many other usability features. - Version 2.1 has a fix for an endless loop when navigating between results and home screen.

description: Drehe an den dreidimensionalen Zutatenrädern, um passende Cocktails zu finden, oder lass den Zufall entscheiden. Blättere mit Wischgesten durch das Cocktailbuch mit den Rezepten. Einzelne Cocktails lassen sich direkt im Inhaltsverzeichnis anwählen. Erstelle eigene Rezepte und synchronisiere die Cocktails mit deinem Cocktailbuch auf www.applage.de Erhalte regelmäßig neue Cocktails. Teile deine eigenen Cocktails auch mit anderen Usern. Freunde, die sich einen Account teilen, können ein gemeinsames Cocktailbuch verwalten. Versionshistorie: 1.97: -Bugfixes für ältere Geräte -5 neue Cocktails 1.96: -verbessertes Error-Handling 1.95: -Cocktails können direkt im Inhaltsverzeichnis ausgewählt werden. -Bugfixes -Diverse UI Verbesserungen 1.94: -neue Wischgesten zur Steuerung -mehr Cocktails -Ladeanzeige 1.93: -einige Fehler entfernt 1.92: -Crashlytics hinzugefügt, um detailliertere Fehlerberichte zu erhalten 1.91: neue Cocktails und ein Bugfix 1.9: -Usercocktails können direkt runtergeladen werden. (Werden mit einem * gekennzeichnet) -kleinere Verbesserungen 1.8: -Registrierung auf Honeycombgeräten repariert (Danke für den Hinweis) 1.6 & 1.7: -Rezepte aktualisiert 1.5: -Bugfixes -Mehr Cocktails 1.4: -Bessere Gesamtperformance -mehr Information durch Ladebalken 1.3: -Bugfixes 1.2: -neue Cocktails -Optimierungen -App komplett beenden mit dem Zurückknopf -Milch/Sahne anstatt Bananensaft als Unterkategorie -Mehrseitiges vorwärts blättern Turn to the three-dimensional ingredients wheels to find matching cocktails, or let chance decide. Famous heroes decided to put their daily duties aside and have some fun playing football. Isn't it funny to see Ironpants being chased by Exterminator, or Discopants scoring and singing his favorite victory song? Well, it's not a dream, it's a dream come true. Everyone wants to become the world champion, but there is only one spot. Who can it be? Football Blitz 1 vs 1 football game features well know and legendary Ironpants with his friends: Chickenpants, Bananapants, Cutiepants, Discopants, Exterminator. Football Blitz has three modes: 1. Quick Match 2. World Cup 3. Multiplayer (2 players on the same device) 3d graphics, cool heroes, funny animations make Football Blitz more attractive and fun to play. Important note: devices with multitouch enabled are needed for full game experience.

Play Tic-Tac-Toe on your phone. This is a simple game, who takes turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. Tic-tac-toe is for one player and two players represented by X and O. The player who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. Tic-Tac-Toe game allows you to play with AI (Computer/Phone), refined graphics design and smart AI to challenge, also you can play against your partner in a 2 player mode. This game is fun to play with your friend when you are looking for something fun to do. This Tic-Tac-Toe contains: • V/s AI - One player mode that play with AI. This mode includes three difficulty levels, Easy, Medium and Hard, so you can play against a computer player that matches your skill level. • V/s Player - Play Against your friend. • Local Score Board Tic-Tac-Toe is a great way to pass the time, whether you're standing in line or spending time with the kids.

Angry Granny Run Escape Angry Granny lost her home and she is left with lots of adventures to do to reach home. Granny is running to reach home. Help her to reach home. Features of Angry Granny Run Escape * Cool graphics * Good background sounds * Local 10 high scores * Game becomes more Challenging as you keep running. Will you be able to help granny to reach her home ?

Back to your childhood for a while with this ZX Spectrum app! Spectrumize your favorite images (full version) or enjoy watching the screenshot load of the images in the gallery included (all versions). Share your spectrumized image on Facebook, Google+, etc. Real load images and sounds, and many great enhancements! Double Tap to Share picture in your favorite social network (Facebook/G+/Gmail) and to access Wallpaper options! Once the LW starts, shake the phone to activate it. When the image is loaded, shake it again to spetrumize another image. Shake hardness can be configured in the options menu. Options included in all versions: ★ Orientation (Auto-rotate/landscape/portrait) ★ Shake hardness (from hardest mode "Barbarian" to the easiest "Target: renegade") ★ Enabling load sound ★ Screen zoom Options only available in the full version: * Select your own imagen to spectrumize * Disable or enable the ZX Museum (gallery) * Extended gallery, enjoy new images not available in the lite version * Select special color schemes for the load mode IMPORTANT: According to memory conditions,it may not be able to set normally. In that case, please restart your portable terminal and set it again. Setting method:home screen>menu>Wallpaper>Live Wallpaper By downloading this app, you agree to the EULA at http://www.apptwoyou.com/eula Keep Sending your feedback and suggestions to apptwoyou@gmail.com

description: New release of Meeting Tracker - better design, more resolutions and improved stability! Schedule your planned and recurring meetings, start a meeting in just two clicks, track meeting minutes – text notes, record audio and video clips; upload you meeting online and generate a PDF file. Take a picture from a whiteboard with your camera, attach an image from a gallery, record reporter speech with your camera or microphone, add any text notes. Have no time to create meeting notes document? Meeting Tracker will do it for you in one click and will also send notification to all participants. Collaborate with your colleagues using meeting blog on Web. Features: * plan single or recurrent meetings * add participants from your contacts * set up meeting reminders * take meeting notes using text, photo, video and audio recording * publish meeting notes on the Web including media content in Picasa, YouTube and SoundCloud * e-mail notification with meeting minutes blog link on web to other participants * generate meeting notes as a PDF file and email it to all participants NB! This application uses standard voice recording and gallery apps for adding media files to the meetings. If those apps are removed or replaced on your device (e.g. custom firmware installed), it may well be possible that you won't be able to add audio, photo or video files. Please contact us if you have any troubles with Meeting Tracker on your device. Known issues: - unable to upload big files (size depends on device memory) - unable to record audio content for topics on google nexus 7 & 10 (known nexus issue)
release_text: Minor bug fix. Add new admob library.

description: This is a simple application that will show you what you should eat to burn excess fat in your body whether you are a man or woman. You can keep track of your steps to see the evolution of progress. Food programs shown are based on nutrition basics, and if followed regularly fat loss is guaranteed without sacrificing muscle mass. No adds. Units are in international standard (Kg, meters) or US standard (Lb, feet-inches) For any questions, feedback, review or recommendation, email me: linares.apps@gmail.com

Important Note: Only for use with Theme Chooser / Theme Engine. A custom rooted ROM with Theme Engine / Chooser is required to run this application. If you do not understand these terms, this application is not for you. #1 Top New Selling Apps - Personalization - Play Store #8 Top Selling New Apps - Play Store #9 Top Grossing - Personalization - Play Store ~ 3rd Week of June - 1 week since release Fi - The first CM11/PA theme in the world to have an inbuilt color chooser. Fi's color changing ability operates through it's beautiful new application. As soon as you fire it up, you're presented with a clean and bold menu which guides you through 3 different options at the moment as you can see in the first frame of the promo image. By clicking on Choose Themes, you can select the various color options available at that moment. This release has brought the new Blue variant - A very subtle blue which doesn't pop-out too much. A new coming soon card would always be visible in the theme chooser menu to let you know about what color is coming up next. Color/Theme Preview windows have a small blimp on the top right corner of the preview image which indicate the selected theme's accent color. In this image, you can see the blue used in Fi's new color variant. Facade Interface (Fi) is a one of a kind theme which follows a Flat UI Design Language. Fi is made to provide you a great user experience. Fi's main design objective was to theme/craft everything which is seen by the user every time the device is used, therefore Fi provides a great experience through it's features like the custom high-quality lockscreen look, sweet navigation bar buttons & much more. What makes Fi unique is that Fi's main theme color (Initial Release: Carroty-Red) would keep changing every month through a theme update which would keep things exciting, stopping you from getting bored of your phone. The color would change on the 11th day of the month as Fi was released on the 11th of June. Fi's attention to detail would amaze you - Each and every themed element was carefully examined before release on various devices. description: Important Note: Only for use with Theme Chooser / Theme Engine. A custom rooted ROM with Theme Engine / Chooser is required to run this application. If you do not understand these terms and they just go over your head, this application is not for you. Nue follows a Flat-lined UI - Monotone Design Language. Aimed to provide a great user experience, Nue was designed keeping in mind the ability of the human eye - It was made sure that the colors were not too saturated/strong making even the unusual themed elements look subtle. Nue is available in 5 different colors - The Original Carribean Green, Fi Red, Qua Blue, Air White & Ora Orange. The attention to detail gone into Nue is incredible. Each and every draw (themed elements) was carefully analyzed on 4 different screens in order to get the perfect color, sharpness & anti-aliasing qualities. Having various elements, Nue had to be properly coded & of course designed. Nue is optimized for XXHDPI & XHDPI devices. To know your screen density, you could go to: http://goo.gl/alcpMv IMPORTANT: Those who uses a device with 512mb or less RAM, I recommend NOT applying the bootanimation. Also, recently all the ROMs Hard-Coded Quick Settings and Status Bar Battery Icons - Therefore this theme DOES NOT include those icons. Also, All ROMs hardcoded the battery tile (Normal aosp behavior) therefore editing it for QS is impossible using the new theme chooser framework - PA will soon be rewriting it to make it themeable.﻿ Nue Includes: Nue Wallpapers (Default & Lockscreen) Nue Tones (Nue 'Crafted Ringtone, Notification Tone & Alarm Tone) Fi/Nue Navigation Bar Dot-Icons (Minimalistic Dot Navbar Items with State Changes - Perfectly matching the theme) Nue Custom Lockscreen Nue/Layars Bootanimation Nue Custom Google Keyboard Skin Nue Slim Fonts Themed Items: Holo Dark & Holo Light Values Quick Settings Icons Settings Icons (PA, CM11) Notification Backgrounds Glowdots (Lockscreen, Google Now Swipe Up) Action Bars Flat Action Bars (Dark & Light) Buttons & Checkboxes (Buttons, Radio Buttons, Checkboxes, Scrubber Tabs) Navigation Bar Glow (Flat, No Shadow) Notification Panel (Dark - Caribbean Green Elements) Custom Switches Dialog Windows Alert Windows List Views Lockscreen Layers (Player Background) Menu Windows/Lists/Dropdowns Progress Bars (Caribbean Green) Scrubbers (Caribbean Green) Rating Stars (Caribbean Green) Keyboard Text Handlers Toast Frame Calculator UI Appwidget Settings Gmail Widget Header (Concept Blue) Google Quick Search Toast Frame Easter Egg! description: Webbooがお届けする同性交流アプリの中でももっとも賑わいのある、レズビアン専用交流アプリです。 主婦レズさんやＶ系・ＢＬ・腐女子さんも多数参加するとてもオープンなコミュニティーアプリとなっています。 基本的にはレズビアン同士の出会いの機会をご提供するアプリケーションですが、真正やガチ、百合じゃなきゃとか制約はありませんよ。 LGBTユーザー向けの出会いアプリを運営するハニーアップが、会員登録しないでも利用できる無料アプリとして開放する、レズビアン出会いアプリです。 このアプリでは、レズビアンかもしれない！と妄想した程度でも経験のある女性が、同性のお友達を探したり、恋人募集をすることができます。

Diese App ermöglicht die Erfassung von Arbeits-, Pausen- und Freizeiten. Sie ist speziell für alle geeignet, die regelmäßig in geteilten Schichten arbeiten(Köche, Servicepersonal o. ä.) und Stundenhefte führen müssen. Es enthält momentan drei Arbeitszeitmodelle: - pauschale Monatsstunden sehr einfaches Modell zum reinen erfassen der Arbeitstunden, ohne Berechnung - die 7-Tage-Woche für die Berechnung der Zeiten habe ich mich am Gesamtarbeitsvertrag des Schweizer Gastgewerbes ( L-GAV ) orientiert bei Urlaub müssen auch die Wochenendtage mit als Urlaubstag markiert werden Feirtage, Urlaubstage, Krankentage usw. werden von den Sollstunden abgezogen - die 6-Tage-Woche es werden nur Arbeitstage ( Mo. - Sa. ) zur Berechnung der Sollstunden berücksichtigt und So. als Freier Tag markiert bei Urlaub werden nur die Arbeitstage ( Mo. - Sa. ) als Urlaubstag markiert und gezählt Feirtage, Urlaubstage, Krankentage usw. werden von den Sollstunden abgezogen - die 5-Tage-Woche es werden nur Arbeitstage ( Mo. - Fr. ) zur Berechnung der Sollstunden berücksichtigt und Sa., So. als Freier Tag markiert bei Urlaub werden nur die Arbeitstage ( Mo. - Fr. ) als Urlaubstag markiert und gezählt Feirtage, Urlaubstage, Krankentage usw. werden von den Sollstunden abgezogen Funktionen: - Verwaltung von Arbeitszeiten mehrerer Arbeitsplätze - Erfassen von Arbeitsstunden und Freizeiten in zwei Teilschichten pro Arbeitstag - Erfassen von Einsatzort, Spesen, gefahrene Strecken und Tagesnotizen ( alles abwählbar ) - eintragen bezahlter Überstunden ( optional ) - wöchentliche, monatliche und jährliche Zusammenfassungen - Speichern und Versand dieser Zusammenfassungen als CSV-Datei oder als PDF-Datei - Sicherung der Datenbank im Telefonspeicher/ auf der SD-Karte Zum erzeugen der PDF-Dateien wird die Open Source Variante von "PDFjet" (www.pdfjet.com) verwendet. Danke an Freepik.com & dr. Web für die Human Pictos. Benötigte Rechte. - Schreiben von Dateien zum Speichern der Monatsberichte und der Datenbanksicherungen Diese App zeigt keine Werbung. Bitte beachten Sie, das ich keine Haftung für das korrekte funktionieren der Software oder die eingegebenen/berechneten Zeiten übernehme. Bitte bei Fehlfunktionen oder anderen Merkwürdigkeiten bei mir melden, ich werde eine Lösung suchen. Für eine schlechte Bewertung ist dann immer noch Zeit. This app allows the capture of work, rest and free time. It is especially suitable for those who have to work in divided layers (cooks, service personnel o. Ä.) And hours booklets a regular basis. It currently contains three working models: - Flat-rate monthly hours     very simple model to capture the pure working hours, no charge - The 7-day week     for calculating the times I was on the collective bargaining agreement     of Swiss hospitality (L-GAV) oriented     holiday at the weekend days must be marked with a vacation day     Feirtage, vacation, sick days, etc. are deducted from the target hours - The 6-day week     only working days (Mon - Fri) will be taken into account for the calculation of planned hours     marked and Sunday as Free Day     Holidays in only the working days (Mon - Fri) will be tagged as holiday and counted     Feirtage, vacation, sick days, etc. are deducted from the target hours - 5-day work week     There are only working days (Monday - Friday) considered to calculate the target hours     and Sat., Sun. marked as Free Day     Holidays in only the working days (Mon - Fri) will be marked as vacation and counted     Feirtage, vacation, sick days, etc. are deducted from the target hours Functions: - Management of working hours of multiple jobs - Acquisition of hours of work and leisure time into two sub-layers per working day - Capturing of use, expenses, traveled routes and daily notes (all preset) - Add paid overtime (optional) - Weekly, monthly and annual summaries - Storing and shipping of these summaries as a CSV file or as a PDF file - Backup of the database in the phone memory / SD card To generate the PDF files, the open source version of "PDFjet" (www.pdfjet.com) is used. Thanks to Freepik.com & dr. Web for human Pictos. Required privileges. - Write files to store the monthly reports and database backups This app is not advertising. Please note that I am not responsible for the proper functioning of the software or the data entered / calculated times. Please event of malfunction or other oddities contact me, I will find a solution. For a bad review then is still time.

description: ★注意事項 Android4.0では動作確認できていません。 -------------------- 毎日楽しく過ごしたい？ Everyday happy♥は、女子の毎日を応援するシンプルなアプリです。 日替わりで表示される今日の運勢では、女子なら気になる恋愛運、ラッキーカラーやナンバーも確認できます。Yahoo!、楽天woman、MSN占いの中から、その日のベストな占いを表示することができます。 また、体調管理に役立つ次回の生理予定日や排卵予定日の表示に加えて、ホルモンバランスによるお肌の調子やダイエットに効果的な時期もお知らせします。 自分と上手に向き合って、happyな毎日を過ごしましょう♪ ※スクリーンショットは有料版のものです。 -------------------- ★無料版と有料版の違い 違いは広告表示の有無のみで、機能は全く同じです。広告表示が気にならない方は、無料版をご利用ください。 ★最近の変更点 Ver 1.1.27［2012.06.29 UP］ ・一部の占いが表示されない問題に対応 Ver 1.1.26［2012.04.20 UP］ ・体調メッセージを地味に追加 Ver 1.1.25［2012.03.21 UP］ ・軽微なバグ修正 ※最新版にバージョンアップする際には、ウィジェットを再作成してください。Otherwise, 正しく動作しない場合があります。 ★今後の対応予定 ・体調に表示されるメッセージを継続的に増量予定 ・季節で変わる背景テーマも検討中 ★ご意見・ご要望 レビューやメールにて、お気軽にご意見・ご要望等いただければ幸いです。継続的に改善することで、より良いアプリをご提供できたらと考えております。

Your phone might be peeked by others? Ever wondered if someone is peeking on your Android device? If so, try the Gotcha app. Gotcha allows you to detect if your device has been secretly peeked at by others. The app will let you know if your device was lifted or what applications were launched on your device. Gotcha features 12 hours of surveillance logs with each log can keep up to 100 events. - Identify which applications were launched on your device - Detect the movement of your Android device - Record up to 12 hours of surveillance logs - Keep 100 event logs for each surveillance log - Save up to 3 recorded surveillance logs -------------------- ◆ChangeLog Ver 1.3.24［04/15/2013 UP］ -Available on OS 4.1 Ver 1.3.23［05/18/2012 UP］ -Fixed a minor bug Ver 1.3.22［05/04/2012 UP］ -Changed the application icon

Your phone might be peeked by others? Ever wondered if someone is peeking on your Android device? If so, try the Gotcha Lite app. Gotcha Lite allows you to detect if your device has been secretly peeked at by others. The app will let you know if your device was lifted or if an application was launched from your device. Gotcha features 12 hours of surveillance logs with each log can keep up to 100 events. Upgrade to the full version to utilize the following features: - Identify which applications were launched on your device - Save up to three recorded surveillance logs Please note that this app is ad-supported. - Detect the movement of your Android device - Record up to 12 hours of surveillance logs - Keep 100 event logs for each surveillance log *Screenshots of the paid version are posted for this page. -------------------- ◆ChangeLog Ver 1.3.24［04/15/2013 UP］ -Available on OS 4.1 Ver 1.3.23［05/18/2012 UP］ -Fixed a minor bug Ver 1.3.22［05/04/2012 UP］ -Changed tha application icon Ver 1.3.21［04/18/2012 UP］ -Fixed a bug of application logs

Program ten, stworzony przez wędkarza dla wędkarzy, posiada również możliwość dodawania zdjęć oraz pobierania danych GPS łowisk, a następnie ich późniejsze odszukiwanie na mapie. Program Asystent wędkarski jest darmowy i nie zawiera żadnych reklam! Ze względu na wczesną wersję możliwe jest pojawienie się błędów, za których zgłoszenie będę bardzo wdzięczny. Wszystkie uwagi oraz propozycje proszę kierować pod adres: asystentwedkarski@gmail.com . Fishing Assistant is a program for recording fisheries, lures and caught fish. This program, created by anglers for anglers, it also has the ability to add photos and GPS data collection fisheries and their subsequent retrieval of the map. Fishing Assistant is free and contains no advertising! Due to an early version it is possible the emergence of errors, for which the application will be very grateful. All comments and suggestions please send to: asystentwedkarski@gmail.com .

description: Events from LinzTermine, Hotspots and other Points of Interests (POIs) for sightseeing are always and quickly accessable. LinzInfo uses freely available data from the „Linz Open Data” website to show Linz specific information for people from Linz and people visiting the city. All data will be shown on the integrated map. There is a dedicated page to list current events from the www.linztermine.at website. Events can be shown for today, till tomorrow or the whole week. These will be sorted by date and time and can be filtered according predefined categories. Using the map button it is really easy to quickly navigate form the list view to the map view. Using LinzInfo you are always capable to find dedicated locations from you current position. This is especially useful for people visiting the city to have a personal digital city guide. Currently the following types of data sets are supported: Datatypes support * Linz city events * Hotspots * Pharmacies * Hospitals * Event locations * Playgrounds * Sport facilities * Kindergarden * Youth centers * Elderly centers * Krabbelstuben * Club Aktiv Summary * Map view * List view * Filter data on list view * Copy Linz Termine event to your calendar * Easy Navigation via Google Latitude * Support for many city Linz data types * ... Linz Info uses data of the „Linz Open Data“ project( Data source: CC-BY-3.0: Stadt Linz - data.linz.gv.at) License: Open Commons Region Linz http://www.data.linz.gv.at/ E-Mail: open.commons@linz.at Open Commons Region Linz Magistrat Linz Gruberstr. 42 4020 Linz
release_text: * Fixed the position coordinates of some locations * Added list view for point of interests * Better icon integration * Better support for Android 1.6 - 2.1 * New POIs added * Sub categories can be selected as well * Linz Termine events can be inserted into the Calendar application * Filter functionality for list view of POIs and Linz Termine * Improved details view of Linz Termine

description: Mjam – Einfach und bequem online Essen bestellen. Egal ob Pizza, Sushi, Burger, Schnitzel oder Asiatisch – dank Mjam findest du immer den passenden Lieferservice in deiner Stadt. Our Quality Rank, numerous reviews of restaurants and our filter will help you in choosing the right delivery service. Imagine your desired menu together and order conveniently on the way home or in the subway and I'm simultaneously with the pizza delivery. Enjoy your meal! Whether you are looking for a pizza delivery service in Vienna, sushi service in Salzburg, Burger ordering service in Innsbruck or shredding delivery service in Graz - the free Mjam app has hundreds of delivery services throughout Austria for you to choose from. Choose from your desired food and order comfortably over your Mjam app. Orders on the way home or in the subway and I'm simultaneously with the pizza guy at home! However, if you find a bug or a feature missing, please let us know and send us an e-mail app@mjam.net on. Thank You!

Die Motivationskampagne "Österreich radelt zur Arbeit!" lässt Betriebsteams Radeltage und Kilometer sammeln und so an Gewinnspielen teilnehmen. Diese App dient dazu, via GPS-Tracking die geradelten Kilometer direkt ins Nutzerprofil auf www.radeltzurarbeit.at zu übertragen. Mit Tacho-Funktion! "RadeltZurArbeit" wird von der Radlobby Österreich durchgeführt und vom Lebensministerium sowie den teilnehmenden Bundesländern unterstützt. Im bundesweiten Radel-Monat Mai werden via Web und App persönliche Radeltage und Kilometer gesammelt, wodurch alle MitradlerInnen sowohl beim täglichen "Radel-Lotto" als auch bei den Teampreisverlosungen im Juni teilnehmen können. Mehr Infos: http://www.radeltzurarbeit.at Die ersten 1.000 Benutzer der App erhalten einen Gutschein für ein BikeCityGuide-Städtepaket im Wert von 4.45 € geschenkt. Der Code ist jederzeit im Impressum einsehbar. Mehr Infos zu diesem Radl-Routenplaner und -Navi: http://www.bikecityguide.org The motivation campaign "Austria cycling to work!" Operations teams can gather cycling days and kilometers, and so for a contest. This app is used via the GPS tracking cycled kilometers directly into user profile to be transferred to www.radeltzurarbeit.at. With tachometer function! "RadeltZurArbeit" is performed by the Radlobby Austria and the Ministry of Life and the participating states supported. The nationwide Radel month ago via web and app personal cycling days and kilometers are collected, which is open to all MitradlerInnen both the daily "Radel lottery" as well as the team prize draw in June. More Info: http://www.radeltzurarbeit.at The first 1,000 users of the app will receive a voucher for a bike CityGuide Cities package worth € 4.45 paid. The code is always the imprint cost. Learn more about this bike-and-Navi directions: http://www.bikecityguide.org

Tyrannosaurs Massive skulls, powerful jaws, two heavy-duty legs and two teeny-tiny arms. And don’t forget the large, bone-crunching teeth. Most of us picture all tyrannosaurs like the iconic T. rex. But is this true? Tyrannosaurs were, in fact, a very diverse group of meat-eating dinosaurs that thrived in the Northern Hemisphere for over 100 million years during the Jurassic and Cretaceous Periods (from 165 to 66 million years ago). Eventually, some of this group became the world’s top predators. Only a mass extinction event halted their dominance. Play the game Hatch your dinosaur eggs and collect them all! Hunt for clues and reveal the secret behind the formidable dinosaurs that make up the tyrannosaurs group. Created by the Australian Museum and Eye Candy

'AutoCorrect Switch app aims to rein in power of smartphone prediction'- Silicon Prairie News 'New App eliminates problems with AutoCorrect'- Kansas City Hispanic News AutoCorrect switch is an app exclusively built to provide easy access to enable and disable the autocorrection (prediction) option provided on an as needed basis, without going back and forth changing your keyboard settings. There are times when you might need the autocorrect feature and there are times when you don’t. Simply logon to our app and start typing what you want. Turn on or off the Autocorrect switch as many times as you want. After you are done typing simply select the option of where you want to post it. In the Auto-correct Switch app from your menu key on your phone, you will be able to share the message as an email or Message. You can also copy the message and then paste it into any app or document. Now you can be in control of what you share and forget the annoying suggestions that autocorrection feature gives you while you are typing your messages or notes. Note: This app works in combination with the prediction feature of your phone. Make sure this feature is ON by going into settings>language & keyboard>touch input>Text input>prediction Features: Turn Off or On AutoCorrect in One Place. Compose in one central place to send via email or message. Create Notes and export them to apps like Evernote. Benefits and uses: Convenience of staying in one place and having control over the auto correction feature through the switch. Key once without having to switch applications for the same message improving efficiency. Turn OFF AutoCorrect to prevent miscommunication and avoid embarrassment by knowing that what you send is exactly what you type. Extremely useful for bilingual people who type messages in both languages using one type of keyboard. For example, type Spanish in English keyboard without getting suggestions for English words

description: Hong Kong Free Wifi app helps you to find a free wifi hotspot provided by the Hong Kong government. All hotspots are geo-located on a map and listed. LEGAL NOTICE: Despite similar gameplay, this game is not Cut the Rope and it is not made by Zeptolab. Cut the rope at the right time and in the right order to deliver the bomb to the target! This fun and action packed rope cutting physics game will keep you amused for hours. A bomb is placed somewhere on the screen and attached by ropes to anchor points. Somewhere else on the screen is a target which you have to deliver the bomb to. By slicing the ropes in the right order and at the right time, you can deliver the bomb to the target. Whilst delivering the bomb to the target, you need to collect as many stars as you can! As you progress through the levels, new interactable components are added (special anchors, rope extenders, bubbles, etc). The levels get harder as you progress through the game! You won't be able to put this game down - it's fun, challenging and thoroughly addictive! With several chapters packed full of levels, you'll never get bored!

The Astonishing Bad Breath Cure That Stops 96.03% of Bad Breath In As Little As 3 Days... Even If Everything Else You Tried Has Failed! Back in the early 1970s, scientists at the National Institutes of Health (NIH), which is part of the U.S. Department of Health, made a series of discoveries about bad breath. Put simply, what they found was this: About 90% of all bad breath cases have a single cause, and, for people in this group, the NIH scientists literally fell over a specific combination of common household ingredients that eliminated the bad breath problem an incredible 96 times out of 100 ! It was an impressive discovery, but the fact that anyone could make the same 'secret formula' at home with stuff you can get at your local supermarket, usually for less than $2 , meant it was immediately buried and ignored. After all, halitosis is big business: Americans alone spend more than $5 billion dollars each and every year on expensive mouth-washes, breath mints, and other bad breath products and "cures". So the research was quietly published in various obscure scientific journals (which are only read by other scientists!), and the researchers involved were moved on to other things. And, over time, their work was practically-forgotten. Until now, that is! In this unique app, you'll discover... • The single cause of virtually ALL cases of bad breath, and what you can do to control it, no matter how serious your problem, or how long you've had it. • How to get rid of the ugly white coating on your tongue... without scraping ! • The (re)discovery by Russian scientists of an astonishing ancient Indian remedy for bad breath, tooth decay, and gum disease all rolled into one! • The REAL cause of cavities, gum-disease, & all forms of dental decay (Hint: It's NOT sugar! ) • A scientifically-proven way to eliminate mouth ulcers and canker sores for good... even if you have been plagued by them for as long as you can remember! You'll also learn about... • How tooth decay was eliminated 4 decades ago... using light bulbs ! • A breakthrough invention that uses LIGHT to clean your teeth & nothing else – not even water! • How to immediately stop painful toothaches...with an ice cube!: No, you do NOT put it on the tooth... in fact, you don't even put it anywhere near your mouth! • An amazingly-simple device that reverses even the most severe cases of gum-disease in just a few DAYS! • An incredible electronic device that kills 99.8% of tooth decay... in just 4 MINUTES!: Read about a small electronic device invented by a British scientist that represents an amazing technological breakthrough. • And lots, lots, more...

Follow the Major League Baseball playoff race with the Magic Number for MLB! Baseball records, stats, and standings are at your fingertips (and on your home screen) with Magic Number for MLB. Track your team's playoff progress to clinching the division or the wildcard spot at a glance on your phone. Magic Numbers (number of team wins or opponent's losses required to clinch the division), Elimination Numbers (E), win/loss record, games back to the division leader (GB), wildcard games back (WCGB), current streak, and more stats are also available options. Playoff series (LDS, LCS, and World Series) can be tracked on your home screen. And check out the countdown options (wins to World Series title, countdowns to Opening Day, Spring Training, etc.). Any/all MLB teams can be tracked on your home screen. Make as many widgets as you want, for as many teams as you want!

description: 2015's #1 Cocktail Recipes free app with 8500+ drinks plus many more features. Best Drinks app you will find. This is why: 1. 8500+ Cocktail Recipes (Great feature if you love mixing your drinks plus Bartenders Favorite feature) 2. 15000+ Beers Worldwide (Great App for Beer Lovers) 3. BAC% Calculator (If you "Drink n Drive", MUST use this feature) 4. Drinks Tracker (Don't get overcharged plus track how much you drink per week per month etc) It is FREE App! So give it a try and see yourself how much you going to love this app. All-in-One app where you can find thousands of beers and cocktail recipes. BAC% calculator feature can help you decide if you good to drive or not, depending upon blood alcohol content in your body. Drinks tracker feature can help you keep track of number of beers, shots or wines you drink over period of time. You can add the beers or cocktails you like to Favorites tab for easy access next time. Send the beer details or a cocktail recipe to any friend with one-click. Share drink recipes on Facebook! Detailed description of each feature: Cocktail Recipes: Check out 8500+ alcoholic drinks. You can view all of the cocktails at once or you can filter the recipes based on various things, such as: • Browse By Base drinks: You can filter cocktails based on Whiskey, Vodka, Tequila, Rum etc. • Browse By Fruits mixed: Love the specific fruits? This method filters the recipes based on what fruit you would like in your cocktail. • Browse By Glass Types: Some people like drinking from specific glasses therefore we show you the cocktail recipes that you can try based on glass types. • Browse By Ingredients: Want something special in your drink? Type it in and we bet you we will find a cocktail for you from our database. Once you find the drink you like, we will guide you with the recipe instructions. Beers: Search 15000+ beers with detailed information. 3-way search gives you flexibility to browse through entire beers database efficiently and find your favorite beers. • Browse By Location: Visiting different country or a state in USA? Find local beers around! • Browse By Style: There are hundreds of different beer styles. Pick the one you like and find new beers! • Browse By ABV%: Choose low alcohol beers, light, medium, high alcohol up to 65% or anything in between. BAC% Calculator: Calculate your Blood Alcohol Content % in your body before you drive. Driving with Blood alcohol content(BAC) of 0.08% or higher can result in a police arrest or an accident.. Must use feature if you drink and drive often. Drinks Tracker: Keep track of your drinks. Set a Goal and add your drinks in the database. View your drinking stats. Reset the database anytime. Additional features: Add any drinks to favorites, send cocktail recipes and beers details to your friends etc. Drinks Guide™ Beers n Cocktail supports 10+ language.

description: An angry, starving monster is threatening to destory the fabulous village of the unicorns. Feed it with candy, as much as you can - the more and faster the better! Help the unicorns using their trampoline to bounce all variations of sweets and candies directly into the mouth of the hungry monster. Expect 45 mouth-watering levels in 5 eye-popping, magical worlds full of sweets, ice cream, cakes and cotton candy. Will you be able to serve the monster enough candy and save the fearful unicorns?

When the scientists started their experiment, no one expected such an outcome: a wild & angry monster was created, slimy and green! Help the lab mouse to escape from the evil beast by jumping high and higher. Look out for some helpful power-ups, the scientist left all over the lab. Be careful: as if one monster wasn't enough, even more evil creatures are awaiting you. Find a potion to unlock the mouse's super-powers & make it fly. Eat & collect cheese while jumping to enable additional modes.

You're the chef ninja, so it's your job to catch and slice all the ingrendients nicely and in time. Hurry up, the orders are coming in quick and quicker. 27 nerve-wrecking levels are waiting for you! Don't miss any of the ingredients, collect bonus combo points and take care of these annoyingly dangerous bombs!

Have fun and enjoy the amazing experience of drumming with this multitouch acoustic drum kit simulator. Play this game with your fingers (as it they were sticks) in your mobile phone or tablet. Drum Solo HD is free, it has fast response, and includes different sound bank sets recorded with studio quality. Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play music loud with headset for a superior experience. Drum Solo HD is designed for everyone: children, percussionists, musicians, drummers... The main features are: - High number of exclusive demo rhythm presets to learn to play drums - Immersion haptic feedback (tactile effects) for a better experience - Unlike most percussion apps, drag your finger for different drums and play an incredible solo (watch the video sample) - Choose between 4 complete audio packs: Classic Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer - Multitouch drums. You can touch up to 20 fingers simultaneously. - Reverb effect simulates a live performance. - Record your own session and later, you can play on it, like a real drum machine. Double your experience!. You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record un unlimited number of notes in your loops. - Realistic HQ sampled stereo sounds, including double kick bass, two toms, floor, snare, hi-hat (two positions with the pedal), splash, crash, cymbal - HD drums images. - Double bass drum pedal available. - Animations for each instrument - Repeat button in order to play continuously your improvisations (playback mode). - Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor) - 11 touch sensitive touch pads. - Very fast loading time - Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.
release_text: 2.7 -Added small MP3 player to do musical accompaniment of your sessions -Added playback speed selector (now you can slow down the tracks to learn to play) -New smoother playback engine (more accurate and precise) -6 new awesome demos, and 8 old demos remastered -Better sound equalization -Reduced file size

description: Enjoy with Xylophone Piano for Kids, an instrument simulator to learn musical notes and concepts in an intuitive and easy way. It is a multi touch awesome xylophone piano which will help parents teach music to kids, to make compositions and stimulate the creativity in a cell phone or tablet, while having tons of fun. It is a toy for the family, suitable for all ages. The main features of Xylophone Piano for Kids are: - Amazing and attractive themes with HQ pictures. - You don’t need mallets. Practice your skill with your fingers, like a real piano, in this multitouch and very responsive playable xylophone, capable to play single notes or chords with the rhythm you desire. - Learn music with easy and complex different demo songs (including Jingle Bells, Beethoven, Oh Susanna!, Lullaby, …). - Sheet music with G-Clef (Treble Clef) that will show the actual notes when playing - Intuitive and immediate user interface, with graphics adapted to children. - High quality realistic sounds recorded with studio quality. - Record your songs with an unlimited number of notes. Mom and dad can then review the tracks and listen while playing the saved sessions. - Experience the unique animations for the xylophone keys.

description: Battleship Multiplayer is clasic board game with two players, each player has two own boards, one for him self, the other one for the opponent. Possible playing is on one wifi network, or between two players connected via 3G/Edge or one of the players can create acces point and the other one connects to that network.

APP2SD Easy is an easy tool help you move apps to SD card. [What Is APP2SD] "APP2SD" is moving apps installed on phone storage to SD card , this operation can save your phone's internal storage space. [Feature] ★ List all apps which can be moved to sd card ★ Show notification , when the new installed app can be moved to sd card ★ Tell user some apps should not be moved to sd card and tell user detailed reason. ★ Statistics Panel ,show apps quantity ,total size ,available memory and already used memory. ★ Sort apps by name ,size or install date. ★ Quick Menu (long click on app list item) : Open app/Show details/Show app's page of "Google Play" /uninstall app ★ Optimize Memory ★ Clean Cache ★ Uninstaller If you like this app ,please give it a 5-stars rating,many thanks. [Why some apps should not be moved to SD] When A APP Is Installed On SD : 1.If app contains Input Method/Live Wallpaper/Widgets , if you remove SD card or reboot your phone , the Input Method/Live Wallpaper will be reset to system default settings , widgets in home screen will be removed , you need re-select or re-add them , when SD card re-inserted or phone reboot end. 2.If app contains functions such as Sync Service/Device Administrators , if you remove SD card or reboot your phone , these functions won't work until SD card re-inserted or phone reboot end. 3.If app contains auto start task , the auto start task will fail and not be launched. APP2SD Easyshow these apps in "Should Not Move" list. [Why some apps can't be moved to SD] 1.The app is copyright protected. 2.APP2SD is a feature introduced from android version 2.2 ,so not all apps support this feature. 3.The developer forces his app can only be installed to phone storage. Clean History is an android system tool which can clean history ,protect your personal privacy , save your disk space ,make your phone's speed more faster. [Clean what] 1. Clean Browser History 2. Clean All App Cache 3. Clean clipboard 4. Clean Incoming Calls 5. Clean Outgoing Calls 6. Clean Missed Calls 7. Clean Chrome History 8. Clean Youtube search history 9. Clean Google Searchbox History 10. Clean Downloads 11. Optimize Memory [What is Application Cache Files] Application Cache Files are temporary files created by applications. For example, when browser visit a web page, it will save the image files as cache files. These cache files are not useful when app ends, so you need a system tool help you clean these old cache files. Often clean cache , is a good habit, it could save your disk space and make your phone speed up. [About permissions] All permissions required by this app are used for implement app function or required by ad ,my apps won't do anything hurt users. In order to help you cleaning history , access to your information on this device(browser history , call log , contacts ,clipboard) is necessary. App will not share these information with anyone and will not upload these information to server. description: "Phone Fee Assistant" is a free android statistics tool. Statistics call duration and sms , help you use mobile operator's phone packages more effectively,to help your phone fee don't exceed your expected ,help you save money. Powerful ,easy to use ,know how to use in one minute. [App Feature] Main page: Today's call duration and sms statistics This month's call duration and sms statistics Percent of call duration usage Percent of sms usage Percent of time of month List report and Graph report: Outgoing call count Incoming call count Outgoing call duration Incoming call duration Outgoing sms Incoming sms Yearly view Monthly view Daily view Settings: Set free call duration / sms Statistics Options:all call / outgoing call ,all sms / outgoing sms Set billing month start date Set call duration minimum unit : second/30 seconds/minute ,make the statistics result more nearly to your phone operator's result Simple setting page,complete in one minute [Q & A] Q: Whether this app upload my contacts ,call log , sms to server to analyze? Not. All statistics work is done in app ,and all statistics data is stored in your phone ,this app never upload any your data to server. Q: My operator's phone packages does not include free call duration and sms , how to set call&sms plan in the setting page? You could change the default value 200 to 0 , or set a value according to your average usage in past several months ,this will help your control phone fee does not exceed you expected. Q: Why this app need internet permission? Internet permission is used for ad , and check whether I have new app published. Q: This app contains a background service , what's the function of it? This is statistics service, it make sure that call log and sms will be counted even you don't open this app everyday. Q: Whether this service use very much battery power? Not. First ,the service does not work frequently , only when need update statistics data(a new call is made or a sms is sent),the second ,the computation is very little ,for example , if sms you have sent this month is 100 ,when you send a new sms ,the service change the 100 to 101,this will be done within one second. Q: Why I have deleted some call log or sms ,they are still listed in the app? This app is designed for statistics thus help user control phone fee ,so the deleted call log and sms will also be included. This app does not keep a copy of your call log and sms ,only save statistics result of them ,privacy content will not be saved ,take sms as example ,app only save the count and time, but don't save phone number you sent to or received from , and don't save sms content ,so please don't worry about privacy issue. Q: Why this app have a auto-start task? The auto-start task launches the statistics service. Q: Why this app does not support APP2SD? There is a limitation of android system : the auto-start task can't be launched if a app is installed on sd card , so this app does not support APP2SD for make sure statistics result correct. You can also import your exported kml files from Google My tracks (via Google Drive) into your fitbit Activity logs. *NOTE* Since Samsung uses it's own custom alarm application, fit: Sync only works with ROOTED Samsung galaxy S4 phones.

LearnEnglish Grammar is a top interactive grammar practice app designed to help improve English grammar accuracy. The app offers 1000s of questions to help practice and reinforce your English grammar skills. FOUR LEVELS FROM BEGINNER TO ADVANCED The app is suitable for learners of all levels and offers grammar activities at Beginner (CEFR level A1), Elementary, Intermediate and Advanced (CEFR level C2). Start at your level, and as your grammar accuracy improves, progress to the next. OVER 1000 PRACTICE QUESTIONS AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE The app has over 40 free grammar practice questions and you can buy more through in-app purchasing. Each level contains over 600 grammar activities, split into about 25 grammar topics such as Simple past, Question tags and Prepositions. The grammar questions use 10 unique activity types such as fill-in-the-blanks, multiple choice and matching. PRACTICE AND TEST Work through practice questions at your own pace in the Practice section or challenge your knowledge in the Test section and see how well you know the grammar topics at your level. UK and US EDITIONS We have released UK and US editions of LearnEnglish Grammar that use British English and American English respectively. The content is adapted to reflect differences between British and American English for usage, spelling and pronunciation. LANGUAGES The app is fully available in English, Japanese and Spanish. Help files and instructions images are additionally available in Arabic, Chinese, English, Italian, Japanese and Spanish. TOP GRAMMAR PRACTICE APP English learners from all over the world love our app. LearnEnglish Grammar has ranked #1 in the iTunes Education category in 9 countries and ranks in the top ten in over 40 countries. The app has over 1,000,000 downloads! - “Super! The perfect companion for your next outdoor adventure. Seek, find, record and return home with Handy GPS. This app is a real navigation tool designed for outdoors sports like hiking, bushwalking, mountain biking, kayaking and trail riding. Its simple to use and works even in the remotest back country since it doesn't need network connectivity. It allows you to work in UTM or lat/lon coordinates so you can use it with your paper topographic maps. Waypoints and track logs recorded in the field can be be viewed later in Google Earth. Base features: * Shows your current location in easting/northing (UTM) or in lat/lon. * Shows your speed, direction of travel, and total distance travelled in either metric of imperial/US units. * Can store your current location as a waypoint, and can store a tack log to show where you've been. * Waypoints and track logs can be imported from and exported to Google Earth KML and GPX files. * Allows manual entry of waypoints in UTM or lat/lon coords. * Can guide you to a waypoint with the "Goto" screen using true or compass bearings. * Optional audible proximity alarm on goto page. * Has a magnetic compass page (on devices with mag sensors only). * Computes the local magnetic declination at startup using the IGRF-12 model, for use on the goto page. * Can display either a simple map of your current location and the stored waypoints, or a Google Map if a data connection is available. * Supports the world-wide WGS84 datum along with the Australian datums and map grids AGD66, AGD84, GDA94, AGD, GDA, AMG, and MGA. (You can also use WGS84 for NAD83 maps). * Shows satellite locations and signal strengths graphically. * Can display simple 6 or 8 digit grid refs, or MGRS grid refs. * Waypoint to waypoint distance and direction. * Has online help pages. * Thoroughly tested by the developer on bushwalks. Extra features available only in this paid version: * Unlimited number of waypoints and track log points. (The free version is limited to 3 waypoints and 20 tracklog points) * An email or SMS containing a clickable link showing your location can be sent to a friend. * Common datums such as NAD83 (US), OSGB36 (UK), NZTM2000 (NZ), SAD69 (South America) and ED50 (Europe) can be selected from the custom datum page, or you can configure your own datum by specifying its ellipsoid and shift parameters. * UK grid refs with two letter prefixes can be shown if OSGB custom datum selected. * An elevation profile of your route can be shown. * Can average GPS locations over time to give a more accurate result. * Can take photos, which are optionally geotagged, directly from the app. * Show sun rise and set times. * Turn on/off flashlight from within app. * Export waypoints to a CSV file in UTM or Lat/Lon coordinates. * Create a new waypoint by projecting an existing one using an entered distance and bearing. Permissions required: (1) GPS - to determine your location, (2) Network access - for access to Google Map tiles, (3) SD card access - to load and store waypoints and tracklogs, (4) Camera access for taking pics, and (5) Prevent phone from sleeping so that proximity alarm works. Disclaimer: You use this app at your own risk. The developer accepts no responsibility for you getting lost as a result of using this app. Batteries in mobile devices can go flat. An alternate power source is recommended for extended hikes. Note that this app is also now available for iPhone and Windows Phone 8. Please see the respective app stores for details. A simplified version is also available for Android Wear smartwatches, called HandyGPSWear.
release_text: 10.6: Fixed bug with entering small negative lat/lon values in DMS and DM formats. 10.5: Fixed grid ref bug. 10.4: Changed preferences page to allow selection of 6 or 8 digit grid refs. 10.3: Added UK grid ref prefix letters if a custom datum is selected whose name starts with "OSGB". 10.2: Added button to custom datum page to select from common datums.

It is a perfect app for all those sensitive people out there, who want to express their emotions, but do not know how. ‘A single rose can be your garden… a single friend, your world.’ Roses are valued for their romantic symbolism but their blooms are also edible. The flavors of the blooms are green apples and strawberries. Their family also includes pears, apples, cherries, plums, peaches, apricots, and almonds. Mythology says that they grew thorns when Cupid accidentally shot an arrow into a garden full of them. The father of Botany Theophrastus (371-286 BC) first classified and identified plants. In his classic books Enquiry into plants and De Causis Plantarum (The causes of plants) he wrote about a hundred-petaled rose and called it centifolia (literally: hundred petals). Roman Emperor Nero liked to shower his guests with fresh petals of this magnificent flower. According to the legend, the dense petal cloud nearly suffocated some of the guests. In the middle Ages, it was customary for the wealthy to put petals and oil of these flowers in their baths. Many noblewomen carried bouquets of fragrant plants to cover body odors. There is a legend that says that during the Roman empire, there was an incredibly beautiful maiden named Rhodanthe. Her beauty drew many zealous suitors who pursued her relentlessly. Exhausted by their pursuit, Rhodanthe was forced to take refuge from her suitors in the temple of her friend Diana. Unfortunately, Diana became jealous. And when the suitors broke down her temple gates to get near their beloved Rhodanthe she also became angry, turning Rhodanthe into a rose and her suitors into thorns. SA Birding Checklist full version. PHOTOS & SOUNDS are downloaded separately, and must be manually installed via your PC. Please check the Readme file at the download website and ensure you know how to do this. The photos and sounds are NOT included in the download package from this Google Play store. (Almost full set of photos available; bird calls and rangemaps are less complete at the moment). If you have difficulties please email me (my contact details are in the About window in the application). This is one of a series of Birding Checklist applications for Android mobile phones and tablets. There are applications for Australia, New Zealand, United States (excluding Mexico and South America), Western Palearctic (UK and Europe), Pacific Islands, South Africa, and Ecuador/Peru/Bolivia. SA Checklist download website: https://drivehq.com/folder/p10496876.aspx The South African checklist covers the birds of South Africa, Namibia, Botswana, Zimbabwe and Mozambique (just over 1000 species total). These applications include basic bird identification information, and are NOT intended to replace a field guide. It is expected that users will have good familiarity with the birds they are seeing, and will use this application for: a. Logging bird sightings (with GPS co-ordinates if your phone has a GPS) b. Uploading your sightings to eBird (or similar PC or online recording system) c. Maintaining your Lifelist The full versions have the following features: - complete listing of all bird species and subspecies (where known) - searching and filtering of the bird list - statistics and record of your personal bird Lifelist - current tick list (birds you have seen today or during a short field trip) - quick lists for customised bird listings for locations your frequently visit - display of bird photos and bird calls on the SD card linked to the application (these must be manually downloaded separately) - logging facilities including GPS location (if your phone has a GPS) - export log file in eBird Import format for rapid loading of your sightings to eBird - optional downloadable Rangemaps and extended text descriptions (incomplete but growing collection on external download site) - help information - play mp4 videos of birds stored in the photos folder on the SD card - support for large screen 1280 x 800 tablets The demo versions have reduced functionality (there is no demo version for South Africa): - cannot save lifelist, sighting logs or statistics - will not display rangemaps or extended descriptions - do not display ticklists for regions - no GPS location display on Google maps - no alternate language support - no quicklists (custom filtering of bird lists for your location) - no mp4 video support You can easily add your own resources files (bird photos, videos and calls) – the application places no restriction on this but holding very large numbers of photos (many thousands) may slow down the application. Please contact me if you have any comments or suggestions, or corrections to the bird information.

description: Put a personal shopper in your pocket with ScanLife so you’ll always get the information you want most. Scan any product’s barcode, QR Code or Microsoft Tag and we’ll quickly find you more about it including prices and reviews. You’ll also have access to a selection of the latest discounts, deals and special offers from thousands of national and local stores that change based on your interests. Get hand-picked offers and content from the products you love or want. Scan a product UPC barcode, we’ll help you find a variety of information: - Find and compare prices from your favorite stores like Amazon, Toys R Us, Macy’s, Best Buy, Walmart, Target, and purchase right from your phone (depending on location) - Check-out product reviews & see what others are saying - Earn mPoint rewards as you scan QR Codes and barcodes that can be redeemed for real gift cards (US only) - Save all your scanning activity in your History and like products to save to Favorites. - Sync with Facebook to save your scanning history. - NOTES ON PERMISSIONS - We take your privacy seriously, so it is important to understand why we ask for certain permissions. Most of the permissions you see are to deliver QR Code content to your device like contact details or dialing a phone call if you choose to. "INTERNET": The app connects to the Internet to show content after you scan a barcode. "ACCESS WIFI STATE and ACCESS NETWORK_STATE": The app verifies if a network connection is available in order to connect to the Internet. "CAMERA": The app uses the camera to scan barcodes. "ACCESS FINE LOCATION": Location is used to give you more relevant information like local prices when available. You will be prompted before Location data is used. "GET ACCOUNTS" This is used to send periodic push notifications for deals and offers. You can disable this from the app settings under Notifications.
release_text: - Completely new design! We worked very hard to upgrade your experience and make it easier than ever to use ScanLife. - Please send any feedback or issues to support@scanlife.com

Sight Words Flash Cards is designed to develop pre-reading skills such as recognizing common words by sight and sound. Sight Words Flash Cards are divided into 4 categories: Pre-primary, kindergarten, 1st grade & 2nd grade. Each grade has an accompanying Question Mode to test and enhance reading skills. It is a simple widget that displays the moon phase and age of the moon. Function: - Full moon and new moon, first quarter, last quarter will be announced in the widget. - The calendar opens the widget when touching. (The number under each date is the age of the moon of 12:00 a.m. on the day.) - When you tap a date on the calendar, large moon image is displayed in a pop-up. - Notify full moon and new moon, first quarter, last quarter in the status bar. (Notify in a timing of the update of the widget.) * Requires installation of the widget on home screen. ★ There is also a paid version that can change the color of the moon. (No advertising) 《 How to resize widget (Android 4.0 over) 》 Please set to [ Show(Center) ] or [ Hide ] in settings of [ Display age of the moon ]. Long press of widget ⇒ Release ⇒ To change the size by dragging the dot when four dot and frame of light blue appears. Notice: * Please do not install to SD card, even if available in Android settings. * About storage access permissions This permissions is needed in order to save the backup to the storage. The app accesses only "SimpleMoonPhaseWidget" folder when you backup. The app don't access other than this folder. * This app does not change the wallpaper. Please prepare wallpaper by yourself. Wallpaper using for screenshot is here.↓ Photo by "Starry sky" via ruanyuanyuan123456789 http://www.flickr.com/photos/53889056@N05/4988841274/ * This app is not provided the image to completely reproduce the libration of the moon. The position of the pattern of the moon phase, such as craters, shifts from a fact a little periodically. What is Libration: 'In astronomy, libration is an oscillating motion of orbiting bodies relative to each other, notably including the motion of the Moon relative to Earth, or of Trojan asteroids relative to planets.' Libration (May 13, 2013, 19:45 UTC). In Wikipedia: The Free Encyclopedia. Retrieved from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libration

All your team communication in one place, instantly searchable, available wherever you go. That's Slack. * Real time messaging, file sharing, supporting one-to-one and group conversations * Powerful search and archiving, meaning no one is ever left out of the loop * Dozens of integrations with tools including: Dropbox, Asana, Google+ Hangouts, Twitter, Zendesk * New integrations and features added frequently * Inline images and video, with rich link summaries giving context without leaving the app * Instantly synced across all devices * Configurable notifications for desktop, mobile push and email * Scientifically proven (or at least rumored) to make your working life simpler, more pleasant, and more productive. Slack is free for an unlimited number of users, and an unlimited amount of time, with upgradable plans for extended message history, unlimited integrations, file storage and customizable data retention policies. "There are two types of people in the world: those who have never heard of Slack, and those who can’t imagine life without it." - The Guardian "You can tell that the team that designed it really took their time focusing on the little big details. It’s simple to use and powerful at the same time." - User Experience Rocks

It's time for bed but you're having troubles putting your children to sleep? Try 'Songs for Kids – Lullabies' – a top free app for your cell phone and you'll be surprised to see your kids fall into a dreamland in no time. Get the best combination of soothing lullabies and bedtime songs for babies, toddlers and children of all ages! Download the app right now, and time for bed will be your kids' favorite part of the day! Songs for kids on your mobile phone! Perfect sounds for sleeping! Set the time interval or let it sing constantly until your children fall asleep! These beautiful baby lullabies will help your child sleep like an angel! How do I get a baby to sleep is a question that will never pop in your mind again! Just like everyone, a baby’s body, too, needs to relax, rejuvenate and recuperate from all that it does throughout the day. It is best that a baby get her full eight hours of sleep every night, and at least one, or even two naps, preferably at regular intervals during the day. But if your baby keeps crying and won't sleep through the night, do not despair – a little bit of soothing lullaby music will help her slowly doze off and continue sleeping all night long. Get 'Songs for Kids – Lullabies' for free and play it every night to your little boys and girls in order to establish a nice bedtime routine and healthy sleeping habits. Nursery rhymes and lullabies for babies are also beneficial for your kids' language development and musical patterns. But keep in mind that lullabies are not just for babies. They are proven sleep inducers for adults too. There’s no doubt that music soothes the weary soul, and its contribution to therapy has been long in use since the dawn of time. Despite the fact that most people like different types of music, this kind of therapy is universal because there’s no one who can truly say that they do not enjoy music. Since music has a balancing effect on stress and anxiety, listening to music while going to bed can be very beneficial as it calms the mind, thus resulting in a good night’s sleep. Combine these soothing lullabies for putting babies to sleep with music for relaxation or nature sounds and you'll secure a good night's rest for the whole family. Enjoy these soothing “sounds to sleep to” any time. description: Offers instant weather information for boaters and ships around South Florida Coasts including wave height, wind speed, temperature and more. Also shows Marine Radio Channel 1 data for Southern Florida in Plain Text for fast load. Radar in motion & Cloud Maps on tabs plus location help if you're lost on the water under HELP! tab. It tells you instantly what's important before you go out. Data for entire South Floirida coastal waters and intercoastal current conditions information. Also includes U.S. Coast Guard contact info for emergency needs with a 'Show Me Where I Am Right Now' button. (not to be 100% relied on, approximate)
release_text: + Moving Weather Radar Image (updates every 10 minutes) + Satellite Image (updates every 15 minutes) + Approximate Location Data (emergencies or if you're lost) + Wave Height + Wind Speed + Air Temperature + Water Temperature + Wind Gusts + South Florida Current Conditions & Observations

SuperJobSearch App delivers: • Millions of job listings by profession, country and city • Millions of target companies by, industry, country and city • Job search advice ...what to do and what to avoid • Hundreds of model resumes and cover letters • Immigration Q&A plus Glossary of Immigration Terms used by the US Immigration Service for foreign workers interested in an internship or job in the USA • Regular and intern job listings in Fortune 1000 companies • Links to all of the Standard & Poor’s 500 companies • Job search resources for candidates looking for work in France • Links to thousands of recruiters and employment agencies by country and city • Links to American chambers of commerce • Tutorial videos that explain how to get the most from the app • Links to colleges, trade schools, universities and free online courses, including how to start up your own business • Links to teaching, healthcare and non-profit job opportunities • Links to free online software training • Free job search advice in writing resumes and letters, dealing with recruiters, working with your references ,and preparing for a job search • Plus many more tips and links to support your job search campaign. Just lost your job? Or out of work for too long? Don’t panic—these Super Job Search App resources will set you on the right path. First, you’ll need to determine the type of position you want and make sure that job exists in the location you desire. Using the Super Job Search App, head over to the Global Job Search Links page. Here you will find millions of job opportunities from around the world. Try out several of the search engines. Students and people seeking permanent jobs may want to scroll down to the Fortune 1000 list, where there are links to each company’s intern and full-time job listings. Study the requirements for jobs or internships that interest you. If you need to brush up on your skills, go to Valuable Resources. You’ll find free online training for the most popular software programs. If you need further training, scroll down for links to schools, community colleges, and more. You’ll want to write your best resume ever. For tips on how to write a winning resume, take a look at Workshop Resources. Each workshop has its own collection of sample resumes and letters, as well as advice on putting together your resume and links to community contacts. For more resume and letter samples, go to Model Letters & Resumes. Next, create your target list of companies to search for job opportunities. Go to Global Company Lists. After reviewing links to the best companies in the United States, explore databases from around the world. Be sure to click on Standard & Poor’s 500 Companies, where you can connect to each company’s home page for research and job listings. On the Navigation Page, get job search help at Articles & Job Search Advice. If you have immigration questions about working in the United States, look under French Resources, where you will find the link to Immigration Questions & Answers. To avoid some of the frustrations of job search, check out Peter’s Blogs. These are just a few of the many resources you will discover as you navigate through the Super Job Search App. Register now, and stay tuned for more tools as we expand!

description: US Birding Checklist full version This is one of a series of Birding Checklist applications for Android mobile phones and tablets. There are applications for Australia, New Zealand, United States (excluding Mexico and South America), Western Palearctic (UK and Europe), Pacific Islands, South Africa, and Ecuador/Peru/Bolivia. PHOTOS & SOUNDS are downloaded separately, and must be manually installed via your PC. Please check the Readme file at this download website so you know how to do this. The photos and sounds are NOT included in the download package from the Android market. It is recommended that you test the download and install process with the demo version first, then upgrade to the full version when you have confirmed that it is working. *** If you still have difficulties, email me (my contact details are in the About window in the application). I can't respond to comments or questions in the review area. US download website: https://drivehq.com/folder/p8339014.aspx US – 1040 species and 15 subspecies (does not include Mexico or Central America) These applications include basic bird identification information, and are NOT intended to replace a field guide. It is expected that users will have good familiarity with the birds they are seeing, and will use this application for: a. Logging bird sightings (with GPS co-ordinates if your phone has a GPS) b. Uploading your sightings to eBird (or similar PC or online recording system) c. Maintaining your Lifelist Full versions have the following features: - complete listing of all bird species and subspecies (where known) - searching and filtering of the bird list - statistics and record of your personal bird Lifelist - current tick list (birds you have seen today or during a short field trip) - quick lists for customised bird listings for locations your frequently visit - display of bird photos and bird calls on the SD card linked to the application (these must be manually downloaded separately) - logging facilities including GPS location (if your phone has a GPS) - export log file in eBird Import format for rapid loading of your sightings to eBird - optional downloadable Rangemaps and extended text descriptions (incomplete but growing collection on external download site) - help information - play mp4 videos of birds stored in the photos folder on the SD card - support for large screen 1280 x 800 tablets Demo versions have reduced functionality: - cannot save lifelist, sighting logs or statistics - will not display rangemaps or extended descriptions - do not display ticklists for regions - no GPS location display on Google maps - no alternate language support - no quicklists (custom filtering of bird lists for your location) - no mp4 video support You can easily add your own resources files – the application places no restriction on this but very large numbers of photos (many thousands) may slow down the application. Please contact me if you have any comments or suggestions, or corrections to the bird information. Please also get in contact if you are interested in helping create a new birding checklist application for birds in your area.
release_text: Corrected latin name for Black-billed Magpie to align with eBird.

Maintaining your Lifelist Full versions have the following features: - complete listing of all bird species and subspecies (where known) - searching and filtering of the bird list - statistics and record of your personal bird Lifelist - current tick list (birds you have seen today or during a short field trip) - quick lists for customised bird listings for locations your frequently visit - display of bird photos and bird calls on the SD card linked to the application (these must be manually downloaded separately) - logging facilities including GPS location (if your phone has a GPS) - export log file in eBird Import format for rapid loading of your sightings to eBird - optional downloadable Rangemaps and extended text descriptions (incomplete but growing collection on external download site) - help information - play mp4 videos of birds stored in the photos folder on the SD card - support for large screen 1280 x 800 tablets Demo versions have reduced functionality: - cannot save lifelist, sighting logs or statistics - will not display rangemaps or extended descriptions - do not display ticklists for regions - no GPS location display on Google maps - no alternate language support - no quicklists (custom filtering of bird lists for your location) - no mp4 video support You can easily add your own resources files – the application places no restriction on this but very large numbers of photos (many thousands) may slow down the application. Note: Only Supports Those Video files containing AAC audio track. (generally, all of the modern mobile phones) Did u ever wonder why you had to carry a copy of your favorite video and audio file. Or, you have a Video file with you, and you wanted to only listen to audio, on your trip to office. This Software aims to extract the audio from your media files. On Demand. It simply extracts and prepares a completely valid aac audio file, in case the media file has the audio track encoded in aac format. And it is very fast. It also does not re-encode the audio, and the extracted audio file has no kind of quality loss. I wanted such an app, to strip audio, to listen while travelling, as listening to audio on your audio players, enables you to add additional effects as supported by your device, and its harder and waste of your device's battery to view videos. Almost all the modern devices record audio in aac format. and so this software can extract such audio tracks, and you can play them in music players. Note: Tested only with unprotected media, like those recorded on your phone, and those which are not protected by any kind of DRM. Note: Tested to work on Galaxy S2 GT-I9100
