WP Birding Checklist full version (includes UK and Europe) PHOTOS & SOUNDS are downloaded separately, and must be manually installed via your PC. Please check the Readme file at this download website so you know how to do this. The photos and sounds are NOT included in the download package from the Android market. It is recommended that you test the download and install process with the demo version first, then upgrade to the full version when you have confirmed that it is working. If you still have difficulties please check out the support website before emailing me: https://sites.google.com/site/birdingchecklists/ This is one of a series of Birding Checklist applications for Android mobile phones and tablets. There are applications for Australia, New Zealand, United States (excluding Mexico and South America), Western Palearctic (UK and Europe), Pacific Islands, South Africa, and Ecuador/Peru/Bolivia. WP Download website: https://drivehq.com/folder/p8404317.aspx Western Palearctic (includes UK) – 924 species and 1188 subspecies These applications include basic bird identification information, and are NOT intended to replace a field guide. It is expected that users will have good familiarity with the birds they are seeing, and will use this application for: a. Logging bird sightings (with GPS co-ordinates if your phone has a GPS) b. Uploading your sightings to eBird (or similar PC or online recording system) c. Maintaining your Lifelist Full versions have the following features: - complete listing of all bird species and subspecies (where known) - searching and filtering of the bird list - statistics and record of your personal bird Lifelist - current tick list (birds you have seen today or during a short field trip) - quick lists for customised bird listings for locations your frequently visit - display of bird photos and bird calls on the SD card linked to the application (these must be manually downloaded separately) - logging facilities including GPS location (if your phone has a GPS) - export log file in eBird Import format for rapid loading of your sightings to eBird - optional downloadable Rangemaps and extended text descriptions (incomplete but growing collection on external download site) - help information - play mp4 videos of birds stored in the photos folder on the SD card - support for large screen 1280 x 800 tablets - second language support for display of bird names only. You can download language files for: Catalan, Danish, French, Hebrew, Italian, Slovakian, Spanish, Swedish Demo versions have reduced functionality: - cannot save lifelist, sighting logs or statistics - will not display rangemaps or extended descriptions - do not display ticklists for regions - no GPS location display on Google maps - no alternate language support - no quicklists (custom filtering of bird lists for your location) - no mp4 video support You can easily add your own resources files – the application places no restriction on this but very large numbers of photos (many thousands) may slow down the application. Please contact me if you have any comments or suggestions, or corrections to the bird information. Please also get in contact if you are interested in helping create a new birding checklist application for birds in your area.
release_text: Updates to "rare" status for UK birds; corrections and additions. ** Save your todaylogs before installing this update.

Web Access for Outlook enables easy access to Outlook Web access (OWA). It works with Exchange 2007 and 2010. It also enables access to your calendars,contacts and other features that are available in outlook web access (OWA) . Text and image processing are incorporated to reduce scrolling of content. Web Access for Outlook saves you from retyping login details again and again. Attachments support - Download, upload and view attachments. (from version 1.03) Notification feature - You will be notified when new email arrives. (from version 1.09) No Advertisements For any issues please do email us, you can expect a reply with in 24 hours. This Application is not compatible with email services like Gmail, YahooMail, Aol, Hotmail. Note: When using Notification feature ,please make sure you enter valid username and password.Some Email servers are configured to lock the email account when set number of invalid attempts are made .Exchange Webservices (EWS) should be enabled on the Exchange Server for notification to work. Permissions Required : INTERNET - To access the mail WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - For downloading attachments
release_text: Version 1.11 Improved stability Version 1.10 Option provided to set time interval at which check for new Email has to be performed (Default interval will be 10 minutes) .By setting appropriate time interval power can be saved. (Requires ExchangeWebServices (EWS) to be enabled on Email Server) Version 1.08 Improved stability, load time and memory optimizations

The game "Europe Quiz" is asking for places that must be marked on the map. You can play alone or up to 4 people. The aim in both modes is to put the pin as close as possible to the asked location. The average distance in kilometers of all questions is evaluated. If you are good enough, you can set an entry into the highscore. There are rounds with 10, 15, 20 or 25 questions. The questions come from the eight categories, individually playable: Personalities, Capitals, Sports, Politics & History, Mountains/Lakes/Venues, Sights, Major Cities, Companies & Brands. You can also play all the categories simultaneously. All these options can be changed in settings menu. Features: - Languages: English, German - Players: 1 to 4 player - Categories: 8 - Questions: 600+ A game developed by David Graf and Richard Schermann. Version: 1.1.0 For suggestions for new quiz questions and for help with problems you can reach us at europequiz@gmail.com Icons: splashyfish.com Map: geo.dianacht.de
release_text: V 1.1.2: - fixed bug with question disappearance on Android 4.1 (jelly bean) V 1.1.1: - map rotates with screen V 1.1.0 - now up to 4 players - 1 new category (Politics & History) - patched wrong coodinates (Birmingham, Hanover, ...) - new questions in the other categories - faster movement with the arrows - questions don't repeat anymore during a game V 1.0.2 - bugfixing for some devices/versions: pin was not shown

description: The Whistle Android Finder PRO is supreme Android finder (phone locator) application which helps many people locate their Android device with just a simple WHISTLE after losing it, forgetting it somewhere or being hidden somewhere in a room on a desk behind papers, in a briefcase or in a coat pocket etc. The free version of this application named Whistle Android Finder FREE (also available in Google Play) has reached more than 2 MILLION downloads!! But now, after reading and taking into account more than 15,000 user comments, wishes, and suggestions, it is time to upgrade the application with new features, several important whistle engine improvements, a better user interface, customized notification melodies, lower battery consumption and much more. This is the story about how Whistle Android Finder PRO was born! Here are the main features of the Whistle Android Finder PRO : In contrast to the free, ad-supported version, the paid Whistle Android Finder PRO does not include any ads! Furthermore, the set of requested permissions is much lower now. Only the essential permissions are requested. Much lower battery consumption due to optimized whistle detection engine when compared to the Whistle Android Finder FREE. The application has been designed and strongly optimised in order to reduce battery drain as much as possible. Customized whistle notification sounds are supported in PRO version. Simply select any MP3 or M4A music and apply it as notification! Under the Whistle Android Finder PRO settings tab it is also possible to choose among 20 different very amusing preloaded audio notification sounds to notify the presence of the detected whistle! Whistle Android Finder PRO can be enabled or disabled under the settings tab. Just run the application and the settings tab will appear! Remember: Whistle detection is working ONLY when the device is sleeping (i.e. when the screen is OFF). Once enabled, Whistle Android Finder PRO will work even if you reboot your Android device! Of course, you can disable it under the settings tab at any time. It is possible to choose among 5 different whistle detection sensitivity levels! Whistle Android Finder PRO is just ready to adapt to any Android device regardless of the specifics of integrated acoustic components. Once your whistle sound is detected, the Android device will respond to your whistling with playback of preselected audio notification signal. Furthermore, the display of a "sleeping" Android device is illuminated in order to easily locate your device in your bag or in a dark room for example. Under the preferences tab a user can also select (and approve) the usage of maximum possible volume for audio notification regardless of current media volume settings. However, Whistle Android Finder PRO is designed to resume your current media volume when audio notification is not played. Whistle Android Finder PRO is based on sophisticated but computationally optimised Digital Signal Processing techniques to analyse captured audio signals from the environment and search for distinct time-frequency patterns of a typical human whistle. The incorporated DSP algorithm is not signal energy based, therefore this whistle detector is much more accurate and reliable than similar applications found elsewhere on Google Play. Remember, just whistle and your Android will respond!
release_text: New in Whistle Android Finder PRO version 5.1: (*) Added ANDROID 5.1 Support!! (*) Extended Android platform support

description: Now available for iPhones too! Tell your friends! Words By Post is the only cross-platform word game that keeps track of your skill level and always matches you against players of similar ability to your own. And since it is available for iPhone, Android, and Windows Phones, you can play your friends no matter what type of phone they have! Play this classic multiplayer word game with real people online! Challenge your friends to friendly games or play ranked matches against random opponents of similar skill levels. Compete for the highest rating. Play as many simultaneous games as you want! If you like competitive word games like Scrabble, you will love Words By Post. Automatic push notifications will let you know when you have moves waiting! Chat with your opponents using the in-game message board. Improve your ranking by playing ranked games against comparable opponents. Skill ranking updates using the classic Elo rating system to adjust your rank when you win or lose. A leaderboard view shows you how you compare to the top players. Words By Post is perfect for players of all skill levels because your matched opponent's skill level will be adapted based on your own skill level. Create a local hand-off game and play your friend by passing the phone back and forth. When you make your move, your opponents tiles will not be visible until they reveal them. Tap on your opponent's name to see your all-time head-to-head stats against that player. Words By Post is available for iPhone, Android, and Windows Phones.
release_text: v2.1.2: -Fixing double-tap-to-zoom behavior previous update: + New average point differential graph in head-to-head stats view + Automatic friends list that keeps track of previously played friendly opponents + Fix so that users with small screen devices can scroll down to access submit buttons + Many other bug fixes and performance improvements

Well, maybe this dream won’t come true for you, but you sure can have a lot of fun playing this incredibly interesting game! Maybe you won’t have the fame and fortune like those athletic stars, but you won’t have to go through all that sacrifice too! To achieve fame in this game all you have to do is run with your fingers on your phone screen and have fun! It’s simple to play, it’s very amusing, and above all it’s free! Hope you’ll enjoy playing 'World Athletics 2013: Run Game'! If you're a fan of sports games, this is the perfect one for you! One of the best free games for boys and girls is here to entertain you and provide you hours of fun! There are lots of sprinting games for kids, but this is a great game for adults as well! Prove that you're a fast runner, win all the races and set your personal best time! Download this free athletic game for Android and have fun setting and beating your own records! This first person runner is an ideal pastime for all the fans of “sport games”! If you're looking for a cool game for children, look no further! Download this free application now and watch your kids having the best time ever! With this app for Android, you'll have hours of fun with your friends! Show them your sprinting skills, prove that you're the best in this entertaining athletics game and become a legend! You're not a professional sportsman in your real life? Don't worry! This awesome application will make you feel like a pro athlete and provide you a 100% realistic track running experience! Get this mobile app and feel like an athlete at World Championships! Imagine that you're the world's most famous athlete, use your fingers to run as fast as you can on the phone screen and enjoy playing this fun game! For even more fun, play it with your friends and challenge them to beat your records! Addiction guaranteed! Get 'World Athletics 2013: “Run Game”' app and prove that you're the fastest runner in the world! Running is one of the sport disciplines in track and field athletics. This mobile app for Android is perfect for all the fans of racing games and every true sportsman must have it in his smartphone! Get it now for free and you'll have lots of fun playing this sports game! Try out this amazing race game and become a professional athlete! Win the gold medal at World Championships in Athletics and become the best athlete in the world! Show how fast you can run with this extremely amusing sport game! Download 'World Athletics 2013: Running Game and get the ideal time killer for your family and friends! Set your personal record in track and field running! 커플디데이는 로맨틱한 연인관계를 유지할 수 있게 만들어주는 환상적인 어플입니다. 마치 연애코치 처럼 중요한 기념일을 꼬박꼬박 챙겨주며, 지난 날들을 감성적인 폴라로이드 사진에 담아 추억할 수 있게 해줍니다. 그 사람을 사랑한다면 커플디데이로 기념일을 꼭 챙겨주자구요~! ^^ ☆ 기능 소개 1) 메인화면 디데이 소개 - 감성적인 폴라로이드 사진으로 연인과의 기념일, 디데이 등을 알려드립니다. 발렌타인데이나 화이트데이, 빼빼로데이 등 14일의 특별한 기념일, 생일 등도 알려주며 사용자가 직접 추가한 디데이도 한눈에 보여주는 기능을 제공합니다. 2) 커플 기념일 계산기 - 커플 기념일 계산기는 1일부터 10000일 까지가 무슨 날인지 알려드립니다. 가령 100일이 7월 17일이라면 100만 입력 후 계산 버튼을 누르면 자동으로 100일에 해당되는 날짜가 뜹니다. 그리고 저장 버튼을 이용하여 따로 기념일에 넣을 수 있습니다. 그러나 커플디데이에서는 왠만한 일자 기념일은 자동으로 챙겨주니 걱정 무~ ^^ 3) 디데이 목록 - 커플디데이는 연인의 생일이 몇일인지, 100일, 200일이 언제인지, 이번달 14일은 무슨 날인지, 내가 따로 추가한 기념일은 언제인지, 리스트로 한눈에 보여드립니다. 직관적인 UI로 기념일과 디데이들을 관리하실 수 있습니다. ^^ 4) 검색 기능 - 커플디데이의 강점으로 어플 오른쪽 상단의 검색버튼을 누르신 후 특정 기념일이나 디데이를 입력하시면 바로 찾아드립니다. ^^ 5) 감성 캘린더 - 커플디데이는 감성적인 디자인의 캘린더를 제공합니다. 이 캘린더에서 커플기념일, 특별한기념일, 디데이, 생일 등을 한눈에 볼 수 있으며 수정, 추가할 수도 있습니다. 6) 사진 Crop 기능 - 커플디데이는 최신 사진 Crop 기능을 사용하여 360도 회전, 자르기 기능이 가능합니다. 단, 자르신 사진은 폴라로이드 사진의 직사각형으로 보이게 됨에 따라 위아래가 일부분 잘릴 수 있으니 주의 바랍니다. ^^ 7) 알람 기능 - 알람을 따로 수정할 수 있는 페이지를 두고 있습니다. 디데이와 기념일등에 대한 알람을 수정할 수 있어 보다 스마트한 디데이 알람 설정이 가능하게 되었습니다. 커플디데이와 함께 감성적인 디데이 관리 한번 해보시지 않겠어요? 지금 시작해주세요! ^^ Couples D-Day is a fantastic app that makes maintaining a romantic romantic relationship. Like a newsletter every important anniversary gives packed like dating coach, enables you to put the last days of the emotional memories and polaroid cameras. If you love those who patronize tightly coupled to the D-Day anniversary Looney! ^^ ☆ Glance 1) Introduction to the main screen D-Day - Please note that Day, D-Day, etc. lover and a lyrical polaroid cameras. release_text: 안녕하세요 유저 여러분~! 커플디데이가 새로운 업데이트로 돌아왔습니다. ^^ 1.9 버전 업데이트 사항 1. 스테이터스 바 고정 시 사귄 날짜가 다음날에 제대로 리프레쉬 되지 않는 버그가 수정되었습니다. 2. 빼빼로 데이의 설명이 이상한 점을 수정하였습니다. 3. 롤리팝 버전에서 위젯 글씨 색상 변경 시 간혹 튕기던 현상이 수정되었습니다. 1.8 버전 업데이트 사항 1. 이제 왼쪽 메뉴로 가시면 오늘의 커플명언을 보실 수 있습니다. ^^ 100여가지가 넘는 커플명언으로 연인의 마음을 사로잡아봐요~! 2. 상단바 고정 시 며칠째인지 항상 표기되도록 변경되었습니다! ps. 건의 해주신 유저분들께 정말 감사드립니다~! ^^

description: 핫딜 가격비교 "쿠차" (랭키 5년 연속 1위 쿠폰차트) 1. 소셜커머스, 오픈마켓, 종합몰 등 대한민국 모든 핫딜쇼핑 상품을 모아서 한번에 검색! - 한방에 핫딜검색 다함께 쿠차차! - 소셜커머스, 오픈마켓을 한방에 핫딜 가격비교! 2. 국내 최대 핫딜 정보를 보유한 700만 회원이 쓰는 필수어플! 3. 모바일 핫딜쇼핑에 최적화된 '스와이핑쇼핑' 서비스 개발! - 매일매일 쿠차에서 좌우로 스와이핑만 하면 핫딜 쇼핑 끝! 핫딜 놓치지 마세요~ - '유아동 핫딜', '생필품 핫딜', '소셜TOP50', '오픈마켓 핫딜', '백화점/종합몰 핫딜', 등 다양한 핫딜쇼핑 코너 운영. 4. 국내 최초 지역 맛집/여행등의 4차 depth 카테고리 검색 지원 -'우삼겹','웨이브펌','스파펜션'까지 찾아주는 세분화된 검색 위메프, 티몬, CJ오클락, 쇼킹딜, 롯데닷컴, 신세계몰, 11번가, 옥션, 지마켓 등 대한민국의 모든 핫딜 상품을 쿠차(쿠폰차트)가 인기 순위별로 한눈에 검색해 드립니다. 쿠차에서 득템쇼핑 하세요. ======================================= [쿠차 어플 주요 기능] 1. 대한민국 모든 핫딜쇼핑 상품을 모아서 ONE-STOP 쇼핑 끝 - 소셜 TOP50: 소셜 업체별 1위 상품은! 소셜 업체별 TOP50 상품들만 모아! 모아! - 오픈마켓 핫딜: 핫딜 매니저가 직접 Pick! 오픈마켓에서 가장 핫한 핫딜 모음! - 백화점/종합몰 핫딜: 핫딜 매니저가 직접 Pick! 백화점/종합몰에서 가장 핫한 핫딜 모음! 2. 오늘의 핫딜쇼핑 인기순위 차트 제공 - 오늘의 핫딜 상품을 가장 많이 구매하고 찾는 인기순위 차트로 확인할 수 있습니다. - 내가 찾는 품목의 가장 인기있고 싼 핫딜을, 가장 빠르게 찾을 수 있습니다. 3. 모바일 핫딜쇼핑에 최적화된 서비스 개발 - 유아동 핫딜: 대한민국 엄마들이 원하는 유아동 핫딜을 다 모았습니다. - 생필품 핫딜: 자주 구입하는 우리집 생필품! 생필품 차트에서 가장 싸게 구입하세요! - 오픈오픈, 오늘마감, 매진임박 차트 제공 - 내 주변 핫딜: 내 주변 인기 맛집, 미용실, 마사지샵을 거리순/인기순으로 찾으세요. (지도/차트보기) 쿠차(쿠폰차트)에서 쇼핑, 여행, 맛집, 미용실, 마사지, 국내/해외/제주여행, 호텔/펜션, 공연/연극 등 모든 핫딜쇼핑 상품을 한눈에 모아서 쇼핑하세요! ======================================= 앱 불편 사항이나 요청사항은 쿠차 앱개발자 이메일로 보내주시기 바랍니다 바로 반영 하도록 하겠습니다. jwpark@yellomobile.com ======================================= 모바일 핫딜쇼핑 포털! 쿠차는 고객님들의 현명하고 합리적인 소비를 응원하기 위해 더욱 열심히 발전 시키겠습니다!! 쿠차가 힘낼 수 있도록 자주 방문해 주시고 많이 응원해 주세요! 쿠차는 여러분들의 응원을 먹고 자라납니다!! * PC로도 이용하세요! http://www.coocha.co.kr ---- 개발자 연락처 : 서울시 강남구 도산대로 139 J-TOWER 4층 A동 연락처: 1566-9630

app_name: Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids
description: It's time for bed and you've run out of ideas for lulling your baby to sleep? Try playing 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' on your Android™ phone and you'll be surprised to see your children doze off in a few minutes! We collected best “nursery rhymes” for kids especially for you and your little ones. You will enjoy soothing songs and relaxing sounds as your child enters the land of sweet dreams. Download best lullaby music for your baby sleep today and experience the bliss of a calm and peaceful parent. Good night and enjoy your healthy dreaming! ★Songs for kids on your mobile phone! ★Perfect sound to sleep to! ★Set time interval or let it sing constantly until your children fall asleep! ★These beautiful baby lullabies will help your child sleep like an angel! ★'How do I get a baby to sleep' is a question that will never pop in your mind again! ★These cute nursery songs are followed by beautiful backgrounds! Are you in desperate need of music for insomnia? 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is an amazing and most effective Android™ application that you can use at bedtime. Resting is crucial to your child's health and well-being. These “children songs” and lullaby music for babies will stay in your kids' memory throughout the entire life. Surprise them with these nursery lullabies - this is also a nice opportunity for your children to start learning nursery rhyme lyrics. Provide your kids with good quality baby music, wish them a goodnight and relax as long as you like! Get these songs for toddlers today and see for yourself! Your baby can't remain quiet? Crying can be their way of asking to be held close. Newborns sleep a lot – typically up to 16 to 17 hours a day. But most babies don't stay asleep for more than two to four hours at a time, day or night, during the first few weeks of life. The result? Lots of sleep for baby and a very irregular – and tiring – schedule for you. Your job is to respond to your newborn's cues, so you'll probably be up several times during the night to change, feed, and comfort him. Free lullabies can only help! 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is here, waiting for you to download it! Singing soothing lullabies and other children songs is a time-tested way to help a sleepy infant drift off. Your little one loves hearing her favorite sound — your voice — and the soft, infant music may calm her. Playing a CD or tape of music for toddlers, sleeping music, or other music for kids while you settle your newborn to sleep — and then leaving it on at low volume after you leave — can help ease the transition from being awake to falling asleep. A sound machine may soothe her, too, with the added benefit of drowning out outside noise. Legal info: ===== This is a free application. Songs are originally designated to lull a child and they are believed to be in a public domain. If you are an author of a song or you are aware that copyright belongs to a commercial author, please report to us immediately. Thank you!

This handy app can help you get out of debt quickly. It will show you how much you can save and create a payment schedule. It uses the debt snowball technique of paying off debts. This method speeds up debt elimination by using the payment from a paid off debt as an extra payment on the next debt. See how much you can save. You can even send your debt plan to your email account
release_text: Bug that sometimes paid off the debts in the wrong order has been corrected. Although dollar signs are shown the app will work in any currency as long as all debts are in the same currency.

** This is the official Mario Batali android app. ** "I'm so excited to present my first ever app - the most advanced, robust, comprehensive cooking app ever built! I personally created 100% of the content in this app - 63 of my most requested recipes from the many regions of Italy each with it's own video and still images made exclusively for this app. Then I added 25 technique and kitchen basics videos along with my own, personal introduction. This app allows me to get as close as I've ever been to personally cooking with you in your kitchen. So grab some extra-virgin olive oil, and let's cook some great food!!" - Mario Batali A new vision for what a cooking app can be – the most advanced and comprehensive cooking app yet. Features include: • Complete support for Android 1.6 or higher • Browse recipes by region, course, prep-time, season, category of food or kid-friendliness. • Videos showing Mario cooking all 63 recipes, plus 25 more technique and kitchen basic videos – over 5 total hours of video! • Still images that accompany every recipe step. • Extensive, intuitive bookmarking feature lets users cook more than one recipe at a time and jump quickly to favorites. • Built-in timers for any recipe step that requires timing. • Food pairings that link relevant recipes. • Wine pairings with Mario’s notes on varietals and a wine list describing each wine. • Fully automated, multi-view, one-click shopping lists that you can check off at the grocery store. • An extensive glossary of terms • Facebook integration so you can share your cooking stories via the web. • Original, unique, fun user interface to link it all together. SUPPORT: * Please contact us at support@highfivelabs.com if you have any issues installing or using this wonderful app. We're standing by to help you through any problems.

description: One of the hottest mobile games of all time - now FREE and finally properly optimized for Android by the same team that created the original version! See for yourself why Touch Arcade called Doodle Jump “possibly the best [mobile] game ever created” and Macworld called it “a perfect micro-game, insanely addictive, and deliciously replayable.” How high can you jump? Journey up a sheet of graph paper, perpetually jumping from one platform to the next, picking up jet packs, avoiding black holes, and blasting baddies with nose balls along the way. Laugh with delight as you blow past other players' actual score markers scribbled in the margins. And be warned: this game is insanely addictive! Features: - Many fantastical worlds to play in - Ninja, Space, Jungle, Soccer, Underwater, Snow, Halloween, Frozen Ice, Easter and now PIRATES! - Awesome power-ups to pick-up (JET PACKs, PROPELLER HATS, ROCKETS, trampolines...) - Trippy obstacles to avoid (UFOs, black holes, and many, many monstrous monsters) - Mad platforms to jump on (Broken, moving, disappearing, shifting, EXPLODING…) - Global leaderboards, fun achievements! Beat your friends’ scores! How to play: Tilt to move left or right, tap the screen to shoot. As seen on TV (Big Bang Theory, Parks & Rec, Bad Girls), movies (Battleship), late-night (Jimmy Fallon) and on tour with Lady Gaga, find out why Doodle Jump is a true cultural phenomenon. * BE WARNED: This game is INSANELY addictive! * Don't doodle jump and drive! ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: If you bought Doodle Jump in the past, make sure you have it installed on your device* when you install this new version! That will remove the ads. If you have already uninstalled/deleted the old paid Doodle Jump version, you can re-download it from "My Android Apps" -> "Other apps in my library" or by going directly to: http://bit.ly/oldpaid * This will work for most devices, but unfortunately not the ones that the old paid version is not compatible with. We are trying to come up with a solution for those. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

An amazingly beautiful special Christmas version of one of the most addictive and best selling mobile apps of all-time, Doodle Jump. Doodle Jump Christmas Special includes all-NEW STUNNING ART, all-NEW paths and challenges, all-NEW monsters, a SUPER COOL ROCKET power-up, CHILL-BREATH MONSTER that freezes you if you're not careful, and much, much more! Doodle Jump Christmas Special is all you LOVE about the original Doodle Jump and then some! There's no better way to get into the CHRISTMAS SPIRIT this holiday season than playing Doodle Jump Christmas Special. Makes a great gift!!

description: Special Easter version of one of the most addictive and best-selling apps of all time, Doodle Jump, with a twist - LEVELS!! Can you complete all 25 levels by collecting Easter eggs at the end of each? It's trickier than it sounds, thanks to all the different platform types and a few cute monsters along the way. FEATURES: - 25 unlockable levels - Moving, disappearing, exploding and breakable platforms - Lots of cute monsters. Don't get too comfortable! HOW TO PLAY: - Tilt your device left or right to move in that direction - Tap the screen to shoot - Collect the egg at the end of each level
release_text: Now you can remove ads. Performance improvements.

description: *** AS FEATURED IN THE GOOGLE I/O 2014 KEYNOTE *** ☆☆☆ Android Central App of the Week ☆☆☆ ★★★★★ Jason K. - "the best TD this side of Warcraft 3.” ★★★★★ Nick M. - “Must buy!! I can't stop playing this game, the best time waster yet!!” ★★★★★ Franklin R. - “If you like tower defense games this is a must” The aliens are back, and this time they’re on a mission to turn your beloved sheep into sweaters for their emperor! The sequel to the hit tower defense real-time strategy adventure TowerMadness is finally here. Protect your flock using quick thinking and an arsenal of awesome TD weapons. OPTIMIZED FOR A WIDE RANGE OF TABLETS AND PHONES ● 60 exciting maps to master ● 6 campaigns on varying environments, each with unique gameplay challenges. ● 9 powerful towers, including rail gun, missile launcher, plasma gun, stun gun. The ultimate TD arsenal! ● 16 different alien enemies with unique abilities and weaknesses. ● Xen the shopkeeper offers you special deals on the latest alien weapon technology ● Play unique Google Play Quests every weekend ● Cloud Saved Games with Google Play. Save your towers and progress, restore it on other devices. ● Compete with your friends to see who has the fastest time on the leaderboards! Who has the most skill placing towers? ● Game Controllers! description: Evil aliens are coming to turn your beloved sheep into intergalactic scarves! Protect the flock using only quick thinking and the arsenal of upgradeable weaponry at your disposal. "Addictive, time-sucking fun. There are plenty of tower defense strategy games out there, but TowerMadness brings the genre to a new level." - Brian X Chen, Wired "It would be madness to miss this game...it comes highly recommended." - Spanner Spencer, PocketGamer OPTIMIZED FOR A WIDE RANGE OF TABLETS AND PHONES GOOGLE PLAY GAME SERVICES SUPPORT – LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS! 3D TOWER DEFENSE AT ITS FINEST Play from an aerial view or zoom down to first person and get close to the action. VARIED MAPS Over 100 maps in diverse environments (35 available as expansion map packs). Tap "Add-Ons" to access additional maps. GUNS, LOTS OF GUNS Over 60 diverse weapons and upgrades. ALIENS! Think fast to defeat the 17 different types of alien enemies intent on stealing your sheep. ENDLESS FUN Endless mode lets you see how many waves you can withstand.

description: Word Crusher by limeArrow - a new challenging word game for the entire family! Do you think you are good with words? Prove it with Word Crusher! Try and beat each and every level of this addictive word crushing game! Create and crush words while destroying letter blocks, avoiding explosives and trying to beat the required score! You won't be able to stop playing until you have beaten it. Yes, it's that addictive! But be prepared, as it can also be very hard and frustrating, so keep trying! FREE fun for the entire FAMILY! + Addictive and challenging gameplay! + Optimized for speed, even on older devices! + Beautiful graphics and layout, designed for all device types! + New levels and challenges are regularly added, the fun won't stop!
release_text: + Completely rewritten game for better performance and smaller file size! + New and improved graphics for phones and tablets! + New challenges and level requirements!

description: Additional Torque OBD PID information for the 2006-2009 Mazdaspeed 3 & 6 (MPS in Europe): Boosted Air Temperature Knock Retard Wastegate Duty Cycle (beta) MAF Volts Actual AFR Actual Pedal Pos *Requires the latest Pro version of the application "Torque" to function. Will not work with the Lite version of Torque. Installation Verification: 1) Check to see that the plugin is listed in the "Installed Applications" of your Android device. 2) Check that the plugin is listed in Torque under "Settings" -> "Plugins" -> "Installed Plugins..." Initial Configuration Instructions: 1) Be sure to have an active internet connect for purchase authorization. 2) Launch Torque and go to "Settings" 3) Scroll down to "Manage extra PIDs/Sensors". 4) Unless you have added any pre-defined PIDs in the past, this screen will not have any existing entries shown. 5) At this point the installed PID plugins are loaded into Torque and purchases are validated. From the menu, choose "Add predefined set". 6) If the purchase was validated corectly, you should see an entry for "Mazdaspeed 2006-09" in the list. If you do not see the entry, then the validation may still be in process or the plugin may not have been installed correctly. Go back to step 4, and wait 10 seconds or so before continuing. This should give all validations time to complete.
release_text: Resolved issues with PID's being removed

description: Additional Torque OBD PID information for the 2010-2013 Mazdaspeed 3 & 6 (MPS in Europe): Actual AFR Knock Retard MAF Volts (BETA) Ambient Air Temperature Boosted Air Temperature *Requires the latest Pro version of the application "Torque" to function. Will not work with the Lite version of Torque. MAF Volts is currently in beta, meaning it should be accurate, but until I get some solid feedback stating its good then I would not suggest you use this value for tuning. Please email me with any feedback on how this PID performs and I will update the application. Installation Verification: 1) Check to see that the plugin is listed in the "Installed Applications" of your Android device. 2) Check that the plugin is listed in Torque under "Settings" -> "Plugins" -> "Installed Plugins..." Initial Configuration Instructions: 1) Be sure to have an active internet connect for purchase authorization. 2) Launch Torque and go to "Settings" 3) Scroll down to "Manage extra PIDs/Sensors". 4) Unless you have added any pre-defined PIDs in the past, this screen will not have any existing entries shown. 5) At this point the installed PID plugins are loaded into Torque and purchases are validated. From the menu, choose "Add predefined set". 6) If the purchase was validated corectly, you should see an entry for "Mazdaspeed 2010-12" in the list. If you do not see the entry, then the validation may still be in process or the plugin may not have been installed correctly. Go back to step 4, and wait 10 seconds or so before continuing. This should give all validations time to complete.

Get collection of different type of angry, kitten, fighting, frustrated, hiss, pleading, begging, hungry and other action cat meow sounds. All cat sounds are real and fun. It is a great app for cat lovers which is suitable and entertaining for both kids and adults. With these handy sounds, you can always listen to the sounds on the go. There are more than dozens of good quality sounds available to enjoy. Watch your cat reaction searching for the sound's location. It is good for training and teach your beloved cat by listening to these actions also. Try it when your cat is in happy, active or relax mode. Sometimes they may not react when tired or sleepy.

A powerful, accurate, and impactful tool to communicate Trimble SketchUp designs and visualize any space! SightSpace 3D is a fast and easy visualization tool for Trimble SketchUp that easily conveys your designs and reduces miscommunication. With advanced 3D and Augmented Reality technologies, pre-visualize buildings, materials, fixtures, and more to effectively communicate scale and context. Check for errors during construction and close deals faster with Augmented Reality to display digital models in the real world. Utilize bookmarks, annotations, photos, and social media to simplify presentations. A SightSpace Pro subscription plan expands functionality for a complete SketchUp-to-Field experience with the addition of external GPS and markers for Augmented Reality, photo markups, model dimensions, and more. Take Trimble SketchUp models on-the-go with the only mobile app ready for easy SketchUp-to-Field usage! GO MOBILE *Open SketchUp files directly from your device, Dropbox, email, or Trimble 3D Warehouse – includes native SketchUp files (.SKP), Google Earth and other .KMZ and .KML formats *SightSpace is the only mobile app that uses native SketchUp (.SKP) files to preserve model privacy – No uploading/downloading from a website or extra software required. VIEW *Use intuitive multi-touch controls including orbit, pan, and zoom to navigate your model *Communicate context, scale, and location information with advanced Augmented Reality SHARE *Share annotations, photos, screenshots, and more to colleagues via email or social networking A SightSpace Pro subscription enables features including: *Connect external GPS for precise Augmented Reality location *Create and use markers for Augmented Reality presentations *Play bookmarks as animations *Markup photos with drawings and text *Export all notes to PDF *Display model dimensions created in SketchUp SUPPORT If you have any feedback or questions, let us know! We offer free support by email at SightSpace@LimitlessComputing.com, an in-app knowledge base (under “I” in the upper right), and check out our Youtube videos on www.Youtube.com/LimitlessComputing. * NOTE: Augmented Reality requires back facing camera, gps, digital compass, and accelerometer. Devices with a gyroscope will have improved AR.
release_text: * Improved 3D Warehouse navigation * Minor bug fixes What's new in 2.2: * Improved SKP format support What's new in 2.1: * Added face edge support for SketchUp files (can be turned off in Settings->Display Lines) What's new in 2.0: * Native support for SketchUp .skp files * NEW SightSpace Pro Features Connect with a SightSpace Pro subscription to unlock: * Marker creation and scanning for augmented reality * Photo markup * View dimensions created in the SketchUp file

description: This app is a project born out of the need to have a single place to view all the coding contests happening across so many different platforms. This app aims to promote and help grow the competitive programming community worldwide. The app covers popular coding websites such as Codechef, Codeforces, Topcoder, HackerRank, HackerEarth and others. The app automatically updates all the coding contests beind held over these platforms and also allows users to see notifications for any new contest and set reminders. Features: * Feature to see contests chronologically. * Feature to see contests on particular websites. * Feature to select or deselect the contests one wants to view or not view on the calendar. * Feature to enable/disable notifications for new contests. * Feature to enable/disable monthly notifications. * Feature to add reminders (default, custom and automatic). --------------------------------- We respect the intellectual property of others, and no copyright or trademark infringement is intended. If you believe that this app infringes on any of your copyright or trademark, please drop a mail at limitskyapps@gmail.com . We hope not to offend anyone by publishing this application.
release_text: - Major UI update. - Reminder feature addded. - Major bug fixes. - Notifications improved.

description: ALL NEW!! EMT PASS 2.0 is now enhanced with newly revised audio rationales and EMT PASS Predictive Scoring ™ to help you better prepare for your NREMT or state certification exam. The NREMT is a pass or fail exam – it is not about getting 100% of the questions correct- it is about proving you know the material. EMT PASS Predictive Scoring™ will show you if we predict you will pass or not based on your exam performance and whether you have demonstrated you have the required knowledge. The audio rationales have been revised to give you not only the answer, but provide you with information you need to be a better test taker and EMT. The rationales are mini 1-2 minute teaching lectures to help you learn to read a question, take apart the puzzle key of a call, and provide the needed pathophysiology knowledge at the EMT level. EMT PASS contains 960 questions in 8 examinations and over 20 hours of audio recordings, EMT PASS™ is the single, high quality tool you need to pass the exam. The app is broken up into three sections. Section one covers the first half of the EMT knowledge base; the second half covers the remaining material. Section three contains two simulated final examinations. But our features don’t stop there: •Use EMT PASS™ at your desktop or on your phone or tablet by using the app or logging into http://LC-Ready.com with your account information. •7 mini-podcasts explain the exam and provide study advice and tactics. •Pause exams if you get a call or go into class. The program resumes where you left off when you are ready. •Each exam has a specific pass/fail cut score based on difficulty level. •You receive customized audio feedback on exams based on your performance. •High quality test questions and detailed audio rationales support users regardless of learning style or reading ability. EMT PASS™ is an exam preparation product like no other. What makes this product unique is the combination of high quality test questions and detailed audio rationales created by Bill Brown, former Executive Director of the NREMT. All exam items in EMT PASS™ are original work. This product is designed to closely simulate the NREMT exam but does not contain any actual NREMT exam items. Limmer Creative and Bill Brown both support and respect the NREMT and its mission.
release_text: Version 2.0.2 Fixes for crashes when internet signal interrupted during downloading Visual improvements for larger devices. Version 2.0 Adds newly revised audio rationales and EMT PASS Predictive Scoring™.

description: EMT PASS™ is an exam preparation product like no other. What makes this product unique is the combination of high quality test questions and detailed audio rationales created by Bill Brown, former Executive Director of the NREMT. Bill Brown’s no-nonsense audio rationales that have been called an “EMT class in itself” because of the depth and insights provided. Each audio rationale explains why the answer is correct and why the others aren’t. The audios also contain tips on question interpretation and clinical issues. This app contains a sample exam of 10 representative questions and audio rationales. The full version can purchased for $29.99. If you have an account on LC-Ready with EMT PASS you can use this version to sign in and sync all of your exams. *FULL VERSION INCLUDES* 960 questions in 8 examinations and over 20 hours of audio recordings, EMT PASS™ is the single, high quality tool you need to pass the exam. Our product is broken up into three sections. Section one covers the first half of the EMT knowledge base; the second half covers the remaining material. Section three contains two simulated final examinations. But our features don’t stop there: •Use EMT PASS™ at your desktop or on your phone or tablet. •7 mini-podcasts explain the exam and provide study advice and tactics. •Pause exams if you get a call or go into class. The program resumes where you left off when you are ready. •Each exam has a specific pass/fail cut score based on difficulty level. •You receive customized audio feedback on exams based on your performance. •High quality test questions and detailed audio rationales support users regardless of learning style or reading ability. All exam items in EMT PASS™ are original work. This product is designed to closely simulate the NREMT exam but does not contain any actual NREMT exam items. Limmer Creative and Bill Brown both support and respect the NREMT and its mission.
release_text: Version 2.0 Includes revised audio recordings and EMT PASS Predictive Scoring Version 1.1.1 Fixes bug checking user scores to open section 2 Version 1.1 allows users to listen to the rationales after each questions rather than all at the end.

description: Whether a first time student or back for renewal, our ACLS app provides high-quality, realistic practice examinations based on the 2010 American Heart Association guidelines. What makes this app even better is that we provide this realistic practice for only $1 per exam! ACLS Review Includes: • Four 25-question practice exams matching AHA style and content areas • 205 Study questions covering topics from BLS, Pharmacology, ACLS and Algorithm review • Scenario-based questions like you will see on the exam • Detailed rationale answers for each question to help you master course content. • Integrated ECG strips for interpretation practice. Strips may be expanded to full screen for easy viewing. • Take the exams as many times as you wish—and they never expire. • Score history tracks your progress as you complete exams. • Share scores with fellow students, colleagues or instructors. NOTE: Purchase of this app will not provide the user access to the lc-ready.com web site Limmer Creative’s mission is to help students pass the test. We do this by using high quality, clinically accurate, educationally sound apps written by leading national educators.
release_text: With version 1.3.1 we have optimized memory storage for devices with smaller memory sizes.

description: The transition to AEMT has been challenging and students need a dependable, in-depth, high-quality study tool. Limmer Creative's AEMT Review is that app. With more than 1400 items including study cards, review questions and simulated practice examinations, AEMT Review has the depth and quality you need. AEMT Review has sections that cover all of the major topics you'll need to know to succeed including Preparatory, Advanced Airway, Assessment, IV Therapy and Pharmacology, Medical Emergencies and OB, and Trauma Emergencies and Shock. Cardiac and Respiratory sections are expanded and a special section on AEMT Critical Thinking is included. Whether you are looking for help through your class or on the NREMT, AEMT Review is the app to help you pass the test.

Limmer Creative’s Critical Care Paramedic Review contains 500 flashcards and two 125 question exams to help prepare for the Board for Critical Care Transport Paramedic Certification (BCCTPC) CCP-C examination. With cards for each of the exam’s 11 sections plus additional flashcards on value norms, critical care technology and critical thinking, our Critical Care Paramedic Review app will help you learn important facts and identify areas which require additional study. A bonus section – Flight Fundamentals – will give you additional preparation toward the FP-C examination. A “Challenge Me” feature allows you to select 10, 30 or 50 randomly chosen cards. All cards have a “Mastered it” function which allows cards to be removed from the deck when you have mastered the content. Cards can be easily restored to the deck. All Limmer Creative apps provide a detailed history of study time and topics as well as the ability to email results to instructors and colleagues. Critical Care Paramedic’s 500 cards are divided into the following topics: • Obstetrical Patients • Neonatal and Pediatric Patients • Respiratory Patients • Cardiac Patients • Burn Patients • Medical Patients • Trauma Patients • Advanced Airway • Neurologic Patients • Toxic and Environmental Exposure • Laboratory and Value Norms • Critical Care Equipment and Technology • Transport Fundamentals • Flight Fundamentals • Critical Thinking Exercises Created and reviewed by experts and educators in critical care, Critical Care Paramedic Review is an accurate, convenient and cost-effective way to prepare for the CCP-C examination. NOTE: Purchase of this app will not provide the user access to the lc-ready.com web site

ECG Challenge is the ideal way to sharpen your ECG interpretation skills. Created by Dawn Altman, a nurse, paramedic and the "ECG Guru," this app contains 150 clinically obtained ECGs to provide you the practice, insights and confidence you need. The app is ideal for paramedics, nurses, med students and physicians to practice this vital skill. Using Limmer Creative's popular review technology, ECG challenge presents ECG strips in flashcard format with actual clinical presentations. Detailed rationale answers help to improve understanding and interpretation skills. A "hint" feature will help guide users to the correct answer if used. Strips may be viewed randomly or in groups using our "Challenge Me" feature. Once you are confident with an interpretation, the "Mastered it" functionality removes cards from view, allowing you to concentrate on the most relevant strips. NOTE: Purchase of this app will not provide the user access to the lc-ready.com web site

Detailed in scope and highly visual, ECG Classroom presents basic ECG interpretation in an understandable manner suitable for student or current provider looking for review. Created by international ECG expert Jason Winter, the app contains over 700 items divided between study cards, review questions and practice tests to help students learn and prepare for their in-class cardiology exam or the NREMT. The app goes into detail on principles of electrophysiology as well as rhythm interpretation and an introduction into STEMI identification. A case studies section allows users to apply their knowledge to real-life cases. The more than 700 items are divided into the following sections for high quality, focused learning: Electrophysiology Supraventricular Rhythms Ventricular Rhythms Conduction Delay and Blocks Hypertrophy and Axis Deviation Myocardial Infarction and Ischemia STEMI Identification STEMI Mimics Other ECG Findings Created in the style of Jason's popular ECG Study Cards Facebook page and ECG Learning Online website. Let our ECG Classroom help you in your classroom!

EMS1.com and Limmer Creative asked a large sampling of currently certified EMTs what they wished they knew before taking the NREMT exam—and this free app is the result! Containing 101 study cards with fast facts and critical thinking questions, this app will help with last-minute exam study—or to keep an existing EMT sharp. 101 Last Minute Study Tips contains information in the following high-yield areas as defined by people who have taken the exam: Medical terminology Pathophysiology Pediatrics Obstetrics and gynecology Assessment Cardiology and resuscitation Medical emergencies Trauma Operations And More! This isn’t a complete exam preparation product. It is a free, focused and fast tool for last minute exam review. Additional exam preparation and classroom review apps are available through Limmer Creative. NOTE: This free app is a service of EMS1.com and Limmer Creative. It is not affiliated in any way with the NREMT. No actual NREMT exam content was solicited or received by the developers.

description: With 600 items, Paramedic Airway Review is designed to be an excellent companion to the airway portion of your paramedic class—or as an in-depth review in preparation for the NREMT or your state examination. The 600 items include study cards, review questions and two 50-question practice final examinations. The app is broken down into the following intuitive topics: Airway Anatomy and Physiology Endotracheal Intubation Rescue and Alternate Airways Rapid Sequence Induction Difficult Airway Decisions Including both the facts and insights you need, this app includes medications, acid-base balance and important decision-making practice. Paramedic Airway Review is part of Limmer Creative’s Paramedic Review series of apps. Look for other apps including Paramedic Assessment Review and the popular exam prep app Paramedic Review.
release_text: 1.2 Bug fix for older phones not showing the submit answer button.

description: The most robust in our modular paramedic apps, Paramedic Assessment Review provides over 1,200 items including study cards, review questions and practice exams. Designed as excellent classroom and exam preparation or to refresh the knowledge of seasoned paramedics, Paramedic Assessment Review provides the in-depth material you need. Paramedic Assessment Review features assessment-based decision making throughout the app. Realistic clinical presentations allow the user to apply assessment information to emergencies—just like on the NREMT. An additional benefit to the Paramedic Assessment Review app is as an excellent general review of the paramedic course. Because the app uses clinical presentations and a review of assessment by body systems, users will get a review of common medical and traumatic emergencies as well as covering special populations. Sections include: Scene Size-up Primary Assessment Assessment Techniques and Vital Signs Assessment of Body Systems Respiratory Cardiovascular Neurology Endocrine Immunology Gastrointestinal Urology and Gynecology Trauma Assessment Reassessment and Trending Pediatric Assessment Geriatric Assessment
release_text: Version 1.2 fixes bug where Answer button appears white or missing on some devices.

description: Pathophysiology Review is a comprehensive review app for anyone in an allied health pathophysiology course (e.g. nursing, paramedic) or those looking to challenge pathophysiology through Excelsior College Examinations. Comprehensive in nature with detailed rationale answers in flash cards and questions, each of this app's 650 items creates an opportunity to prepare for an exam--and to better understand disease processes as a clinical provider. Pathophysiology Review™ uses the Limmer Creative S-R-T approach to study and contains: Study: 350 Study cards Review: 200 Topical review questions Test: Two 50-question simulated final exams Pathophysiology Review is broken down into 10 topics by body system including: Cellular Immunity Hematologic Neurologic Cardiovascular Pulmonary Musculoskeletal Endocrine Gastrointestinal Renal and Urologic

12-Lead ECG Challenge is the ideal way to sharpen your 12-Lead ECG interpretation skills. Created by Tom Bouthillet electrocardiography expert and popular ECG blogger, this app contains 150 clinically obtained 12-lead ECGs to provide you the practice, insights and confidence you need! The 12-Lead ECG Challenge app presents a wide variety of cardiac pathologies including a special emphasis on acute STEMI and the STEMI mimics, electrolyte imbalances and others. If you are responsible for cath lab activation, this program is ideal for honing skills and preventing false activation. Each case begins with the patient complaint and the actual field or hospital 12-lead ECG. You will be able to examine each 12-lead and come to a diagnostic conclusion. ECGs are expandable and movable for easy viewing on phones, computers or tablets. After choosing “answer” you will see a detailed analysis of the strip – many times with highlights graphically superimposed over the strip itself to show areas of interest. The 12-Lead ECG challenge allows you to choose 5, 10 or 20 strips at a time as well as a feature allowing you to exclude strips you have already mastered from the program. App Highlights: • Phone or tablet- no problem! ECGs expand and move on your screen for easy viewing. • 150 high-quality 12-lead ECGs. • Strips are presented with the actual patient complaint/scenario. • Detailed rationale answers including actual diagnosis and graphical reference demonstrating key points on the ECG itself. • Highlights acute STEMI, STEMI mimics, cath lab activation recommendations, electrolyte imbalances, and other cardiac and atypical presentations and anginal equivalents. NOTE: This app contains 150 high-quality 12-lead ECG images and detailed graphic explanations. To provide this quality, the app is a large download. Android requires 91mb of available space (45mb cache for download and 45mb for product install). Some phones do not have this space available. If you have the needed space and get an error you may need to clear your market cache in order to download. Also due to size, downloading over a wireless network is preferable to the cellular network. NOTE: Purchase of this app will not provide the user access to the lc-ready.com web site
release_text: - Fixed bug causing devices with low memory to crash

description: MyLists is an essential tool for your mobile device to manage all your day to day information. Store all your information in one place such as your lists of Birthdays, Credit Card numbers, Passwords, Shopping Lists, DVDs, Running stats, Expenses, Golf scores, Blood Sugar level, whatever you desire. MyLists lets you create your own lists(databases) and add as many items as you want. MyLists comes installed with several sample lists and databases that will get you started right away. Once you are familiar with MyLists you will be creating your own lists and databases in no time. There is no limit to the number of lists you can create, list entries is limited to 100(No Limit with Pro Version). MyLists is very powerful, but is designed to be simple and easy to use. You can export your lists to your Google account in an easy to read spreadsheet. Add more list information directly into your Google Spreadsheet then simply import it into your mobile device(with upgrade to Pro). Password protect your private lists from prying eyes with a password you choose. You can even make the list invisible until you unlock the protected lists. MyLists is your one stop tool for all your list management needs. Main Features: - Create/Modify/Delete lists - Create/Modify/Delete fields within lists - Sort Lists - Export lists to Google Spreadsheet - Password protect lists - 10 data types such as Check Box, Date, Time, Phone, URL, Number, Rating and Text - Dial numbers direct from a list entry - Surf to URL direct from a list item Try this out free and if you like it please upgrade to MyLists Pro which will unlock more features

MyPeriodTracker is a very accurate ovulation Predictor / Calculator. With high level of Privacy Protection, you can now share your emotional and physical health state with your Partner (**CROSS PLATFORM ENABLED**). It comes with feature like shared Healthline, Period Events calendar, Lifestyle Calendar, help to find possible prospective days for conceiving a baby or even AVOID unwanted pregnancy etc. The app can be highly personalized (** PASSCODE, CONFIGURABLE APP NAME and ICON ***) and is easy to use for tracking, monitor and managing your menstrual cycles and personal period log. It calculates fertility days and ovulation days on the basis of the scientific methods. My Period Tracker / Calendar provide a very intuitive interface for girls / woman to track their ovulation, fertility period logs and menstrual cycles, create and edit notes, organize and navigate through to preview your historic records and forecasts. ******************************************************************** FEATURES: TRACKING YOUR MENSTRUAL CYCLE ******************************************************************** - A newly designed Timeline for period tracking - Record your period dates and intercourse / sex dates - View your periods at a glance with our easy-to-read calendar. - Plan ahead with predictions for your next 6 months periods, fertility days and ovulation tracker. - Store daily notes, symptoms, medications, treatments, including intercourse. - Monitor and track moods, symptoms, weight, and other menstrual related progress. - Customize your calendar and tracker dates. - Setup discreet reminders / notifications for your next period or when your fertile days are approaching. *************************************************************************** FEATURES: TRYING TO CONCEIVE BABY / PREGNANCY MODE *************************************************************************** - A newly designed Timeline for Fertility tracking. - Track ovulation / period / cycles specific symptoms, treatments, and events (e.g. intercourse, contraception, sex, etc) - Record popular signs of ovulation / women cycles. - Advanced ovulation prediction based on Fertility Awareness Method (FAM) or OPK. - Capability for women to update ovulation day by physical monitoring - Record results of Home Pregnancy Tests ********************* METHODOLOGY ******************** My Period Tracker / Calendar uses an improved Standard Days Method, which has a method failure rate of < 5% per year. The symptoms-based method has a method failure rate of 2% per year. But users need to track basal body temperatures and cervical mucus every day at particular hour. Since irregular sleep can interfere with the accuracy of basal body temperatures, women who sleep late at night may not get desired prediction results from these methods. Disclaimer: Please go through the My Period tracker / Calendar app's Terms of use at following link. Fertility calculations, period tracking, pregnancy prediction methods and suggestions given in the App are no replacement of a real Medical Practitioner. http://mptapp.com/terms-of-useservice/ What’s New? ******************* a) Newly Designed Timeline for Consistent View on each Date. b) Newly introduced SHARE WITH PARTNER feature allow you to share your mental and physical health state with your Partner / companion. (This Feature is Optional for our Female Users but please see the unique benefits of this feature) Here are key benefits for both of you: * Stay inSync with your partner during PMS cycles. * Plan time together on special days. * Total privacy: just for you two. Your data is always stored in encrypted form. * Track and monitor menstruation cycles and period logs. * Common Reminders for both Partners c) Easy to Setup with Startup Wizard tool - * Step by Step takes you through the app configurations, you can configure this app the way you want.

description: Not so long ago in a not so distant galaxy Silky Way there was a planet populated by friendly robots. But one day the E-VEEL virus came from another galaxy and scrambled all bytes in poor robots’ chips. They all became angry and some even started downloading the illegal firmware from the Outernet. It is time to end this nightmare! The elite warrior Roborunner has been sent to access the mainframe and reboot all the robots. Play this platformer with logical puzzles inspired by the classic Lode Runner. Three levels of enemy intellect, three chapters each with a distinct graphics, 30 challenging levels and hours of fun, challenging brain puzzles provided. This is an perfect game to entertain yourself during the commute or other activities ;). Premium version has no ads and allows you to adjust the difficulty level and the gameplay speed. Free version doesn't contain annoying ads in game play only in the game menu. Both versions contain HD resources for tablets.

description: Over 40 million downloads! The whole world's running now! The new update brings the "New World", introducing all kinds of brand new additions to the game! Cookie Run, presented by the free chat and calls app LINE. BE A COOKIE HERO Escape the wicked witch before she slams you in the oven and has you for her supper. EXHILARATING ACTION Run, jump, and slide your way to freedom! Control your character either with touch screen gestures or virtual buttons. ENTER FEVER MODE Gobble up letters scattered though the game to trigger Fever Mode and grab even more coins! PLAY WITH FRIENDS Complete against your friends to see who can get the best scores. Invite friends to play and unlock special items. UNIQUE CHARACTERS Unique cookies and pets galore! They don’t just look different; they all have different skills and abilities, too.
release_text: Ver. 3.0.7 Update Information - Lag issues in low-spec devices solved. - Several minor bugs fixed. We hope you keep enjoying LINE Cookie Run!

description: This game is fun for all ages – just roll the dice and you’re off on an adventure! Journey around the world with your friends or family members. Roll the dice and feel the fun! This game packs all the thrill of being a real estate tycoon– just don’t go bankrupt! Travel the world - when you’re done with that, head for space! Construct famous landmarks in various places during your travels across the globe. Take what you can when you can. Roll the dice and snatch up all the properties! Use your character cards and a little bit of luck to get rich beyond your wildest dreams! This game is packed with unique characters. The prankster Dennis, girl-genius Yuka, the alluring stewardess Catrina, major league baseball star Hernandez and more are all waiting to help you achieve your destiny! Game-changing Chance Cards Turn the tables on your opponent with a single Chance Card. These cards can help you turn the tide of the game - spread plagues over your opponents cities, lower land values, force your opponent to switch properties with you, and more! Play with your friends for an even more exciting adventure! Team up with friends to form your own real estate dream team. Are you ready for the adventure of a lifetime? That’s everything there is to know! Grab your friends and family and Get Rich now!
release_text: What’s New? Latest Update V.1.1.0 - New Adventure Map: More Exciting and Gain more marbles! by beating the boss! If the boss is defeated, you win the game! - Lucky Mileage System: Get a point by drawing a pendant! Collect and get S Pendant!! - Monthly Attendance System: Login everyday, Get many big rewards!! - Buy 2 More Odd/Even Items while playing: Help you to beat friends easier! - Improve Card and Pendant Directory Interface - Re- Card Combination System - Minor Bugs

release_text: Ver. 1.1.1 Update Info Thank you very much for playing LINE Get Rich. Here's what's new in this update: - New Lucky Mileage feature added to use your accumulated Points at the Pendant Gacha. - Revamped fusions for S Class and above Cards. - Miscellaneous UI improvements. Look out for other new features and events via the in-game Notices! Build your empire with LINE Get Rich!

description: ◆◇Get Animals for Inviting Friends to Play PokoPoko Now! The mega-hit puzzle game Pokopang that racked up 37 million downloads around the world is back in all new style! Get ready for LINE PokoPoko! Match up blocks to destroy them in this fresh and fun puzzle game as you join Boni in his quest to restore peace to Poko Forest! - Stage-Based Puzzle Action Advance through stages by clearing missions! Each area offers its own unique set of missions with fabulous rewards that keep you coming back for more. - Your Favorite Characters From Pokopang Boni and all your fluff-faced friends from Pokopang are back and hungry for more adventure! Look forward to new Animals coming soon! - Grow Items on Item Trees Your Animals will look after the item trees for you! Harvest items when they’re ripe for picking and you’re ready to use them in the game! - Diverse Stage Structures PokoPoko offers original stages you won’t find in other games. With stages featuring everything from hot lava to apples, the fun just doesn’t stop! - Bonus Stages Galore Clear certain stages to unlock the Cherry Stage! Rack up Cherries, an in-game currency, and trade them for booster items you can use to help you in the game.
release_text: Ver. 1.1.4 Update -Adventure Mode added! We'll be announcing the Adventure Mode schedule in the near future! -Minor Bug fixes Head over to the Poko Forest and play your heart out with LINE PokoPoko!

description: Finally, here comes a battle game with LINE characters for LINE! "LINE Rangers," the easy and enjoyable defense battle game with adorable LINE characters. * LINE Rangers Sally, LINE's cutie, has been kidnapped by the Alien Army! To rescue Sally, LINE friends turned into Rangers! Let's go with LINE friends! * Cute, adorable characters. Totally different sides of the LINE friends that you have never seen before! Other than the original LINE friends, many new characters have been added! Cute little battles of more than 150 types of adorable characters! * Level-up system. Send LINE characters to battle or combine them to level up! Leveled-up characters become stronger Rangers. * Play with your friends on LINE. When a battle gets difficult, ask your friends on LINE for help. You can summon your friends' characters to win a difficult battle. Please note: ※ It may take longer to connect to the game depending on your Wi-Fi or network status. ※ It is recommended that you use a Wi-Fi connection for improved gameplay.
release_text: [LINE Rangers v.2.2.0 Updates] Thank you for playing LINE Rangers! Here's what's new for this update. ・Progression on Service Stabilization We hope you enjoy these updates, and thanks for playing LINE Rangers!

app_name: LINE：ディズニー ツムツム
description: ディズニーストアで大人気のぬいぐるみTSUM TSUM(ツムツム)を集めてつなげる簡単パズルゲームがLINEに登場！ ミッキーマウスや､ドナルドダック､くまのプーさんなどみんなが大好きなディズニーキャラクターが勢ぞろい！ 遊び方はとっても簡単｡ぬいぐるみの「ツム」を３つつなげるだけ！ たくさんの種類のツムがあるから、集めて遊んでみよう！ 【遊び方】 タイムアップまで、同じキャラクターのツムを3コ以上、なぞってつなげるだけ。 つなげた長さによってスコアが変わるから、できるだけ長くつなげて高得点を目指そう！ 【ルール】 ・ツムは3コ以上つなげると消えて得点になるよ。 ・長くつなげるほど高得点！ ・たくさん消すとフィーバーになって高得点獲得のチャンス！ ・ツムを入手すれば「マイツム」としてゲームに登場。 ・マイツムはみんな特殊スキルを持ってるから上手く使おう。 ・攻略方法は人それぞれ、自分なりのスタイルでハイスコアを目指そう！ 【対応機種、バージョンについて】 Android OS 3.0以上に対応 Android OS 4.0以上推奨 Appeared simple puzzle game that will be joined together to collect the popular stuffed TSUM TSUM (Tsumutsumu) at Disney store in LINE! Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck, everybody loves Disney characters such as Winnie the Pooh is studded! How to play the lead very easy. Three the "Zum" stuffed only! Because there are many kinds of Zum, let's play by collecting! [How to play] Until the time is up, the same character of weight 3 FOB, just connect it traced. Since score by a length that is connected is changed, it will aim a high score by connecting as long as possible! [Rules] -Zum will score disappearing as connect more than three children. · Long and connect the higher the score! · A lot to erase and become Fever high scores Win! • The if available Zum appeared in the game as "Maitsumu". · Maitsumu is trying to use well because they have everyone special skills. -Capture method each person, will aim for a high score in my own style! [Compatible models, for version] Supports Android OS 3.0 or higher Recommended Android OS 4.0 or higher
release_text: 【バージョン1.22.1】アップデート内容 LINE：ディズニー ツムツムをご利用頂きありがとうございます。 今回のアップデート内容は以下のとおりです。 ・今後公開予定の新ツム追加 ・今後公開予定の新イベント追加 ・その他、バグ修正等 これからもみなさまに『LINE：ディズニー ツムツム』をもっと楽しく遊んで頂けるよう、努めてまいりますので今後ともよろしくお願いいたします！

description: Before you download this game, please consider that this app contains social media links which enable you to connect with others, and in-app purchases that cost real money. LINE: Disney Tsum Tsum is the fast paced and exciting stacking puzzle game! Collect, connect and pop Tsums based on your favourite Disney Tsum Tsum plushes. Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, Winnie the Pooh, and many more of your favourite Disney characters are all here! How to Play -Connect 3 or more of the same Tsums to eliminate them. -The more Tsums you connect, the more points you'll get! -Trigger off Fever Mode to rack up a whole bunch of extra points! -Collect Tsums and set your favourite as your MyTsum. -Each Tsum has a different skill. Use the one that matches your play style! Find a strategy that works for you personally! About Device Limitations The game does not currently support older devices running iOS versions below 2.3. A fix for this problem is in progress. We apologize for the inconvenience and ask for your patience while we work to solve this issue. Note: It may not be possible to log in if your connection is unstable or your mobile data transmission speed is less than 1 Mbps. If you are unable to log in, please try again with a faster connection. We are working to resolve this issue, thank you for understanding. LINE Disney Tsum Tsum is published by LINE under license from Disney.
release_text: -Future Disney Tsum Tsum added. -Minor bugs fixed.

app_name: LINE キッズ動画（ラインKIDS動画）- 子供用無料動画
description: ＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋ 無料総合ランキング1位獲得！ 無料エンタメランキング1位獲得！ 妖怪ウォッチやアンパンマン、ふうせんいぬティニー、しまじろうヘソカ、チャギントン、プリキュア、LINE TOWNなど、 1,500本以上の人気動画が"いつでも無料"！ ＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋＋ ■重要なお知らせ この度、2015/6/30（火）17時をもちましてサービスを終了させていただくことになりました。 6/30（火）17時までは通常通り視聴できますが、この時間を過ぎると全ての番組・動画が視聴できなくなります。 有料プランにご加入いただいている方は、大変お手数ですが、ご自身で必ず課金の自動更新をオフにしてくださるようお願いいたします。 ※現在、有料プランに新規加入することはできません 【6月のラインナップ更新しました！】 ・大人気の「妖怪ウォッチ」、そして「ポケットモンスター ＸＹ」「GO-GO たまごっち！」は、毎週、新エピソードを更新中！ ・人気Youtuber「Kan & Aki's CHANNEL」「にゃーにゃちゃんねる」「日曜×家族チャンネル」が、LINE キッズ動画だけのオリジナル動画を配信！ ・6月のプレゼントはありません 【こんな方にオススメ】 ・お子様に安心&安全な動画を見せたい ・お子様がぐずって困る ・DVDレンタル料を安く抑えたい、DVDの返却が面倒 ・YouTube（ユーチューブ）にない動画が見たい ・子供向け無料動画GyaO!KIDS（Gyao!キッズ）を使ったことがある ・Hulu（フールー）の月額料金よりも出費を抑えたい ・知育・語学作品でお子様と楽しく学習したい ・無料動画アプリを探していたママ 【主な特徴】 ◆スペシャルコンテンツが勢揃い！ お子様に大人気の番組をLINEが厳選しました。 パパ・ママもお子様と一緒に楽しめる名作や、お子様の教育にも役立つ知育・語学作品などが盛り沢山です！ ◆無料で動画を視聴！ 無料で動画を見るには「タイマー」を使って視聴できます。 タイマーが足りなくなったら、パパ・ママ友などの友だちに「おねだり」しましょう！ ◆安心・安全な機能が満載！ 動画再生中の音量調節や、動画を見た時間の管理、アプリがお子様に勝手に使われないようにするチャイルドロックなど、 お子様を持つパパ・ママの「あったらいいな」を詰め込みました。 ◆パパ・ママ友のお気に入り情報を共有！ パパ・ママ友でおすすめ動画をLINEで共有し合ったり、友だちのお気に入りが知れたり、 パパ・ママが知らなくても、お子様がお気に入りの動画がすぐに見つかります。 ◆タイマーで足りなければプランに加入し見放題に！ プランは2種類、どちらも継続課金。LINEが厳選した毎月更新の数百本が見放題の「LINEチョイス見放題プラン」（月額500円）、 好きな番組の動画だけ全て見放題の「番組見放題プラン」（月額400円）。 ※パケット通信料金がかかりますのでパケット定額サービスへの加入をおすすめします。 ※ご購入前に無料視聴で動画の再生ができるかご確認いただくことを推奨します 【コンテンツラインナップ例】 ・妖怪ウォッチ ・アンパンマンチャンネル ・アドベンチャー･タイム ・ふうせんいぬティニー ・アイカツ！ ・LINE TOWN ・しまじろうヘソカ ・チャギントン ・怪盗ジョーカー ・うっかりペネロペ ・はなかっぱ ・ドキドキ！プリキュア ・ドラえもん名作コレクション ・ポケットモンスターXY ・たまごっち！ ・きかんしゃトーマス ・GO-GO たまごっち！ 等々、安心&安全な人気作品がラインナップ！ 【ご利用にあたっての注意事項】 ◆動画再生開始時・再生中、映像が粗く見える症状について 本アプリでは、映像再生にAppleの「HTTP Live Streaming」を利用しております。 通信環境が悪い場合、再生は途切れにくい機能性はありますが、 ネットワーク速度に応じて画質を自動的に切り替えるため、再生中荒く見える場合があります。 高画質でスムーズに動画を再生いただくには、Wi-FiまたはLTEなど、通信環境が良い場所での視聴をお勧めいたします。 ※通信環境によっては、Wi-Fiでも低画質の映像を取得する場合があります。 ご迷惑をおかけして申し訳ございませんが、ご了承くださいますようお願いいたします。 ◆タイマーの利用と決済について 本アプリで動画を視聴する際、お子様にスマートフォンを渡すのではなく、お子様と一緒にご利用いただくことをおすすめします。 健康のために、動画視聴の際は長時間のご利用は控え、明るい場所でお楽しみください。 無料視聴の場合、動画視聴中にタイマーが不足した場合は動画が視聴できなくなりますので、ご了承ください。 ------------------------- 【推奨環境】 ◆Android OS 4.0 以上、HLS対応機種 すべての機能をご利用するには、LINEアカウントが必要になります。 アプリのバージョンアップまたはLINEの新規インストールは上記の推奨環境で行ってください。 古いバージョンのOSのまま使っている方は、最新版へのOSのバージョンアップをおすすめします。
