This game is inspired from the series "THE WALKING DEAD" - and we hope you feel the excitement moving through a town full of zombies :)

"We don’t always make Parking Games but when we do, we make sure they are the best." After the HUGE success in PC version, we now present you Troll Car Parking 3D. This is one EPIC adventure you don't wanna miss. So what makes this Parking game different from all others out there? Here is a checklist for you: --> Absolutely beautiful 3D Cartoon style graphics & Environment --> 4 different vehicles to drive making it Car Parking, Bus Parking, Jeep Parking & Van Parking - ALL IN ONE! --> Great music accompanying you while you play the challenging levels --> Driving controls are smooth and non jerky --> It is one of the best parking simulators out there --> 30 CHALLENGING levels with HOURS of Gameplay Download Troll Car Parking today! The PC players have termed it" The best parking game ever made.!" Show off your parking skills in the Cartoon world with the all new simulator. A wide variety of colorful vehicles and environments await you. Find your way through the 30+ impressive game levels "Like a Boss."Impressive 3D Graphics which make you "Overly attached" to the game. What's best is that for first time users, this is a parking game"without time" - Experience a True HD parking Game. This is a Free Driving and Parking Game. The game is wholesome frenzy package of challenging maps, each one with very different parking zones. Learning Car Parking - was never this easy....Download today! You and your kids would love it.. Visit our website for more gaming mania: www.miraclestudios.in
release_text: - Removed ADS which were coming many times. Now ad showcase rate is only after every 3 rounds. - Parking Bug in level 16 has been fixed.

description: Welcome to Robo Run - enter the void in this intense and challenging galactic game! The war has begun and the Earth has encountered a new threat - in Robo Run, you must battle and force your way to freedom in a futuristic adventure unlike anything you have ever seen before! CHALLENGING, INTENSE AND EXTRAORDINARY GAMEPLAY! Robo Run will leave you on the edge of your seat as you run through the vast expanse of space in a bid to get sweet revenge for the harm inflicted on your planet. Run from the floating city of Postremo and make a dent in the universe! AVOID OBSTACLES AND BECOME THE GREATEST ROBOT TO EVER LIVE! The people of Earth are relying on you - and you cannot let them down. This epic tale will give you sweaty palms as you escape the grasp of zero-gravity in a quest to return to Earth safely! Jump aboard menacing spaceships and fight for your freedom, run for your life and never look back... RUN LIKE A ROBOT, STING LIKE A ROBOT. Swipe to move and be tactical to stay alive - can you gain one million points? With futuristic graphics and modern gameplay, Robo Run will keep you entertained for hours on end! Upgrade your robot and play better than ever before - do you have what it takes to escape the grasp of Postremo? Robo Run - dodge the obstacles and escape Postremo! - Fun, addictive and challenging gameplay! - View your stats and see how good you are! - Collect gems on your galactic adventure!

Dracula is mad, and you must escape! Do you dare to brave Spooky Surfers - the Zombie Run? For years, Dracula has trapped you inside of his castle - and now it’s your chance to escape! Oh no! Dracula has learnt of your daring escape, he has sent his fastest and most loyal guards to hunt you down... and they are right behind you! Play as our heroic zombie as he escapes Dracula’s evil grasp! Help our courageous zombie escape from his horrible nightmare by running through the foggy streets, trying to avoid Dracula’s deadly and dangerous crew! Dash through the streets but beware of obstacles that will lead to your demise! Run as fast as you can in the spookiest adventure yet! You have no time to waste, so hold onto your hat, as this zombie will be going places... places far away from Transylvania! This daring chase will leave you on the edge of your seat - will you be caught, or will you live to see another day... or night? Collect skulls along the way, and run as fast as your zombie feet can take you! Don’t worry though: along the way you will find awesome power-ups that will put you one step ahead of Dracula’s men! Earn points as you run endlessly, but watch out: the pace will pick-up and you will be required to dodge and slide faster than ever before! Play everywhere you go - on the subway, in the car or even at 36,000 feet! There are no limit to where Spooky Surfers will take you! So - join this spooky adventure and don’t look back! Dracula is after you in Spooky Surfers - the Zombie Run! - Run through the graveyard, streets and other creepy places! - Relive your worst nightmare as Dracula’s men chase after you! - Play as a brave zombie as he escapes Dracula’s evil grasp! - Beware of dangerous obstacles and make sure you collect the precious skulls! - Gain score multipliers to beat your highscore!

developer: Free Games n Apps for Kids
description: 3D Live Basketball Arcade Game..Its your turn to take the shot. Free install today! Finally…After popular demand we now bring you the ultimate live motion virtual 3D-Basketball shooting game as a FREE install. Did you know that the basketball was originally played with a soccer ball over 125 years ago! How awesome is that. Basketball has now become the 2nd most popular game throughout the world, so now its time to embrace this phenomenon and have some basketball shooting fun. Just listen to what some of our new users had to say about this highly addictive basketball arcade game: Daniel Rosenfield So cool. Love this basketball game Love the graphics. Pretty challenging...niiice!! Eric Glass Cool Game! Highly addictive! Our highly addictive easy-to-use game console will make your basketball game adventure super fun. Compete with friends and family for hours of slam dunk fun!! Do you have what it takes to beat my high shooting percentage? What’s your score? Well then…..let’s try and find out. Choose to compete between the options of a three-point shooting game around the PERIMITER (or three point line), or the master of the FREE THROW. See if you can top the SLAM DUNK score as well. So many basketball game options, so little time. You will control your “avatar” basketball player as they will need to stand at the three-point line and hit three-pointers from all over the court. Or shoot from the many different angles with your precision finger pitching at making sure they shoot at the perfect time. You have several game options to choose from in your “SELECT MODE” screen. Trust me..this is no easy task. It takes a special person to be crowned the Subway Basketball Shots world champion. How many basketball field goal shots can you make in one game? This wildly colorful basketball court is nothing like you have ever seen. We have created a colorful layout of innovative imagery that will surely impress all who install this competitive arcade game. Of course for you beginners we offer an easy to view tutorial which explains the rules and the breakdown of this highly addictive super fun subway basketball game. Hoop it up with anyone who dares to challenge you. Compete against people from all over the planet. The fun is limitless. I wish I were lying when I said you would have the interactive 3D arcade basketball shooting time of your life…but it’s the truth! We have taken the 3D Basketball experience to the next level. We only place 1 interstitial ad from Heyzap. We have no annoying pop ups or notifications that would in any way impersonate your phone. The permissions are for ads and it does not get any personal information. All you need to do is press the "X" button to delete any ads. Please enjoy our game and have an awesome experience.

"TinyTown™ Car Parking is one of the best designed games on the store. Hands down no other parking game comes even close" 4.8/5- AppReviewNation "I fell in love with the mood and the music of this game... If you like Parking Games, You need to play this" - 4.8/5 AppMotionNews "Snow, Rain, Sunny, Night and Many Vehicles. All this, in one single game. I've played parking games before, but no other parking games beats the graphics, usability, features of TinyTown Car Parking" 5/5 AndroidGamerz The Story of the Game: You play this game as John, a young man going through a bad time. John is new in TinyTown™. You have no job and are out of money. Looking for some work, you stumbles across Mr. Bones who owns a company called King Cars. Mr. Bones could be the textbook example of an evil boss. He is always in a frenzy, fires people in a second, and never ever listens to an excuse. You are called for an interview, and the Evil Mr. Bones understands your desperation. He hires you at King Cars as a car delivery boy. Low wage, Crazy working hours, and terrible rules. Rules any person would reject.. But not you. You need this job to keep you going. But would it be easy working for Mr. Bones? Would you be able to keep going and make it out of your bad time? Download this Car Parking Simulator Today.. Features of TinyTown™ Car Parking 2014: 1) Rich Cartoon 3D Graphics with Real Animated effects. 2) The Best Car Parking Simulator experience with Steering an Accelerometer control. 3) 34 Entertaining levels of Automobile Madness 4) Test your Car Driving and Parking Skills in 4 seasons of the game. a) Sunny Country Side: Enjoy driving through the country village and Farms. Watch as the birds fly in the sky while you drive. b) Winter Alps: Drive Carefully through the Dangerous Snow Mountains During Christmas time. One mistake and your car would go tumbling down! c) Rainy Town: Enjoy Driving in the rain? Well we've given you just that. It's raining cats and dogs, but you still have to transport cars. Don't speed up..the roads are slippery. d) Autumn Mid Town: Its Night time and everyone is sleeping. Enjoy this perfect drive alone in lights. Roads are open, but don't drive like a maniac.. 5) Multiple Camera Selection For Easy Parking 6) Weather Control, Enjoy the weather how you like it 7) Enjoy Parking Different Vehicles. We have included Sports Cars, Buses, Trucks, Sports Utility Vehicles (SUV's), Light Equipment Vehicles (LEV's), Vans. 8) Quick Car Service 9) Multiple Lives 10) Enjoy Light entertaining music while Driving ...and much much more. We hope you enjoy the as much as we have making it. Like us on Facebook to know more about new game launches. https://www.facebook.com/miraclestudiosgames

There are times when every parent needs to keep the kids busy. Popular 3D Running Games too tough for little kids? Well, we wanted to change all that. We made a game for little children to play with ease with as less hindrances as possible. Keep your kids hooked on to this game keep them busy for hours. Get ready to be bedazzled by the fairy world endless adventure especially designed for kids! The game revolves around Jasmine, whose eyes sparkle like a starry night sky, hair shines like diamonds and her magic makes her special. Experience the mesmerizing music and feel like a beautiful fairy collecting dazzling gems in this enchanted fantasy world. But, beware there is an evil rabbit in the fairy world who can stop you from collecting gems. Escape the evil rabbit by getting the power-ups like shield, magnet and boost. Fly through this fantasy forest world with beautiful mountains, striking waterfalls and lovely rainbows. Being kids friendly, the game has easy controls with the simple swipe up, left, right, down – which will keep kids engrossed in this dreamland. In the fairy world, the beautiful fairy named Jasmine lives happily. She loves collecting glittering gems. But the evil rabbit doesn't enjoy seeing her collecting all the gems. He creates obstacles in the path of sweet fairy so that she cannot collect the gems. Enter this amazing and adventurous fairy world to experience the life of the beautiful fairy. Fairy Game follows the magical tale of a fairy who loves exploring and collecting gems. Escaping the obstacles set by the wicked rabbit she flies through the fantasy land and collects the dazzling gems reaching the end of the game. A super addictive and exciting game that every kid will surely love! Take the magical wand and become a beautiful fairy for the day. Get power-ups and fly through the magical adventure land. - Become a beautiful fairy and fly in the fantasy world! - Avoid dangerous obstacles and enjoy the breathtaking views of mystic mountains, wonderful waterfalls and celestial rainbows! - Get power-ups along the way and increase your high-score in this endless exciting game!

developer: Best Buddy Free Games for Kids
description: It’s an interactive, innovative and interesting educational foot doctor game specially made for kids. Are you going crazy with your foot pain? Well, it’s time to see a doctor. Patients want to get their infected feet treated properly. Don’t be a clumsy doctor like others, you patient’s foot needs a lot of treatment. You need to cure their as fast as possible. Start with washing patients' feet, then scrub to clean them properly. Take out thorns from her feet using the plucker, clean the cuts & bruises and apply a bandage to cure the foot wounds. Use an injection to kill all the bacteria and germs. Finally, apply the ointment, bringing back the foot beauty. Feet doctor game is an educational, fun & an interesting game to educate children about the foot care in a fun way. Kids love to play the role of a doctor and this game motivates kids to be the best doctor. It also makes kids comfortable to visit a doctor or hospital. This interactive game offers a first-hand virtual experience to the kids. So, are you ready to cure your patients' feet and relieve their pain. Get started now and be the best doctor in the town! Features- •Doctor and surgery education for the little super heroes •Check internal problems and examine the foot properly •Removal of cuts, bruises, germs and bacteria •Applying bandage, plaster & injection to cure the feet •Share your real time doctor experience with friends on Facebook The real learning experience for the super heroes!

Introducing Timber Panda... From the interiors of China, with a goal to chop down all the Bamboos and Gift them to his little Panda friends. With his Master Kung-Fu skills - He has now mastered the art of chopping wood and Bamboos. Play as Timber Panda, and chop the Bamboo Wood to pieces, but avoid the branches. It's not as easy as it sounds.. You gotta remember that the time is short and the branches are deadly. Go ahead Timber Panda... Show your Kung-Fu skills with the Axe. Chop them up as fast as you can. http://www.facebook.com/miraclestudiosgames

app_name: Boy Dress Up - Game for Kids
description: Amazing dress up games for your little kids. In love with dress up games? Dream of becoming a clothes designer? Create a character of your choice - selecting different hair styles, clothes, shoes and accessories. In this dress up game, a cute little boy needs your help to get dressed up according to different seasons. Help him choose the clothes that he can wear in different seasons. To give him a new look, you can change his hairstyle, sunglasses and also pick up a stylish pair of shoes. Don’t forget to add a smart and trendy bag! Features- • 100% FREE game NO LOCKED items or purchases • Dress up the boy in the clothes of your choice • Create different hairstyles which you find the best • Choose and add a pair of smart sunglasses • Choose from three seasons: summer, winters and rainy season • Share with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and more. • Take a photo of this handsome boy to save or email your friends immediately Help this cute boy to become stylish and handsome in this Boys dress up game! Join us and let your baby dress up the lovely boy!

Do you like subway surfer and temple run styles games? If yes, Agent Bull Run takes to you an adventure in Spain where you run and race against time to go as far as possible. It's a unique twist to the action and adventure genre. Chase the bulls, collect the coins (Tomatoes) Dash against time and increase your score! Play the most “BULLISH” RUNNER game on the store. Know of the BULL FESTIVAL in SPAIN? Let this game take you there! You are a strong man – You DON’T RUN from bulls and take the challenge HEAD ON! This is not just any other running game. With sixteen radio stations and a news agency, Cogeco Diffusion has something for every listener in Québec. That’s 16 radio stations at your fingertips! The Beat 92.5 is the group's only English-language station and is Montreal’s only English-language Hot Adult Contemporary station. French-language stations include the Rythme FM network (Montreal, Estrie, Mauricie, Outaouais, Saguenay et Abitibi), 96.9 CKOI FM, 98,5 fm Montréal and its talk network (104,7 fm Outaouais, 107,7 fm Estrie and 106,9 fm Mauricie), Radio Circulation 730, 102,9 Québec, FM 93 Québec and CIME (Laurentians). Cogeco News Agency is the information provider for all of the stations operated by Cogeco Diffusion and also provides many other radio stations with national and international news. Cogeco News is heard throughout most of Québec. Cogeco Diffusion - Radio for everyone, across Québec.

description: Bantumi is one of the most popular mancala games for kids. The board has six small pits, called houses, on each side; and a big pit, called a Kalah or store, at each end. The object of the game is to capture more seeds than one's opponent.
Fire bubbles to match three or more like-colored clusters to make them burst. Clear the playfiled from the bubbles and get the highest score.
Meet a crafty opponent in most popular intellectual game of the world. Be as careful as possible in a game of chess with such powerful AI - no mistakes are allowed!
Collect crystals from magic treasure mine. You can pick up crystals only when they make a line of three or more. Swap any two nearby crystals to have biggest possible lines.
The object of the Durak game is to get rid of all one's cards. At the end of the game, the last player with cards in their hand is losing.
Farkle (or Farkel) is played by two players, throw dice turn by turn. The first who earns 10000 points wins the match.
Mahjong Titans is a free matching solitaire game. Player is challenged to remove all tiles from the board.

Mahjong solitaire (also known as Shanghai solitaire) is a matching game that uses a set of Mahjong tiles arranged in special layouts. The object of the game is to clear the playing field by removing matching pairs of tiles.
Muggins is one of the very best domino games. Goal of the game is to make the open ends of the layout add up to 5 (or a multiple of five).
8-ball pool game for one player against computer. Choose striped or solid balls, pot them all and then complete black ball to victory.
9 ball pool is a contemporary form of billiard game. Goal of the game is to hit the lowest numbered ball first and pockets the 9-ball without committing a foul.

Tip check fast with the newest Tip Calculator which offers you various options of Tip calclucations. Features privided by this Tip Calculator are: - Basic menu - helps you easily devide your bill amount and calculate tip between you and your friends. - Advanced menu - allows you to separate your bill up to 20 single checks. Tip Calc is also: - Easy and fast in use - Nice customized keyboard - Modern design How to Use: If you want to calculate tip amount of a single check just fill out a bill amount and press OK to split the check! To devide the tip amount between more persons press right upper button and set up number of persons. Simple and Easy to use tip calculator. If you don‘t wanna devide the check amount but pay exact amount you can use Advanced menu button. Gratuity Calculator will ask for number of checks and tips percent you want to leave. Fill out all checks. Sum button in the menu summarizes all of the single checks to one dialog. The Simplest and Easiest Tip Counter in the Store. This app is similar to Tip Split Tip Calculator.

This App requires no rights! No ads, no Internet, no data transmission. Barometer / Altimeter App - Display air pressure - Display altitude - Units metric / imperial - Set reference altitude - Set calibration value for the internal pressure sensor - Set display color Your device must be equipped with an air pressure sensor, otherwise the App does not work. Since the barometric pressure varies with the position and weather, the reference altitude must set periodically. If you have any suggestions please send them to mirkix@gmail.com

CPU Spy Reborn is based on CPU Spy. The app shows most common infos about your device and your frequencies stats. Thou some device (most HTC devices) may be officially unsupported (HTC One) and unofficially unsupported due to some HTC kernel info restrictions. there s always a way to improve ourselves, so if you have any advices I m ready to hear your point of view, the only condition is the way you ask, be honest but above all be kind, sentences too arrogant will just be ignored. Keep in mind the app is free and ad-free, so I dont earn any money on it, neither if you install nor if you don t. App will be developed until the work it s worth to be continued, a too low rating obviously will be received as a "we don t need, don t waste time on it". Said that, let s see the permissions the app requires, what they need, and where they re used. android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS Used to get google+ account, in case we want login with google+, this step is not obligatory, choice to you. android.permission.INTERNET Used if we wanna login, or if we wanna share our app contents via MMS, email, social networks. this step is not obligatory, choice to you. android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS Permission to invalidate tokens (for your security) in case you wanna login with google+. this step is not obligatory, choice to you. android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE Used to notify the user that has no internet coverage in case he wanna login with google+. this step is not obligatory, choice to you. android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Used to save a local screenshot. This is required if you wanna share stats. Note: the local image will always be overwritten with the newer to save space. this step is not obligatory, choice to you. As you can see none of these permissions is used unless you decide to use it, and you by downloading the app are accepting the fact that the app requires these permissions to work in every its feature, so I don t expect people complainting about permissions, but as i said before every advice to improve the app and avoid some permission is welcome. Thanks for reading, wish you a good day and enjoying the app.

description: B'day Reminder imports all your contacts and shows birthdates if available. Add dates that you don't want to forget, for example, Valentine's day, Mother's day, etc. You can set the time for notification and notification sound For each contact, you can add a list of gift, and set different number of days before birthday When you open a notification tag, you have access to email, sms, phone, but also whatsapp, twitter, facebook... You can export/import your dates to external memory, so if you change your device, you can later restore your dates ! It's very easy to use Keywords : birthday - birthdays - reminder - bday - b'day - annif' - annif – rappel

Have you ever taken a drink order for a group of friends and had to go back and forth to the bar because you forgot someone? Have you ever found a way to remember what your drinks tasted like while on on a trip? With Order4Friends, you have an ideal solution: create your list of drinks, and prepare your order! add photos and/or comments on your favorite drinks You'll impress your friends with just a few clicks! Create your lists of drinks and prepare your orders with just a few clicks !

Free to download, this app gives you all the very latest news, showbiz gossip and sport 24/7 in the palm of your hand. Get your daily horoscope and advice from our agony aunts in our lifestyle section. And whether you are a fan of X Factor or EastEnders, you can follow your favourite show in the TV section. Top Gear's Richard Hammond keeps you up to speed on motoring, with Ian Botham, Barry McGuigan, Tony Parsons and Fiona Phillips, John Cross and Kenny Dalglish among our other star writers. The Mirror app combines the latest cutting edge technology with the wow factor of creative writing skills from the world’s best news writers and columnists. The latest celebrity videos and interviews, live blogs from the hottest events, amazing image galleries, videos and personalised content all at a touch of a button. Now that is wow! The 'My Mirror' homepage is a fantastic addition which allows you to customise the content the way YOU want to see it, when YOU want to see it. So whether you're interested in the latest computer games, film reviews or weird stories, your favourite sections of the Daily Mirror, Sunday Mirror and Mirror Online will be at your fingertips. Share and post your favourite articles to your friends and family via Facebook, Twitter or Email. - Free to download - Offline reading for all articles - 24/7 breaking news stories - Image galleries - Videos - Live Blogging on all major sporting and television events such as X-Factor, The Voice, Olympics and the World Cup - Mirror Football News, Transfers and Live Scores - 3am Celebs and Entertainment *** Got comments on the app? Want to suggest new features? Good or bad, we always want feedback so we can make the app better. E-mail us directly at: mirrorapp@trinitymirror.com Follow Mirror on Facebook and let us know what you think - http://www.facebook.com/dailymirror You can also follow Mirror on http://twitter.com/dailymirror ***
This is the perfect mirror with light and camera. For girls and boys.. for everyone who need an easy to use mirror. Get today for free
Mirror in Mobile

CURIOUS LITTLE MONKEYS HAVE OVERRUN THE FARM The elderly farmer needs YOU to distract the monkeys so he can safely catch and release them back into the jungle. Help the farmer, save the crop, save the farm! AND THEY’RE BRINGING THEIR FRIENDS Monkeys come from the jungle wearing hats, boots, and vests! It’s up to you to discover how to deal with each unique type of monkey. BANANAS, BOXES, AND... DUCKYS!?! The action gets fast and furious! Unlock new funny tools like the Scarecrow or the Cardboard Box and use them in clever combos to keep up with the waves of curious monkeys! Watch the adorable monkeys eat, dig, play, sleep, and more CATCH STARS TO BUY AMAZING UPGRADES Save up your stars because you’ll need everyone of them to buy over 20 upgrades to your tools and to add special abilities TWO FUN FILLED WAYS TO PLAY Normal mode allows young and new players to enjoy the game with challenge without frustration Hard mode is where the deep challenge is, put your skill and strategies to the test

Cute frames! Photos are automatically made cuter (Kawaii)! Over 170 adorable frames for free! Don’t worry if you’ve never done decorations, collage, processing or editing before. ◆MIRUphoto Features◆ - Frames are renewed every week. description: Did you miss flappy bird? Installing so many flappy bird clones, but laggy or full of ads? You've come to the right place! Flappy Escape is a fan made clone of Flappy Bird, we are focusing on gameplay, because it feels different if we made some modification. So, what is the difference with other clones? 1. It's fast. 2. The gameplay is original, no modification that will ruin the feel of flappy bird. 3. It's more rewarding, when your bird dies, you will get experience, and when you get enough experience you will level up, and sometimes get items. 4. It's customizable, the items you get from leveling up can be used to customize your game, changing the pipe, the bird, the background, etc. Well, you can simply say: "it's a more rewarding flappy bird" Credits, because I won't claim that I made everything: http://www.templateswise.com/ for free music loops. http://www.freesound.org/people/jorickhoofd/sounds/180350/ for the nooo sound. http://www.freesound.org/people/fmaudio/sounds/152997/ for the laugh sound. http://www.freesound.org/ for other sounds with 0 licenses, sorry I forgot the link... and most importantly: http://www.kilobolt.com/ for the awesome tutorial :) PS: If you think I forgot to credit your stuff, or maybe you want your stuff to be removed from this game, please contact me at reza@mirwanda.com thank you. For more information, visit Mirwanda Center at http://www.mirwanda.com

WEB BLOCKER PRO IS FREE NOW. Description: Web Blocker block websites, you don't need any special browser, this app will block all request to websites you block. You can use it as distraction blocker, so you can be focused on your work, or something else, it's up to you. + Block website that you don't want to see. + Most web blocking app use special browser, but web blocker is not + You can still using your favorite web browser. Require root access. Pro version features: + Password protect, so other people can't change the settings. + Time protect, so you can't change the settings for specified time (useful if you want to focus on something but always get distracted by some websites). + Icon hider, hide icon from app drawer and access the app from the dialler. If the website still not blocked, turn the internet off, and turn it on again. Still not working? contact the developer. Note: 1. the websites you block will stay blocked if you uninstall this app. so if you no longer want to use this app, make sure to remove all blocks first! 2. you can only block domain and subdomain, like www.example.com or blog.example.com, not a page such as www.example.com/somepages/here (credit to Gio Di Russo) 3. note that blocking example.com won't block www.example.com, and blocking www.example.com won't block blog.example.com. You have to define it one by one (sorry for this limitation). 4. Doesn't work on OPERA or OPERAMINI because they are using server side data. (credit to Mahabub Jitu) 5. I am not taking any of your data, this app doesn't have internet access permission, so there is no way I can do it! (credit to some jerk who said "this app is a scam!") 6. This app doesn't stack with apps that blocking ads (blocking ads is illegal anyway). 7. Does not work on proxy. If you use proxy, please exclude 127.0.0.1 a lot of 1* because people doesn't know how to root... how sad --"
release_text: * Now you can batch-add websites to block * Now the data retain on sdcard, so if you uninstall the app, the data still there * Free and pro version now share the same database

Mishock Studio presents Battery Indicator With the help of chameleon, you will know when your battery is low or just know how much is left to your phone to turn off. A mine sweeper game with mathematical and logical elements to it and with a theme of MineCraft! Note: due yo Google Play new policy the name was changed form "Minecraft Sweeper" to "MC Sweper". This is game is not developed by Mojang and it is not a copy of a Minecraft game by Mojang. Features: + 3 game modes: Adventure, With Food, Classic + extremely large maps (if you like) + multiple lives (survive the accidental clicks) + online score system + zoom in/out The game was featured on Kotaku: http://kotaku.com/minecraft-sweeper/ We were bored with the classical mine sweeper and decided to give more depth. It features 2D mine field where you aim to gather as many resources as possible. But on your way you stumble upon zombies and creepers. Will you succeed to explore the mine and stay alive? This is a minesweeper game. It is a logical puzzle game with elements of mathematics to it. The interface is custom designed for smartphone users - you can play for long periods or for brief moments while waiting for a friend. This game is also unique among other minesweeper games: there are multiple lives, hidden treasures and absurdly large maps. We hope you like it! Compatibility: The game was tested on Nexus like devices. So phones with 800x480+ resolutions and with at least 1GHz processors should be able to play the game without any problems. The game will run on other devices but please let us know if you encounter any problems (via email please). Authors: K.Misiunas and T.Misiunas (brothers)
release_text: A major update v2.0. Thanks for all your suggestions! + Improvements for Adventure mode + Support for hi-end devices and Android 4+ + Online Leaderboard! Who is the best? + Achievements for stunts you do in game + Lava no more. Meet the Enderman! + Performance and bug fixes

description: This is a classic minesweeper game. It features: - Four map sizes: from small to infinite - Pleasant gaming experience - Score system - Zoom in/out (via menu button) - And all the usual things you would expect from minesweeper game This game was developed because I did not find a minesweeper game that was pleasant to play on Android. I hope this game has everything a minesweeper fan could want. I hope you like it. Leave a comment if you do ;) Compatibility note: Tested on Nexus like devices. Should work on all devices. However, if you find problem on your device email me and I might be able to fix it.
release_text: - More contrast between tool selection buttons. To prevent accidental detonations. - Back an replay options offered after the game - Shows current game statistics among other High Scores - More languages!

description: Al-Mishbah is an Android Application. Using Al-Mishbah you can read al-Qur'an, and 9 major hadith collections (Shahih Bukhari, Shahih Muslim, Al-Muwaththa', Musnad Ahmad, Sunan At-Tirmidzi, Sunan an-Nasa'i, Sunan Ibnu Majah, Sunan Abu Dawud and Sunan Ad-Darimi). Al-Mishbah display hadith in arabic and its translation in Bahasa Indonesia. you can read, bookmark, add note, and search hadith by using this app. may Allah SWT records my effort in creating this app as amal hasana, good deeds. aamiin catatan: Jika aplikasi crash dan tidak bisa dijalankan setelah update, mohon uninstall dan install ulang aplikasinya dari play store. --- petunjuk: 1. klik/touch salah satu kitab untuk membaca dan meload data kitab saat pertama kali di baca, lakukan untuk masing-masing kitab untuk memastikan data di load dalam database. 2. klik/touch nama perawi hadits yang berwarna biru untuk mendapatkan informasi yang berkenaan dengan perawi dan sanad hadits 3. klik/touch icon search untuk melakukan pencarian (note: pencarian hanya dilakukan pada kitab hadits yang telah di load datanya, oleh karena itu sebaiknya anda membuka/klik semua kitab hadits terlebih dahulu agar semua data tersimpan dalam database) 4. klik/touch menu untuk mendapatkan berbagai menu, bookmarks, daftar isi, notes, share, help dsb 5. klik/touch atau geser kebawah tulisan note yang berwarna hijau untuk menambahkan note. 6. saat search anda bisa menspesifikasikan/membatasi search pada kitab tertentu saja atau semuanya. 7. buka daftar bookmarks dari menu->bookmarks/note , dan delete bookmarks dengan mengklik button silang berwarna merah ( X ) disamping bookmark/notes 8. swipe gesture untuk navigasi antar hadits/ayat al-Qur'an, atau gunakan top bar panah kiri/kanan. 9. pembacaan al-Qur'an dari kanan ke kiri, seekbar digeser dari kanan ke kiri. 10. pembacaan hadits dari kanan ke kiri. 11. silahkan di eksplorasi fitur-fitur lainnya, dan minta saran dan laporan bugs-nya 12. aplikasi ini gratis dan tanpa ads di dalamnya untuk membaca al-Qur'dan dan 450 hadits, selebihnya dikenakan biaya yang sesuai 13. menu->setting->text untuk setting text aksara arab maupun terjemah.
release_text: - Add arabic font selections - Al-Qur'an translation alignment improvement - performance improvement and many bugs fixed don't hesitate to contact me at hakimrie@gmail.com if you encounter an issue or have a good idea to improve this app. Jazaakallah Ahsanal Jazaa'

100만 유저가 선택해 주셨습니다. 웹툰 모음의 원조!! 항상 웹툰모아를 애용해 주셔서 감사합니다!! (__); 네이버, 다음, 네이트, 스포츠 신문 등의 웹툰 , 카툰 , 만화를 간단히 볼수 있도록 한 어플 입니다. 간편하게 웹툰과 만화를 즐겨보세요~ 책갈피와 이어보기 기능으로 한층 편하게 웹툰을 보실 수 있습니다. 국내의 모든 웹툰이 총 망라 되어 있구요. 꾸준히 테마웹툰과 추천웹툰이 업그레이드 되고 있습니다. 유명한 웹툰 작가들도 쉽게 만나실 수 있습니다. 기능을 간소화 하고, 사이즈도 줄여 더욱 가벼워진 웹툰 모아 SPEED 버젼도 따로 올렸습니다. 보다 간소하고 빠르게 즐기실 분은 웹툰모아 SPEED 버젼을 설치하시면 문제 없이 좀 더 빠르게 사용하실 수 있습니다. 편의를 위한 기능을 지속적으로 추가할 예정입니다. 메일로 좋은 의견과 건의사항 주신분들께 진심으로 감사드립니다.

description: 동요에 맞춰서 피아노(Piano) 건반을 따라 칠수 있는 어플입니다. 음표를 따라 누르시면 됩니다. 녹색 음표는 현재 누를 건반을 표시하는 것이고, 하늘색 음표는 그 다음 누를 건반을 미리 표시해주는 것입니다. 피아노( piano ) 종류를 선택할수 있으며, 나비야, 학교종, 비행기, 산토끼, 곰세마리, 퐁당퐁당, 똑같아요, 바둑이 방울, 자전거, 작은별, 꼬마눈사람, 우산, 무지개, 창밖을 보라, 기쁘다 구주오셨네, 에델바이스, 동네한바퀴,주먹쥐고 등의 동요를 선택할 수 있습니다. 아이들과 함께 피아노(piano)를 따라 치면서 동요도 같이 부른다면, 참 좋아할거에요!! 피아노 뿐 아니라, 오르간, 하모니카, 아코디언, 기타, 실로폰 등의 다양한 악기소리로 연주가 가능합니다. 즐겁게 피아노를 연주해 보아요~ According to sway Piano (Piano) is a beat that application in accordance with the keys. The press according to the note. Green notes are currently pressed key Is to show, sky blue note is that the keyboard and then press preview display. Are allowed to select the piano (piano) type, Here, kitty, school bells, airplane, hares, birds gomse, My Mother, like everybody, Badugi drops, bicycles, little star, little snowman, umbrella, rainbow, look out your window, Joy to the World, Edelweiss, neighborhood around, fists clenched, such as agitation You can select. If beating along the piano (piano) with children also sang as agitation, that's true love! As well as piano, organ, harmonica, accordion, guitar, you can play a variety of instruments such as the xylophone sounds. Spy fun playing the piano -

description: A plane full of friends off to bask in the sun Adventure cut short with a blast from a gun They crash but survive and get frozen in ice, If poachers will find them, they won't be nice! In this artisanal physics puzzler, your mission is clear. Swipe your finger to cut the ice and save the animals. Every level is designed to present you a new challenge and level of difficulty is gradually increased. - Test your intelligence by completing over 90 action-packed levels which are easy to play but challenging to master. - The fewer the cuts you use, the higher is your score. - Compelling characters and lots of achievements to unlock! - Villains, heroes, superpowers, achievements and second chances – there is a lot to discover in this strategic puzzle game. - Manage your inventory to add and unlock achievements and powers that you can use against the poachers. - Enjoy the realistic physics of the falling ice - Upgrade your characters by purchasing different kinds of perks and use them during the game. You can also use your Google account to share your high scores and achievements with your friends.
release_text: 1.06 - Bug fixes 1.05 - Tapjoy + new year elements

description: Preschool children will love creating and saving their art from three activities in Kids Painting: - Drawing: the child can use many colors to free-style draw anything! - Coloring: select a picture and fill in spaces by switching the paint colors until it looks just right! (13 categories in the full version; two in the lite version). - Train Your Memory: children are challenged to remember the colors they see in a picture, and then recreate it using the colors that they initially saw (30 pictures in the full version; four in the lite version). -Gallery: view the art that was saved.

Preschool children will love creating and saving their art from three activities in Kids Painting: - Drawing: the child can use many colors to free-style draw anything! - Coloring: select a picture and fill in spaces by switching the paint colors until it looks just right! (13 categories in the full version, two in the lite version). - Train Your Memory: children are challenged to remember the colors they see in a picture, and then recreate it using the colors that they initially saw (30 pictures in the full version, four in the lite version). -Gallery: view the art that was saved

Rescue Roby is an exciting new physics-based puzzle game designed by Runaway Studios - the casual play division of the preeminent app developer, Intellijoy. Runaway Studios' mission is to create a new category of handcrafted artisanal game apps, complete with one-of-a-kind immersive narratives, stunning graphics and unique game mechanics designed to inspire mobile gamers all over the world. ★ Features ★ ● A brain-teasing puzzler, Rescue Roby offers a unique robot-themed narrative, stunning graphics, realistic physics, compelling characters, and addictive and diverse game mechanics that will provide hours of mobile gaming fun! ● This challenging brain teaser comes complete with 4 dynamic chapters and 180+ play levels that pack a punch by getting harder as you advance. ★ The Story ★ Rescue Roby will take you on a wild, fantastical ride. Quirky yet adorable, Roby fails the quality inspection because of his odd looks and eccentric behavior. Instead of being shipped to his new owners, Roby is condemned to the scrap metal bin. ★ Your Mission ★ Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to help Roby avoid his fate and escape the robot factory. This task is not for the faint of heart, as you'll soon discover. Roby must either use or take abuse from moving conveyor belts, suspended scaffolding, exploding boxes and giant magnets that quickly attract all metal objects (including robots) into their magnetic field. Escape is just a crane ride away. Help Roby get into the box, and he'll get carried to the next level. ★ Our Mission ★ Stay tuned for new updates including: more addicting game zones, play mechanics, obstacles + challenges and more advanced play levels to extend your mobile fun.
release_text: 1.8 - Buf fixes and improvements. 1.7 - ‘Super Powers’ to help a player succeed in passing the levels - Bug fix - Reduced weight of the game 1.6 - Heyzap achievements were added! 1.5 - 100 brand new levels were added! Once you reach level 71 in the new Love Story chapter, you'll be helping Colonel Green meet Major Robashka! 1.4 - Added capability to import progress from the Free version - Bug fixes

description: The Technical Indicators Dictionary is your place for finding useful information on the most popular technical indicators available. It is designed to introduce the concept of technical indicators and explain how to use them in your analysis. It also shows how to read oscillators and explain how signals are derived. If you are in the stock or Forex market, this information will help you be a better trader.

Welcome to the Miss KL App - your one-stop shop for a killer retail and fabulous lifestyle experience! Miss KL is the brand new, ladies-only sister site of streetwear powerhouse, Karmaloop.com. The Miss KL app features 250 cutting edge women's clothing, shoes, accessories and beauty brands, including Jeffrey Campbell, Wildfox, Stila, Cheap Monday and Free People in an elegant, easy to use format. The Miss KL App has intuitive browsing and great zooming, sorting, and sharing features all wrapped up in a beautiful package! We are The Originators. Shop. Party. Play.

description: PlayerX Pro- The best video player.I believe we can surprise you again and again. Main features: 1) Automatically scan SDCard video files and generate thumbnails. 2) Snapshot:you can get and save snapshot of video,when playing. 3) Multi-floating windows : Support multiple floating windows video at the same time 4) Pinch to zoom : Easily zoom in and out by pinching and swiping across the screen. 5) Preview when seeking : Seeking video, it will pop up a small window preview of the video. 6) Child lock:long click the lock button,Lock input. 7) Hardware decoding: Have the latest hardware decoder, more videos can benefit from hardware acceleration. 8) Multicore & multithreaded decoding: PlayerX Pro is the Android video player which supports multi-core and multithreaded decoding. is a multi-core and multi-threaded decoding video player. Test result proved that dual-core device’s performance is better up to 70% than that of single-core devices. 9) Support almost all video files,such as:webm,m3u8, avi, flv, mkv, mov, mpg, mts, mp4, m4v, rmvb, rm,wmv, 3gp, flac, vob, f4v and so on.. 10) Support multiple languages:German,French,Russian,Polish,English,Japanese,Chinese(Simplified &Traditional).

Mister Gadget è un gioco che è diventato un sistema di comunicazione multimediale. E' un programma alla radio, in onda su Radio Number One ogni settimana: la domenica alle 12 e alle 23, il lunedì alle 21. E' un canale youtube, in cui trovate tutte le prove prodotto che faccio, in cui la parola d'ordine è riuscire a trasmettere le esatte sensazioni d'uso dei vari terminali, cercando di concentrarmi sulla user experience più che sulle specifiche del terminale. Mister Gadget è anche una rubrica mensile, pubblicata dall'edizione italiana di Maxim, ogni mese in edicola. Infine è questo blog, che non è un sito di informazione, ma un centro di incrocio delle informazioni. L'esperienza di tutti è fondamentale per il confronto. CHANGELOG versione 1.0.0 - prima versione stabile versione 1.1.0 - aggiunta la sezione "Flash News" - corretto il mio sito nelle "Info sulla app" versione 1.2.0 - risolti bug minori versione 1.3.0 - aggiunta la sezione "Contatti" versione 1.3.1 - corretta la scritta "Tutti i prederiti" in "Tutti i preferiti" versione 1.4.0 - risolti bug minori - nuovo effetto menù laterale versione 1.5.0 - aggiunta la possibilità di commentare direttamente dalla app versione 1.6.0 - modificata la sezione news per problemi tecnici dovuti al sito www.lucaviscardi.eu versione 1.7.0 - rimesse le vecchie sezioni del blog - numero di commenti a ogni articolo - risolti bug minori versione 1.8.0 - aggiunta sezione Radio, con la possibilità di ascoltare e scaricare i Podcast della trasmissione di Mister Gadget su Radio Numer One - nuovo navigation drawer - aggiunto il tira per aggiornare - aggiunte impostazioni Applicazione creata da: Raphael Bussa Twitter: @rebus_007 Sito Web: www.rebus007.tk Mr. Gadget is a game that has become a multimedia communication system. It 'a radio program, broadcast on Radio Number One every week: Sundays at 12 and 23, on Monday at 21. It 'a youtube channel, where you will find all the evidence that I produced, where the watchword is able to convey the exact feelings of use of various terminals, trying to focus on the user experience rather than on the specific terminal. Mr. Gadget is also a monthly column, published by the Italian edition of Maxim, on newsstands every month. Finally is this blog, which is not a site of information, but a center of intersection of the information. The experience of all is essential for comparison. CHANGELOG version 1.0.0 - First stable version version 1.1.0 - Added the section "Flash News" - Correct my site in the "Info app" version 1.2.0 - Fixed minor bugs version 1.3.0 - Added the "Contacts" section version 1.3.1 - Corrected the text "All prederiti" in "All Favorites" version 1.4.0 - Fixed minor bugs - New effect side menu version 1.5.0 - Added the ability to comment directly from the app version 1.6.0 - Changed the news section for technical problems due to the site www.lucaviscardi.eu version 1.7.0 - Remittances old sections of the blog - Number of comments on each article - Fixed minor bugs version 1.8.0 - Added section Radio, with the ability to listen and download the podcast broadcast on Radio Mister Gadget Numer One - New navigation drawer - Added the push to update - Added settings Application created by: Raphael Knocks Twitter: @ rebus_007 Website: www.rebus007.tk

description: Free Version of Party Wave, an Action Surfing Game Developed by Mistwalker. There are two elements in playing Party Wave: paddling and surfing. For paddling, touch surfers and drag them to a spot where the surf breaks, while avoiding the obstacles such as dolphins and turtles. And for surfing, touch surfers to make them turn and jump to prevent wipeouts. Let's enjoy Party Wave with the surfing crowd and the board-riding dog, Skip, while getting valuable bonuses from Hiso Alien.

description: Welcome to a new world of Flashcards. AR Flashcards make learning fun with the technology of Augmented Reality! "It’s definitely unique and a very clever way to get children involved in learning the alphabet and animal names." - TheiPhoneMom.com “Through the use of augmented reality (AR) and flashcards – this app allows your children to learn in a new and exciting way! A new approach to flashcards!” - Digital Mom Blog “My daughter was repeating the letters and animal names and I could tell that she was learning a lot from this app, which of course is what is most important to me as a parent.” – MidwesternMoms.com “Children will love playing around with the cards and animals while learning the letters of the alphabet.” – Appysmarts.com "I absolutely love this unique twist on flashcards. I really think the novelty of AR, in this case, will help capture kids’ attention and get them primed to learn." -FunFindsForFamilies.com AR Flashcards are a new way to interact and make Flash cards more entertaining for toddlers and preschoolers. With AR Flashcards, learning is fun! When you point your device at the printed flashcard a beautifully rendered 3D animal will pop up on the screen. Tap the animal to hear the letter and animal name. Sometimes to get a good view of the 3D Models it is sometimes necessary to use the camera's autofocus. Double tap on the screen to bring up the focus option. Features: - 26 beautifully rendered Animals to help your toddler or preschooler learn the alphabet! - 6 beautifully rendered Dinosaurs! - Tap on each Animal to hear the Letter and name of the Animal! - Tap on each Dinosaurs to hear what it is! - Tap the screenshot button to save your pics of the beautiful AR animals! - Double tap the screen to bring up the focus button so that you can adjust your device's camera to better bring up the animals. - You can print out the flashcards or if you own two Android devices you can access the flashcards from within the app in a beautiful swipeable gallery! - Works on both phones and Tablets! *Note* You must visit http://www.arflashcards.com/ to download and print the free Flashcard Markers necessary to make this app work. Make sure to print the flashcards in color as they will not work in black and white. This app will only work on devices with a camera.

description: Barclays Remote Deposit allows customers to conveniently make deposits electronically with an Android. Just take a photo of the front and back of the check and send it to Barclays. It’s that easy. Enjoy the following benefits and features: • Save time by making deposits when it’s convenient for you, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week • Accelerate access to your money by making your deposits sooner • Deposit your checks safely and securely • Easy-to-use app guides you through the process Get started now: • Download the Barclays Remote Deposit app • Call Barclays Customer Care at 888-710-8756 to enroll • Start making deposits using your Android Questions? Please call Barclays Customer Care at 888-710-8756. We’re here to help you Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm, Eastern Time.

By selecting Install, you are consenting to the installation of RBC Bank (U.S) Remote Deposit. You are entitled to and are consenting to future updates or upgrades to RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit , which may be automatically installed as per your device or operating system default or user-initiated settings. You may withdraw your consent by deleting RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit from your smartphone. With RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit, you can take the bank with you wherever you go! It’s a convenient service that lets you use your smartphone to securely make electronic deposits to your RBC Bank (U.S.) checking or savings account. HOW TO ENROLL: 1. Download the mobile app to your smartphone. 2. Call us at 1-800 ROYAL 5-3 (1-800-769-2553) to get your temporary user name and password. 3. Sign in to our U.S. Remote Deposit website at https://xpressdeposit.com/xd/?bid=114098099 to set up your preferred user name, password, and security questions. 4. Accept the Terms and Conditions. HOW TO MAKE A DEPOSIT: To deposit your check, first endorse (sign) the back of your check, and below your signature, write the words “For Deposit Only RBC Bank RDC.” 1. Open the Remote Deposit application and sign in using the Remote Deposit user ID and personal identification number that you established at enrollment. 2. Select Deposit and the Account. Then enter the amount. 3. Take pictures of both the front and back of the endorsed check, making sure you get all four corners of the check in the picture. 4. Click Continue. You’ll receive a message that the upload is successful. 5. Select Submit to view the deposit confirmation. It’s that easy! We'll send you an email to let you know we've received your deposit, and we'll follow up with an email confirmation once your deposit has been processed and the funds are in your account. RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit lets you view the last five days of deposit activity! For more transaction history or other money transfer and bill payment features, sign in to RBC Bank (U.S.) Online Banking. More Information Whenever You Need It Remember, you can always visit rbcbank.com to: • Obtain information about RBC Bank, learn about products and services, and see our latest offers and promotions • Access timely financial information and cross-border advice specific to your cross-border banking needs • Obtain important client information and forms PRIVACY: Your consent and acknowledge that RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit performs functions that require permission to access to the camera on your mobile device to take a photo of the check to be deposited. The best pro DJ app on Android. Mix tracks in perfect sync on a powerful audio engine. Engineered by Mixvibes, digital DJing pioneer for 15 years. -30% FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY FULL VERSION, ALL FX INCLUDED - NO ADDITIONAL PURCHASES, NO POP-UPS "An impressive app" The Guardian “Challenging our notions of what can be done on a touchscreen” Android Police "Good looks, great sounding FX, great sync engine, ‘slip’ mode, proper loops and cues." DJ TechTools /// MIX IN PERFECT SYNC • Accurate BPM detection of your music, down to the last decimal. • Stable Sync: one-press, and the 2 tracks never go out of phase. • Split Mono: Pre-listen your music tracks before mixing them. • Progressive, manual pitch bend. • Customizable, manual pitch range (4, 8, 16, 32, 100%). • Accurate Beat-grid editing: make any track sync properly • Parallel waveforms mode to visually check if your tracks are synced. • New Quantize feature : hot cues and loops are automatically set on the beat. • Smart-seek: Tap on the waveform to fast-forward & get a seamless jump. • Automix: Let Cross DJ mix your tracks and play music automatically, from any sources (playlist, album, etc.) • External mixer: control EQs and crossfader with hardware mixers. /// OUTSTANDING AUDIO PERFORMANCE • Best mix performance for an Android DJ app. • Low latency: music reacts instantly to your actions. • Extremely realistic scratch sound as on real turntables. • 15 effects (Bi-filter, Low-pass, Hi-Pass, Delay, Echo, Phaser, Flanger, Cut, Crush, Bliss, Brake, Roll, etc.) • Keylock mode: change BPM without affecting the tone • No load time when starting-up the app. • Autogain: automatically equalizes the levels of 2 tracks. • SoundCloud integration: Play streamed tracks in seconds. • Keylock mode: change BPM without affecting the tone • Key detection: detect the key of the songs and know which tracks sound good together. /// INTUITIVE INTERFACE • 2 turntables, full-fledged 3-band EQ mixer - with DJM EQ preset. • Sampler: 12 sample banks + possibility to record your own samples. • Mix Soundcloud: Explore, play and mix all SoundCloud. • New Waveform view: scratch & see the music + set cue accurately. • Separate Tabs: swipe to display different panels on each side. • Quantized loops: loops triggered with the sampler are synced to main player • Large buttons, optimized for small screens. • Crossfader with 3 modes: cut, autofade, normal. • This music player is compatible with MP3s, AAC, FLAC and more. • Multiple sorting options: Sort your library by title, artist, album, BPM or length. • History pane: display previously mixed tracks. • Navigation by folder. • Adjust the tempo by moving the turntable forward / backward. • Large control pads: XY effect pad, 16 hot-cues pads. • HQ live recording of your mixes. • Display remaining time of your tracks. • Optimized for mobile & tablet. • Mix Soundcloud : Explore, play and mix all SoundCloud. No premium account needed. • Optimized for Intel processors. /// MINIMUM CONFIGURATION REQUIRED • Android 4.1 • 4" screen • RAM: 1GB • Dual-core processor /// MORE VIDEOS Cross DJ with an external mixer: http://youtu.be/oZnSzX_UnkE Cross DJ user videos: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CQj_sYw7ml8&list=PLj1938JIqZA4VjrPLgvJtiLFyFIvwaw6H&feature=share /// GO NEXT LEVEL Cross DJ for laptop: www.mixvibes.com/products/cross Youtube: www.youtube.com/mixvibes Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/+mixvibes/posts Facebook: www.facebook.com/mixvibes

description: MPL - Mizcoin Premier League - The Best Cricket game of the season is back again. For the first time ever you will experience the thrill and excitement of MULTIPLAYER gaming. MPL Cricket Fever Game 2014 : For Every CRICKET fan out there, the ULTIMATE CRICKET game of the season 2014 is here. This game has some of the best graphics which makes you an addict of the game even more. Fantastic controls that make the whole experience so real that you would keep playing it for hours. MULTIPLAYER GAMING For the first time in history of cricket games you will be able to play against your friends in real time. Challenge your friends online and beat them to show what you got. A maximum of 4 players and minimum of 2 players can play the multiplayer match. RULES FOR MULTIPLAYER After every 2 overs , player with least score will be knocked out.Last man standing wins the Multiplayer match. Winning is decided based on these simple rules in same order of priority : -Maximum runs -Least wickets -Maximum sixes -Maximum fours -Least dot balls -If all these criteria's are same for both players then the player with highest previous over score wins. WIN COINS Whenever you win a single player match or a multiplayer match you win COINS which helps you play in bigger Multiplayer tournaments. TOURNAMENT MODE Now you have got 2 TOURNAMENT formats to choose from and play as you like. Choose any team and play the MPL 2014 tournament. Beat the teams and take home the MPL Trophy. PLAY QUICK MATCH When you do not have a lot of time and just want a quick dose of cricket game, choose this and quickly start & beat your opponent.You have the options to choose from 8 teams. PLAY PRACTICE MATCH Amateur ? Don't worry, Practice match helps you understand the ease of shots and makes you familiar with the stadium and pitch..!! Take your time and get ready for the ultimate Tournament. PLAY MASTER BLASTER MODE You don't have a target to chase. So score as much as you can & top the leaderboards. DETAILED STATS This game has the most detailed stats possible and has all the updated score. Over by over stats of bowlers and batsmen to create an experience you will love. FANTASTIC SOUNDS The most authentic sounds ever heard in any cricket game. DIFFICULTY LEVELS You've got 3 difficulty levels to choose from , Easy, Medium, Hard. So if you think you've mastered the game you can challenge yourself with the Hard level. OVER SELECTION You can also select the number of Overs that you wish to play. In a hurry ? Try the new 5 over format. USP : # Multiplayer gaming # Newest tournaments # To date, the best Cricket game of the season 2014. # The game is easy to play. # Really Addictive and can lower down your productivity # Stats covering every aspect of the Match # High quality graphics What are you waiting for ? Download and enjoy..!! Disclaimer : @2014 MPL Cricket Fever 2014 , MPL (Mizcoin Premier League) Sports are the trade marks of Mizcoin Technologies Pvt. Ltd.All rights reserved.All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.No player, team, association or organization endorses or is associated or connected with this software product in any way and we make no representation of any such endorsement ,association or connection.No image or likeness of any player, club, association or organization is used in this software product.And any similarity with any graphical element is coincidental.All statistics are researched or computer generated and intended to be fair.They are not intended to be and should not be relied upon or considered a true reflection of the abilities or performance of any individual player.

description: Got time to waste? Didn’t think so. Download My Cricket and you can manage your Cricket wireless service quickly and easily on the go. This handy app lets you: • View your Wireless data usage  • Pay your bill • Add or remove wireless account features • Set up and manage Auto Pay • Contact customer care It’s how we give you a little time back, and a lot less hassle. To use this app you’ll need: •A GSM smartphone •An active Cricket account •Network or Wi-Fi connection If you are an original Cricket (CDMA) customer, you will need to switch to the new Cricket (GSM) network and register first before being able to sign in to this app. Visit us at http://mycrk.it/smile to learn more about switching.

description: Some voicemails are important. Others are a waste of time. We designed Cricket Visual Voicemail to help you see your way to the messages that matter. Visual Voicemail lets you: • View a list of your voicemail messages on your phone’s screen • Play, delete, or save messages in any order you choose • Pause, stop, replay and fast forward messages while playing • Reply to messages by return call, text message, or email • Easily change your recorded greeting • Save important messages to your phone or memory card. Important to know: Receiving voicemail on the Visual Voicemail app will not count against your high-speed data quota. Downloading this app and responding to voicemails using email will count against your high-speed data quota. Questions? Visit https://www.cricketwireless.com/support/apps-and-services/manage-my-voicemail/customer/voicemail.html

description: This is a new task manager from the makers of 'Auto Task Manager' that has the great slogan: Configure Once And Safe Battery Life Forever! Its features: - Automatically stop all unused tasks/programs/services when the display of your device goes to black (turns off / sleep) - One complete overview of all your applications currently installed on the device - Directly see how much memory each active applications is using - One click task killing - ROOT supported for extra aggressive task killing - Many options to configure this automatic task killer to your needs - It can automatically add newly installed applications to the auto kill list - It's free, and supports all android versions - Does not need any internet access! this app is completely safe, what's on your devices, stays on your device - Optimized to use a small memory footprint while in the background - List is searchable by typing the first letters of the task on the (onscreen)keyboard - Many more.. Try it and start saving some battery now! When installed please read the in-app Help to get more information of how to use it, it's under the MENU !!Be Careful!! It is possible (when using a rooted device or an older android version before 2.2) to kill tasks that are system critical, this can result in a reboot of your device at most. Some search keywords for the market-index: taskmanager, killer, task, manager, taskkiller, auto, autotask, autokiller, advanced, advancedtaskmanager, tasker, pro, protask, promanager
release_text: - made compatible with newer devices (yay!) - fixed the notify after screen-on

description: Luister nu de meest populaire radiozenders van Nederland op uw mobiel! Voor meer opties in de App gebruik de Menu knop om bijvoorbeeld naar de Help of Instellingen te gaan. Hier leest u ook over hoe de lijst gesorteerd kan worden. Deze applicatie biedt een overzicht van de meest populaire radio zenders uit NL zoals Radio 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, Radio Veronica, Radio 10, 3FM, Radio 538, JuizeFM, FunX, Classic FM, Pinguin Radio, Slam FM, BNR, 100% NL, Decibel, DeepFM, NLRADIO, QMusic, Radio 8 FM, Puur NL, Arrow Classic Rock, FreshFM, Feel Good, RTV Oost, BEAM, Delta FM, Freeminded, Calista en vele anderen. Heeft u geen FM ontvanger in uw mobiel? Of zoekt u al tijden naar die ene thema zender van een omroep? Of wilt u via de Chromecast radio luisteren? Installeer dan NLRadio en luister naar uw favoriete radio zender! Dit is GEEN applicatie die de FM zenders kan ontvangen, deze applicatie maakt gebruik van het internet - u heeft dus WIFI en/of een databundel nodig om gebruik te maken van deze applicatie. Lees de Help (menu->help) in de applicatie om meer informatie te krijgen over het gebruik en het melden van eventuele problemen. De permissions die nodig zijn: - Internet: Dit is nodig om verbinding te kunnen maken met de radio zenders die hun geluid aanbieden via internet. - Telefoon status: Dit is nodig om het afspelen automatisch te stoppen als u wordt gebeld. In de toekomst zullen er meer zenders toegevoegd worden. Deze applicatie is GRATIS! en bevat GEEN! advertenties. Mist u een station of heeft u zelf een radio station? Ga dan naar nlradio.mizusoft.com en voeg uw station gratis toe aan de App! Listen now the most popular radio stations in the Netherlands on your mobile! For more options in the app using the menu button for example to go. Visit the Help and Settings It also tells you about how the list can be sorted. This application provides an overview of the most popular radio stations in NL as Radio 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, Radio Veronica, Radio 10, 3FM, Radio 538, JuizeFM, FunX, Classic FM, Pinguin Radio, Slam FM , BNR, 100% NL, Decibel, DeepFM, NLRADIO, QMusic, 8 FM Radio, Pure NL, Arrow Classic Rock, FreshFM, Feel Good, RTV Oost, BEAM, Delta FM, Free Minded, Calista and many others. Do not have FM receiver in your mobile? Or are you looking for ages for that one theme of a broadcasting station? Whether you want to listen through the Chrome Cast radio? Install NLRadio and listen to your favorite radio station! This is NOT an application that can receive FM stations, this application uses the internet - so you have WIFI and / or data collection needed to make this application use. Read the Help (menu> help) in the application to get information about the use and reporting any problems more information. The permissions required are: - Internet: This is necessary to make the radio stations that offer their audio via the Internet. - Phone status: This is necessary to stop if someone calls you. Playing automatically In the future, more channels will be added. This application is FREE! and contains NO! ads. Are you missing a drive or do you own a radio station? Go to nlradio.mizusoft.com and add your station to free the App!

description: If all you want is a simple and fast (push) notification on your mobile when an event was triggered without spamming your inbox and keeping track of mailinglists etc... read on.... Push 4 Free is a very clean and simple push service as a server and client solution. It is my answer to all the "free" push services (including GCM) where you eventually have to pay for each message send (!!). You will need to install a P4F server to connect. This is only the client for receiving the notifications. More information can be found on the github p4f site: https://github.com/cybertim/push4free The whole protocol, android app and webservice are GPLv2.

You will need ROOT for this application. Change the mapping of your QWERTY Android Device. Update your T699 sec_keypad.kl easy with this application. Just click on the entry to change and select the new keycode. Probably also compatible with other devices besides the Samsung Relay 4G The '.kl' file can be changed in the settings of this application App is opensource code is available on https://github.com/cybertim/hkeymap

* Notice * Please read the FAQ before commenting/rating - your issue is probably listed here with a solution! The Q&A is BELOW. (click more and scroll down) * About * Choose from a list of 35+ ambient sounds which include thunder, lightning, stopwatch, white noise, ocean, sea, birds, rain, crickets and other bugs, frogs, water, airco and other mechanical noises, nature... and many more. Change the independent track volumes and create your own unique relax melody! * Features * - Custom Presets - Count Down counter - Alarm Clock (with SleepBot) - Fade Out and much more.. * Faq * Q: Something doesn't work or force closes! A: Instead of rating us low, please send us an email with some information about your device and the problem. We will try our best to solve it. Q: Why does relax and sleep need the 'read phone state' permission? A: To mute Relax and Sleep when an incoming call is detected, this permission is needed. Q: Some sounds won't work / the list has sounds checked that do not work? A: Please uninstall the application and download/install it again from the market, this will solve the issue. Q: Is there SD Card support? A: Yes there is. Go to Settings->Applications->Manage Applications and choose Relax and Sleep. A 'Move To SD' card button is there waiting to be pressed. Q: Can i set my own alarm sound? A: This is only possible with the plus expansion, click on menu,preferences and read the instructions for more information. Q: Can i add my own sound? A:This is only possible with the plus expansion, click on menu,preferences and read the instructions for more information OR you can send us an email with your request and we will add it to our wish-list for a future release.
release_text: - Interface is made more modern - minor bug fixes - 4.1+ devices should work again

description: * This is an unlock license for Relax and Sleep original version (not for with II) !! If you have issues opening the application please read the Q&A because this is an upgrade to the original free relax and sleep application - you will need both applications installed - and please use the launcher from the free version - always have both versions up to date !! Add the following functions to the original *free* Relax and Sleep: + Choose three custom sounds + Choose a custom alarm tone + Expand to 12 preset slots + Give preset slots a name + Auto load & play preset on start + Auto load countdown timer on start + Custom default begin volume And support the development of the original *free* Relax And Sleep. Please install Relax and Sleep (search in market) first to try it out for *free* Q&A * There is no launcher icon for Plus - please install Relax and Sleep original version and the Plus version from the market. Relax and Sleep will get all the extra features when you open the preferences panel in Relax and Sleep * Force closes when you go into the preferences? Please update both apps from the market - plus and free.
release_text: !USE APP LAUNCHER FROM THE FREE VERSION, THIS APP DOES NOT HAVE ITS OWN LAUNCHER, IT UNLOCKS FUNCTIONS IN THE ORIGINAL FREE VERSION! + updated for newer android devices UI + added extra custom sounds

description: * 50+ Ambient sounds that suite any mood! * With a completely new modern interface to quickly create your own mixes! * Individually mix unlimited sound loops * Alarm and Countdown timer included with Fade-out function * Wake up alarm with Fade-in function * Save your own mixes as preset for later use * Lot's of configurable settings * A handy alarm clock to use every night * Extra sound packs available as upgrade Relax and Sleep is already used by more then three million relaxed people around the globe! Version II (2) now comes with a completely redesigned modern user interface to suit your needs. * No extra upgrades needed * No ads or banners * No internet access needed It's 100% free and functional. Unlimited mix presets and alarms can be saved. It's our gift to get you relaxed. Join the relaxing revolution and create your own personal mix to get relaxed, sleepy, focused, active.. Choose from 50+ seamless looping sounds like: birds, frogs, crickets, air conditioning, wind chimes, rain, thunder, storm, wind, the ocean, creeks, water, piano playnig, guitar songs, monk chants, white noise, brown noise, lightning, night bugs, loons, owls, clocks, train, dripping, wolves howling... mix them together with endless possibilities. If something is not working correctly, instead of rating us low or leaving a comment, send us an email. We will always try our best to solve any issue. Contact information can be found below.
