Would you like to have a NBA most valued player to be your basketball coach? We are not joking, you can! In this app, you will get to know Michael Jordan's secrets to basketball offense and defense. MJ will demonstrate to you his: basketball stance, basketball shooting, basketball driving, basketball handling, triple threat, fade away, jumping, mental preparation, and much more! Enhance your basketball practice with this app. Now grab your Basketball lessons & tips, from The Greatest Basketball Player Ever - Michael Jordan!

Tilt Monster is an endless runner game consisting of a cute monster swerving left and right to avoid the dangerous monsters from harming it while collecting gems. As the monster, you must get as many gems in a row as possible to increase your score while carefully avoiding the bombs, ponds, and monsters wishing finish you and your cuteness. Find you inner monster but make sure its sheer addictiveness doesn't consume you. This addicting game can be tough but with a bit of practice, you'll get a hang of it in no time at all. This is the second app released by 13-year-old developer Moksh Jawa, CEO of MJ Apps. Objective: Collect as many gems while avoiding monsters and losing lives. Features: -multiple difficulty levels -2 different themes -4 power-ups -4 characters -7 leaderboards to compare yourself with the world -33 achievements to unlock -Facebook and Google+ integration Check out MJ Apps at facebook.com/mjapps

Music Player for Android. It gives you a simple and fast access to your music collections in android device. It has essential features like music browsing and managing playlists. Key Features: » Browse and play music by Albums, Artists, Genres, Songs and Folder » Play list management: supports adding entire songs by album, artist or genres to the playlist » Formats supported: AAC, AMR, FLAC, MP3, MIDI, Vorbis and PCM » Five band equalizer and Bass Boost » Lock Screen Widget (Android 4.0 and above) » Home screen Widget (4x1)

Mahjong and Friends 16 tiles edition. Beta version. Mahjong newbie please try the 13 tiles “Mahjong and Friends Free” to get through the basic rules 1st. *When playing in network mode, ALWAYS use the same version for all devices, different version might not be able to interconnect. Features： ．Supports over 100 types of mahjong hands that are commonly seen in the 16 tiles mahjong rules of Hong Kong/Taiwan/China. ．Supports network multiplayer via Bluetooth/Wifi or LAN. ．Anytime auto save, you can always quit in the midst of the game, your game can be restored afterward. ．Statistics logging system that records all the mahjong hands you achieved. ．Capture and Sharing feature: capture a screenshot of your winning hand and store in SD card, or share with your friends on social network. === 雀友麻雀16張 測試版。 麻將新手請先下載“雀友麻雀Free”學習基本麻将玩法。 *連線時請確保所有裝置所使用的軟體版本相同，不同版本並不保證能成功連線 Change Log: === 1.0.2beta A. Added examples under "How to play" B. Fixed winning tiles hint didn't show up in several special hands. 1.0.3beta Fixed Force Close error during app startup on certain devices. 1.0.4beta A. Now you can see tiles discarded by individual players, tap discarded tiles to view. B. Better winning tile hint - exhausted tiles will be crossed out. C. Fixed incorrect high score record bug. 1.0.5beta A. Added two hands: "Mixed Shifted Pungs" and "Mixed Shifted Chows". B. UI tweak and minor bug fix. 1.0.6beta LAN/Wifi network mode fix. 1.0.7beta Unlock 3 bonus wallpapers by rating this app! (Hint: Tap the star! If you have already rated, it's just fine to submit the same rating again.) 1.0.8beta A. Added several new hands, now with over 100 hands in total! B. Added random wallpaper option. C. Network mode tweak and bug fixes. D. Removed portrait mode support in HVGA devices. 1.1.0beta A. Added server network mode, now you can use your 2G/3G data connection to host/connect a game. B. Added "Nine Gates" hand. 1.1.01beta A. Added Tile Color option B. Added 3 new characters (for network mode only) C. Minor bug fixes 1.1.02beta A. Fixed "Exit" bug during game play on some devices (please let us know in detail if you still have this problem after update, we cannot test EVERY device and we need your help to sort out this issue. Thanks) B. Added 1 network mode character C. Added 1 tile color 1.3.01beta A. Added "Tournament" game mode B. Bug fixes and UI tweak 1.3.03beta A. Tournament bug fixes B. Tournament UI tweak 1.3.05beta A. Added 2 new characters and 1 new wallpaper B. You can restart a tournament match (except Finals) with 2 tickets, click menu during tournament match C. UI bug fixes and tweaks 1.3.07beta A. Added a new tournament, along with new items B. Added 1 new wallpaper C. Bug fix for "seven pairs and a pung" hand can't be recognized occasionally 1.3.08beta A. Added a new character B. Added option to switch off tile hint (for those who want some serious practice for the real game!). C. Item logic tweak, increased the chance to obtain unowned items in tournament mode 1.3.10beta A. Minor AI bug fixes. B. Minor scoring fixes. 1.3.12beta Fixed the display problem for qHD+ devices. 1.3.14beta A. Added option to disable stretch image mode for qHD+ devices. B. Fixed LAN multiplayer interface crashing problem on 4.0+ devices. 1.3.15beta A. Minor bug fixes. B. Updated to latest Android library, better compatibility and performance enhancement. 1.3.19beta UI fixes for KitKat. Fixed tournament mode crash problem on some devices.
release_text: UI fixes for KitKat. Fixed tournament mode crash problem on some devices.

description: Mahjong and Friends (Japanese Riichi Mahjong) Ad-free version. Mahjong and Friends Japan is a Japanese Riichi Mahjong(麻雀/麻將/麻将) game based on the Riichi Competition Rules (RCR). The game features all Mahjong Hands defined in the rules. MJ&F supports multiplayer through either Bluetooth(*1) or TCP(Intranet/Internet/Wifi/Hotspot(*2)), 4-player supported. *1) Bluetooth game requires Android 2.1+. *2) Hosting a "Hotspot" game requires Android 2.2+. MJ&F supports in-game auto save. So that you don't have to worry about losing your game state on a transportation rush. What's more, it features a record logging system that records all of the Mahjong Hands you achieved during your day-to-day game-play. Want others know you've won with a "Big Four Winds" Mahjong Hand? No problem! You can always use the Capture feature to take result screenshot and save it to the SD storage, or use the Share feature to submit the screenshot to your favorite social network. **When playing in network mode, ALWAYS use the same versions for all devices. ***dear all, please noted that Bluetooth is a short distance communication technology, it needs both devices in short distance (e.g. within 3 meters) to establish a connection. (*update maybe frequent sometimes, please turn on auto-update if you feel this harassing, always check change log to see what's being updated and decide whether to apply, thanks!) Change Log: ========= 1.3.08 Bug fixes and minor UI tweaks. 1.3.10 A. Bug fix: outside hand can't be recognized sometimes. B. Minor tweaks for tablet 1.3.14 Fixed the display problem for qHD+ devices. 1.3.15 A. Minor bug fixes. B. Updated to latest Android library, better compatibility and performance enhancement. 1.3.19 UI fixes for KitKat. Fixed tournament mode crash problem on some devices.
release_text: UI fixes for KitKat. Fixed tournament mode crash problem on some devices.

Little Stars for Little Wars 2 is a Real-Time Strategy (RTS) game, where the player has a simple objective: move through the neutral star systems in order to capture all enemy systems. Once you start playing, you will lose yourself in fun levels, ranging from amusing to mind-challenging! Commander - The galaxy has plunged into chaos and little wars have broken out along the border - fleet-ships are standing by for you to take control of the battlefield. Form your strategy, conquer enemy systems, and claim victory for your forces! Features: * 54 levels. * Procedural skirmish generation: play random levels. * Local Multiplayer: play with friends up to 3 people on one device! * Auto-paths: auto-paths system for quick and easy control over the battlefield. (touch and drag) * Upgrades: specialize your star systems to fortify their defensive capabilities, or, advance their ship production. * Beautiful and atmospheric electronic soundtrack by Trevor Golas. * Color Customization: don't like the default colors? Tune to your liking! * Multitouch: pinch to zoom, tap to control. * High replayability: Time and efficiency challenges for each level! * 3 difficulty levels. Gameplay Video: http://youtu.be/wQ_znGCET-M follow: https://twitter.com/kendja like: http://www.facebook.com/lsflw2

description: We aim to be a one-stop dashboard for a recreational or commercial mariner, or a sportsman. The idea is to have what really matters on the water clearly presented, with as little user interaction as possible. There are no ads, subscriptions, or fees of any sort. Features: 1) Radar heatmap of the surface currents. Resolution options are 6km, 2km, 1km and 500m. Only 6km resolution is enabled in this version Refer to CORDC website for more info. 2) Standard NOAA/NWS 4- day marine forecast by zone (available in Pro version). Covers US coastal zones, Puerto Rico, Hawaii and Alaska (offshore zones are coming soon). Updated every 2-4 hrs 3) 24 hr marine forecast by WorldWeatherOnline (independent provider) anywhere in the world, including standard elements (sea state in pro version only). Updated every 2-4 hours 4) NOAA Tides predictions 5) Worldwide land weather outlook (3 days) 6) Your own private or shared KML map with points of interest may also be overlayed Tips: Tap on the map to set the location. Swipe horizontally in forecast display to go from 0 hrs to 21 hrs forecasts (forecast is for 0,3,6,9,12,15,18 and 21 hours on your current day (date line is respected) and is updated every 2-4 hrs
release_text: Fixed the handling of geolocation services being off on startup

description: Droid HotSpot is an application which facilitates your Internet phone connection sharing either with other devices via a Wi-Fi connection. Starting hotspot is very simple - just one click. WiFi HotSpot allows you to: ● check the number of devices connected to your hotspot, ● define a timer to turn off your HotSpot automatically after a number of minutes, ● automatically activate HotSpot as you connect your phone on AC or USB power, ● automatically turn off the HotSpot after your device is disconnected from a power source, ● automatically turn off the HotSpot when your battery level is less then x%, eg. 30% ● set Access Point SSID, ● set Access Point Password, ● set minimum battery level, ● set timer number of minutes, ● turn off application notifications, Warning, some providers block the Internet connection sharing or tethering (Ex: Sprint). This application works only if tethering is running on your phone. If WiFi HotSpot is not compatible with your device, please don’t rate it negatively. Instead send me an email describing your problem, your model device and I will be pleased to implement corrections and publish an updated version.

This is a FREE plugin for a great OpenVPN Connect app. Did you like OpenVPN Connect? If yes, then you certainly need this app, it makes finding and connecting a lot easier and faster. There is no need to find VPN servers by yourself, you don't need to manage .ovpn profiles, this app does this for you. Why use VPN? It helps you protect your privacy, it encrypts your traffic and hides your IP address. * It's a plugin, you will need to install OpenVPN Connect * All servers are found over Internet, so we can't guarantee that all of them are available

This app is a plugin for popular OpenVPN clients. Enable you to find and import FREE open VPN servers from Internet for OpenVPN clients. Increase their availability to easily UNBLOCK blocked sites like Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, etc. Encrypt the data, Protect your privacy, Bypass firewall, Hide your public ip, nobody know where are you from. *** IMPORTANT *** ● It is a plugin, so does NOT work standalone! ● Designed for co-working with "OpenVPN Connect", ● For Android 4.0 and upper, suggest to install the official OpenVPN client "OpenVPN Connect", for which we provide specific feature. ● Of cause, you can use "OpenVPN for Android". Support import ovpn profiles, but can't clean them quickly. ● All servers are from Internet, so we can't make sure each of them be available, so need you to try one by one patiently. One tap version is in plan, but need more time to develop. *** HOW TO USE *** 1. Install the app and "OpenVPN Connect" 2. Open the app, and click the "Download VPN servers", then waiting for server list 3. Click one server, the OpenVPN details activity will be started 4. See server details and click "Import to OpenVPN Connect". Import screen will be started, click the "Accept" button 5. In the "OpenVPN Connect" main screen, click "Connect" button 6. If you are lucky, you will get a VPN connection. 7. If the server can't be reached, please repeat steps: 3 - 5

FTP Server is an File Transfer Protocol server for Android that will let you to manage files and folders on your device without the USB cable. The benefits of using this application are: - Transfer files and folders to/from any computer and your device without the need of the USB cable. - No need anymore to mount/unmount the SD card. - Keep the USB port of your device safe. Features: - Anonymous access - Multiple files transfers - UTF-8 support Tag: WiFi, FTP, Server, File Transfer Protocol, Wireless

This app monitors the phone USB port. Whenever the phone is connected to a computer or laptop via a USB cable the aplication automatically turns on. Ilmuwan Islam is an Android application that presents Islam scientists story. Lets you learn and find inspiration with Ilmuwan Islam. Here is the content that is in the application : 1. Islam scientists sory (With internet connection). 2. Contents about Muslim doctor like Avecinna, Ibnu Rusyd (Averroes) and others 3. Social sharing, 4. Live map 5. Tibetan Font for Samsung devices or any with FlipFont capability. ** HOW TO USE ** 1) You must have a Samsung device with FlipFont capability. 2) Go to Settings->Display->Font style 3) Select "MonlamBodyig" font 4) Test it is working by visiting http://lobsangmonlam.org 5) Install "MultiLing keyboard" from the Android market with Tibetan keyboard add-on ** TO USE THIS FONT, YOU MUST HAVE A SAMSUNG DEVICE ** In 2005, Monlam Lobsang invented Monlam Bod Yig Version 1, which although similar to the existing Tibetan fonts like TCRC Bod Yig, had the additional U-Mey script version. Many people from Tibet, especially those from his own hometown, Amdo Ngawa, used the font, giving him relevant feedback and suggestions to improve the font. This font pack for FlipFont enabled devices, brings this Tibetan font to Android devices. Learn more about Lobsang Monlam: http://lobsangmonlam.org/ Learn more about Tibetan fonts here: http://digitaltibetan.org/index.php/Tibetan_Fonts

description: Stay connected to your job search while on the go. Search, view and apply to jobs - whenever and wherever you want. You can even be alerted when jobs match your search. Key features: - Search, view and apply to jobs (or save/email them to apply later) - Access your Monster account— resumes, cover letters, job applications and more - Manage your resumes from within the application - Upload your resume via Dropbox and Google Drive - Receive push notifications and/or email alerts for new jobs that fit your criteria

Monster is the worldwide leader in successfully connecting job opportunities and people. From web to mobile, Monster is continuously breaking new grounds in its endeavor to give Better Access, Better Connections for Better Jobs. Download the new Monster Mobile app and empower your job search. You can also download it from Monster website. The free Monster Mobile app works for you 24x7 so that you do not miss out on any job opportunity, even on the move. It is currently available in India, Middle East, South East Asia & Hong Kong. Job search is now easier than ever with the new Monster Mobile. FEATURES: - Declare your career status and let the app build a unique and personalized experience for you. - Build your job network on Monster. What’s more…… you can import your contacts from external networks and also give & receive endorsements & recommendations. - Empower yourself with smart job commendations to make better career decisions. - Follow recruiters and companies to get latest information on job opportunities - Activity Meters to guide you with relevant job recommendations - Create a customized job agent as per your requirement - Save a job and apply later. Apply to jobs shared by recruiters you are following. - Access insights related to your profile, job activity and connections to make smart career choices. - Remain updated on the hiring trends in your industry, function and location. - Remain updated with notifications on Job alerts, pending actions, company/recruiter update, connection, etc. - Easy resume upload. What’s more…. you can manage your complete profile on the move.
release_text: Introducing new features of: - Invite connections from Phonebook contacts. - Enchanting Job listing & description. - Upload Resume from Dropbox. - Enriched app experience. - New Push Notifications added. - Fixes

description: Monsters are coming! You have to kill them all! Everyone knows the rules – kill or die hard. Become a professional monster contract killer and download ‘Monster Killer – Shooter Mayhem’ for free! The monster apocalypse has come and you are one of the survivors. The world has been infected with monsters and your only task is to stop this major breakout. The world needs a hero like you more than ever. Summon your inner monster terminator! Choose any weapon that comes across and shoot them, stab them, blow them up, burn them down to the ground with the truck or launch that bloody monster high above the sky!! Let the monster mania begin! Don’t have mercy on them because they won’t have any on you. This is one of those Android games that will become your new favorite time killer, and you can get it with free download. This unique shooter game offers you plenty of excitement on twelve different levels. Each level is harder than the last, and each one with a new monster in the company of the monsters from the previous levels. The last mission is an endless monster swarm where you have to shoot all the evil creatures that are in the game and survive for as long as possible! Isn’t this exciting? Download and play now one of the best monster killing games there is! Monster Killer – Shooter Mayhem offers a bevy of fabulous features that make it (literally) mind-blowing. Choose between two heroes whose catch-phrases like “I like big guns and I cannot lie” and “I eat those like you for breakfast” will get you in the monster shooting mood and will make you feel like you are in a real action movie. Also, choose one of three additional bonus powers that can boost your health, attack or defense. In addition to all this the players will find all sorts of different weapons such as knives, swords, axes, guns, flamethrowers, laser guns and many more. But keep your eyes open! These tricky monsters are coming from both sides, so you must attack them to the left and to the right if you want to stay alive! Join one of those fun addicting games that you won’t be able to let go of! Fear not – Slay away! Although Monster Killer – Shooter Mayhem appears as one of those cool games for kids only, played by boys 10 or above, it can also be placed in the category of shooting games for adults! But there is no reason why girls won’t like it as well; after all, we all share a passion for shooting, killing and maiming monsters! Finally, the realization of this game would not be possible without the help of a 12-year-old boy, named Luka Pavlovic, whose brilliant ideas were used in the creation of this fun kids game. So download it now and play it on your Android phones or tablets! Enjoy going through all twelve levels with different background design and amazing sound effects! Play it whenever you want and share your score on Facebook, or go to Google + and compete with numerous other players all over the world on the game’s leaderboard. So what are you waiting for? Download it now, and hurry up, because those monsters won’t shoot themselves! ** This game is an intellectual property of Peaksel LLC – copyright 2015

With just a few taps you can learn the basics, master your own roulette strategy and improve your gut hunches! ★★★A taste of some other Game Features ★★★ •Zoom in feature for accurate betting •3 different FREE ways to get additional chips •Beautiful Luxury design •Gorgeous slick wheel •State of the art smooth game engine •Chillaxing casino style sound and music for a more realistic gambling atmosphere American Vegas Roulette is designed to emulate the rush of playing the famous roulette game in a real Las Vegas Casino as there is no better feeling than the feeling of Stacking those Chips and collect your earnings after beating the house! So GO GO GO, put your classiest suite and let the best American Vegas Roulette game begin! Having a problem? Got a suggestion? We would love to hear from you! Badminton Champion is the best and most realistic badminton game on the market, and is now available for free! You definitely can’t miss it! This game is absolutely simple for anyone to start mastering their way up as Badminton players going through smart challenging levels. Aim, tap and swipe your finger to serve and lure your opponents to one side with a short ball and then quickly swipe hard to take a shot to the opposite side. Improve your skills to move the ball around the court and confuse your opponent to win. Either it's your first time playing the game or if even if you are a badminton master, now is the time to prove that you are the best around! Choose between 3 favorite lucky rackets and play in different realistic courts while the crowed is cheering and taking your pictures! Badminton Champion Artificial intelligence that learns your every move I is what makes this game different from any other Badminton you played so far. It will keep you looking out for challenge in every ball hit on the court by testing your accuracy, concentration and reaction speed! If you haven't been a fan of the game yet, you will be now with: * Realistic matches! * Various hitting ways! * Super smart game AI * Outstanding sound effects! * High clear ball! We did everything to pack Badminton Champion with Real Life Animations, Realistic Physics, and Effects that simulates the game excellently. * We are always happy to read and see player feedback's, so don't be shy ad let us know what you think! So download this FREE game now, take your racket and beat your opponent waiting behind the net! Good luck – you will surely need it

Either you're a professional player with great past experience in the game or even if you've never set foot in a casino before and wish to learn and practice – Casino Blackjack 21 is for you! Accumulate cards with point's totals as close to 21 without going over 21. Face cards (Jacks, Queens and Kings) are worth 10 points. Aces are worth 1 or 11, whichever is preferable. Other cards are represented by their number. To win you need to beat the dealer without busting. You bust when your cards total to more than 21 and you lose automatically. The winner is whoever closest to a total of 21. If you and the House has a tie - no one wins. Besides the great simple interface, smooth game speed, and real casino look, one of the greatest features of this particular Blackjack game is that you can play with 1 and up to 8 decks. Casino Blackjack 21 is without a doubt the most professional yet easy to learn, fun Blackjack game in the market to sharpen your skills and to enjoy to play like the best players in the world. May the best man win!
